name: bamaboy2169
text: Wish I could give this place zero stars. I went with my mother to pick her supposedly detailed car. The wheels were still dirty, the carpets were suppose to be vacuumed and shampooed yet there was dirt everywhere, and bugs still on both side mirrors and the sunroof shade cover like they were never even washed!! He sprayed armor all on the plastic on the outside of the vehicle and did not run it in on most parts just left little spray dots everywhere. The dash was still dusty with no armour all on it. He took advantage of my mother charging her sixty five dollars. I told him if it was me I would not be paying you for this terrible job you did. He then went on to tell me to shoot myself!! I would never go there again and I would recommend especially if you re a woman to stay away he ll take advantage of you thinking you won't know what you re looking at. Zero stars wish I could give negative stars....

text: Jamie and her team do a fantastic job. They replaced the headliner in my 2007 Honda Accord and it looks great. text: THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO!Affordable and awesome!! Jamie is so sweet and so helpful.  She taught us how to solve our issue in the future (saving us money on future visits). text: OMG!!!! I don’t even know where to start. First I want to thank my coworker for recommending Like Nu. I took my 2008 Cadillac CTS to get a hole repaired in my leather driver seat that was caused by a broken frame. When I went to pick up the car and saw the seat, all I could say is”WOW”.!!!! I can’t even describe the great lengths she went to repair the seat. Not only does the leather look amazing, the frame was fixed and the electric seat works again!!! The prices are very fair and the work is A-1. Jamie and her team are the the greatest at what they do. I would recommend this place to anyone that wants quality work. Thanks again,Jamie.😃😃P.S , very nice family at LIKE NU!!

text: I called them at 1 pm about installing speakers I bought at bestbuy they were ready too install two hours later. name: Cindy Hosea
text:
As of today I would not recommend them.  Two weeks ago I went in to get a new radio for my car.  They promised the one they put in with all the bells and whistles would be
perfect.  Well the radio came in with wrong parts as they had reorder that was fine.  Finally they had all they needed although they kept calling saying you need this and that we said ok.  We took my car to them and they had it 4 days.  Finally after a lot of phone calls they said it was done.  It tried to sync my phone and it did but no sound out of the speakers.  They couldn't figure out the problem so the installer promised he'd call the manufacturer Monday morning and call me.  No phone call.  I called him and got his voice mail.  No return call.  I called the shop and was told they would call as soon as he got in .  No call.  I also called Sirus to have that transferred from my other radio but they didn't hook it up.  So here I sit with a very expensive radio and CD player.  At this point the ball is in their court and I'm waiting to see what they do. Until then I would no recommend them to anyone.
I now will give them 5 stars.  They have fixed my problems and everything works perfect.

I would go to them again.

name: Jason Smith
text: I ordered 1500.00 worth of stuff and was told it would take 3 days but it took over 30 days and everyday I called I they got smart with me and gave me excuse after excuse of why it wouldn't come I am now a dealer for scar audio and many other products and when I order something it never takes over three days it is obvious that he spent the money on something else and had to try to get it back before he can order my stuff

text: I’ve never had my car detailed before so in my opinion it was pretty grimy and worn, but they made it look brand new!! Every compartment was Vacuumed and cleaned and the scent they used smelt amazing! My cloth seats were disgusting and now they look so so much better. Cameron was very professional and nice and got back to me quickly anytime I had a question. I also had the bronze exterior and the outside of my car looked fantastic to the top rack all the way down to the bottom of my tires. I never thought my car could be so clean, I highly recommend getting your car detailed here.

text: My car had paint overspray all over it in fine speckles, and these guys did an awesome job getting it cleaned up.  The price was much cheaper than quotes I got elsewhere, but the quality of work was exceptional.  They were timely and very professional.  Definitely recommend!

Also have a warranty on the coating and a free wash anytime I want it is included.  If I could give 10 stars, I would.

name: Lucas Hester
text: I've been attempting to get in touch with this business for just a notch over a month now, to no avail. Their phone number works, voicemail still works, and the website still works, but I can't get them to respond back. I call about twice a week and leave a voicemail at least once each time with my number, plus I've tried their email a couple of times. Nothing. Not sure if something happened and they went under, or they're just that busy. But until something changes, I'm warning people to look elsewhere and not waste their time. They seemed like the best detail crew locally per reviews, but I have no clue what's happened in the past few months. Will edit this if I hear back from them.

name: Latrice bri
text: Purchased a Groupon and upon arrival I was told that they no longer accept them, I advised that I purchased last year before Covid and he said pull over there and I will get you after this vehicle. I waited 45 minutes and asked how much longer and he went on to advise that they he had not received the money from Groupon and was trying to accommodate. I advised that he should contact Groupon and he should have told me up front that he really had no intention of providing the service. I see that the Groupon is still available to be purchased but I would not use this again.

name: Mind Dryft
text:
I don't like giving negative reviews. But this needs to be addressed. I made an appointment at 10 a.m. on a Wednesday. When I arrived, a man told me to come back at 11 so I wouldn't have to wait. When I came back by 11 the female told me it would be finished in 2 hours. I walked back home and walked back giving them three hours. They hadn't even started yet. I told them I would give them a second chance and come back next Wednesday at 10 am. When I arrived the same man told me I was next in line and he would get started right away. He told me to come back in 2 hours. I walked back home and back 3 1/2 hours later and they still hadn't cleaned the seats or vacuumed the floor. My windows are smeared and he said that was the best I would get.

These people are very nice, and courteous. They have a smile on their face when talking to you. I don't have a problem with their attitude. It's their timeliness that is way off and quality since I had to rush them. I gave them three and a half hours instead of two and they still weren't finished. I took my keys and went home. I still payed the 60$ and he refunded me 10 but in all honesty, to keep from having a negative review like this, it should have been free with an apology.

name: Eric Seals
text: Made an appointment with the business, and from the first conversation to the time I dropped my car off and then from them delivering it back to me; totally impressed and satisfied. I can not explain how bad my car was, and how good that got everything looking, reading some of these reviews, I can believe that most of the negative ones probably didn't want to let the tlc be done, so glad that I did! I brought my wife's car in a week later, and totally ruined by the kids, and they made it look as good as any body!! Got a repeat customer out of me for now on!!!

name: Karen Stokes
text: GREEEAT SERVICE!! I had so much pet hair inside of my car and the smell was horrible; however, took it here and I was so pleased with the good job they did!! The guys were so nice and friendly with me, and even though, I felt bad about how my car looked, they made me feel good about bringing it to them. Definitely go to this place of business if you need a good cleaning...

name: Susan Christan
text: These guys know how to clean a car, and they are so sweet and very kind! They made me feel right at home and took very good care of my car.

name: LUIS RODRIGUEZ
text: Awesome services! Great quality! I will definitely be back! Customer service is really good...

name: debbie ash
text: They did a really good job.  If you dont have time to wait drop it off because you'll be waiting a long time.   I'm not saying it in a bad way they are just on point

name: Evan Maltass
text:
Gave them 2 chances. An appointment at 10. Told it'd take 2 hours. 3.5 hours later, they hadn't started. Second time, same thing.

If they tell you 1 hour, it'll be 3. 2 hours is more like 5.

name: DrayPullz
text: It really is sad because I believe in opportunities and chances. However I feel after them washing 2 of my cars, and me spending $225 and even more in the past, that they just don't do a great job. I almost feel as though I have to clean my car before I even take it to them for it to look good. When I received my avenger recently it wasn't waxed well, and the rims still had brake dust on them in spots. For $225, I feel it should have been MUCH better. They also didn't even vacuum my trunk!

name: Northern Steeleiii
text: I made my appointment yesterday, SO GLAD I DID!!! I was totally impressed by the friendliness and the quality of service they did on my vehicle... I will be back!

name: Christopher Coggins
text:
You pay up front which is the wrong way to conduct business cause they already have your money and the product should be
driven by the payment of services rendered. I was told 2-3 hours and it would be ready and here I am at 5 hours and still waiting. I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone , they don't seem very professional and if their attitude is any indication of services rendered I'm sure I won't be happy with the results. NEVER going there again and will never recommend to anyone . I called several times to check on my vehicle and never once got an answer. It should never take this long, I have personally detailed inside and out in a 5 hour window

name: Jeff Saltsman
text: Do not take your car to this place! Its not professional. I had to sign a waiver just to get my car washed. I was there 3 hours for a $35 dollars wash. Being they wanted me to paid first I couldn't just leave. And to top it all off, the wash job was  just plain horrible. My windows were cleaner before went in there. They must have tried to clean my windows with a nasty, dirty rag. By the time I got home, the tire dressing was slung all over my car.  I was so mad! I will NEVER go back to that place.

name: Lee Reese
text: Only place in Moody to get a hand wash and vacuum. Full detailing service available too.

name: Lem Motlow
text: I made appt for 9 am this past Saturday for VIP package had taken vehicle 3 years ago for same thing and all was great this time came and checked at 5pm due to thought they closed at 5 and hadn’t heard from them and they had just started on the inside/ interior, the car hadn’t touched all day long, told me they would call me and that they had to then clean engine and clay bar wax, finally got vehicle at 805pm, dark so couldn’t inspect vehicle that great next morning the outside still had dirt on each door like not washed or wax in area, I will say the interior looked good , however I will never take another vehicle to this place, guy told me he was alone because owner had issue and that tried to call me phone never rang and they had my number on two different calendars appt page and on sign in, very disappointed

name: Trace Atchison
text: The experience was less than average. I went in at 9:05am with only one person in front of me. About 30 mins later another person came in, they had there car ready in about 30 minutes. Completely skipped my car, and the persons care who was here before me. I got the BASIC package. Wash outside and inside. I've been here almost 2 HOURS and they still AREN'T done with my truck. I've seen about 4 employees working today, haven't seen but 1 actually wiping a car, the others I guess are chilling in the back. If they gave me a hose and a rag I could have done it in a quarter of the time. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME HERE

name: Nicole Hayes
text: We got a quote and were told to be there at 9am. Finally left at 9:20 after no one showed up. Not a good way to run your business.

name: Stephonia Taylor Mclinn
text: Fantastic woman on detail car cleaning service and other businesses please make sure to go by there and check them out

name: Katilyn Lankford
text:
Do not take your vehicle here. They not only stole 1 but two of my hydro flash while my car was there. I ended up leaving my car there for 3 hours while I went to work and there was no other customers when I returned the insides were only half way cleaned and the vehicle was not even washed. On top of that they had to pull my brand new mats out of the garbage where they threw then away. Even after waiting for another 40 minutes my car was streaked. My mats were dirty and my mirrors/ glass still dirty.

They were washing the cars with a rag and hardly no soap... no real cleaning agent. So I repeat save your 45 dollars and do it yourself. You'll be a lot happier

name: Brenda Reid
text: Hand wash your vehicle.  They have a good selection of how much detailing you want.   Will pick up and deliver your vehicle.  They do a nice job.

name: Brian Lindsey
text: This place does amazing work and Luis the owner is very polite and he and his staff goes above and beyond for all his customers!!!  Keep up the good work guys!!! Go see Luis at Detail Your Way for all your detailing needs!!!!!!!!!!

name: danny jackson
text: When is this place ever open. I guess I've been by here about 4 times when no is here or they have no keys to open. They do an ok job just have none close by other than these guys.

name: Susan Suttle
text: They do great work! Highly recommend.

name: Febra McGuire
text: Excellent 👌 service

name: Adam Gann
text: I've been here twice in two years and both times the experience was horrible.  Last year they washed my truck (a lifted one at that) and they didn't even wash the fender wells.  In April my wife dropped my new truck off to be washed.  I went by to pick it up that afternoon.  When I got it home, I walked around it.  There were spots 2 feet long that weren't even washed, the bottom of the tailgate was dirty, my mirrors were not clean, the front windshield had water spots baked onto it and the dash was still dusty.  I turned right around and went back.  A "supervisor" came out with the kid who washed it.  He looked at him and said "you missed a lot".  They proceeded to go back over the truck and clean it up.  I told them to make sure the front side of the mirrors were clean.  I noticed what looked like steel wool laying on the table next to where they were washing.  Didn't think much about it, but when I got home and looked at my truck again, my drivers side mirror looked like they had used the steel wool to try and get the bugs, etc. off the mirror.  I called to speak to the owner and he won't call me.  I sent them a message on Facebook asking for the owner to call me.  I was read, but no one ever called.  I guess I'll have to take the truck and attempt to have the mirror buffed out or repainted, at my cost.  This carwash is garbage and the ownership is pathetic.  Wouldn't hurt my feelings if it goes under tomorrow.  I should have learned my lesson after last year.

name: Don Sellers
text: I let them pressure wash my house they done an excellent job very polite very clean would use them again

name: robert2002bmw
text: Nice people but car was not washed good. When I picked it up there was still spots of wax on it.

name: Foster Oliver
text: I have taken my cars here several times.  They have always good a great job!

name: Dave Karr
text: Used a brush to wash my black car. Now my car has swirl marks all over it. This is not a "hand wash".

name: Rebecca Strain

text: Great people

text: Demetrius got my ride looking so fresh!! Came to my house and was done so quickly, such quality work, I will definitely be a frequent customer!

name: Andy B

name: Willie Lemons
text: I'm visiting the area and needed some detail work. I googled Detail Shops, reviewed, and liked D and D comments and called. I felt very comfortable with the conversation, made a same day appointment and dropped off  my vehicle for a full service detail. When I picked up my vehicle, I was pleasantly pleased with results.

name: Mark Berry
text: My wife liked the job they did on her car..so she went back again.

name: Willard Sitz

name: Alex Estrada
text: Brought my Maserati in for a quick wash. I'm visiting in from out of town.  Big "D" and Little "D" took good care of my car and me. Great guys and outstanding quality of work. I recommend highly!

name: Felecia Walker
text:
Thank u Demetrius darling
Always a pleasure & u keeps me satisfied ❤️❤️❤️

name: Kimberly Sabel
text: I used to go to Madison Car Wash for car detailing, but they recently closed. I found D&D on Google and decided to give them a go. My car looks amazing! We are having a baby next month, and I wanted to get all of the dog fur and dust out of my car in preparation. They did a great job, and my dog sheds a lot, so it was no easy feat. The outside of my car was so shiny, and they even polished the tires. At 9 months pregnant, I was also very grateful for the clean restroom. I highly recommend this operation. The employees were very polite and did a thorough job. I have found my new car detailing place!

name: Shamar Hampton Sr.
text: MAN WHEN I TELL YOU THEY PUT ME BACK IN THE GAME! YOU HEAR ME! INSIDE & OUT LOOKS D GOOD!

name: Shannon Powell
text: Wendy and Shane are the best team in the mechanics shop! Shane will fix your vehicle, and Wendy has your bill ready for you when he’s finished. Love these guys!

name: Mike Moore
text: Made an appt for 8:00am for a Oil change the day before and har asked if they could have me out by 8:30 because I had a 9:00 appt. they assured me they could. As promised I was pulling out at 8:25am. No BS or up-selling you get from most garages. Refreshingly professional and friendly. I will definitely start bring all business to them. If you want to support small business I would highly recommend trying them out.

name: john frye
text: This is the only place my family uses for car detailing or repair. The staff there is amazing! They stand behind their work! They are a one stop shop for most needs detailing- oil changes - car repair- and if they can’t do it they know people that can! Locally owned - take your car there you won’t be disappointed!

name: Camden Layton
text: If you have never been to a detail shop these are the right people to see they are very honest people and do a great job. The mechanic is also a very honest and fair person. I highly recommend this place

name: Kendoru Kari
text: Cost $250 for incomplete detailing... Vehicle was still filthy in some areas, inside and out, and carpet was pulled up, twisted and put back incorrectly after it was cleaned. The carpet was also ripped during cleaning, which they tried to say it came in that way.. Find somewhere else before here, won't help resolve issues same day..

name: SumYun Guy
text: This place is great. My car was (ashamedly) filthy when I brought it in. When I picked it up it looked and smelled brand new. And it's an '06. They go the extra mile. I definitely recommend this place.

name: River Lotus
text: Horribly rude and did a poor job on detailing. Paid $225 to have complete detail and car seats were not cleaned, sticky still in cup holders, outside of car not buffed as told they would be. When we brought the car back we were treated very poorly and told they can't do anything about it.

name: Margo Bickham
text: I always used this business for all my auto repairs,oil change,tires and other. ASE certified and exceptional customer service.

name: Cody Macon
text: 250$ wasted!! Very disappointed with the outcome. Not worth the money at all!  They do not take pride in their work. Job was half-assed if not less! They made it sound very convincing over the phone, nothing stated over the phone was accomplished. Came out with more scratches than went in!! Only reason it's not a 1 star, is because they tried to compensate for the job but I wasn't satstifed! Would of rather them do their job correctly!!

name: David Griffin
text: What a joke! I called beforehand,  I stopped by there spoke to the owner about my truck having some overspray on it and he said it would be $650 and that he would have to triple buff the entire truck and then wax it for an additional $275. I advised him that I could simply clay bar it in 30 minutes for $25 kit of clay bar. He said ok see ya later... Lol! Didnt want to clay bar the truck for me when I asked if he would just do that,  lol.  Btw my truck is a brand new silverado. Now that's service lmao...Never will I recommend this place. I just finished detailing it myself completely inside and out in 1 hour for 25 bucks. Stay away far away people.

name: Meredith Frye
text: Absolute best experience- over and over again. This is a business who sometimes calls a few days later to make sure you’re happy. We had the pleasure of talking with Marcus when we picked up, and if you ge the chance, you won’t regret it. He’s a business owner who truly cares about his customers.

name: Mary Velasquez
text: They did an amazing mini detail on my Toyota Tacoma--it looked brand new!

name: Jessie L
text:
I am totally satisfied with their service!!! I have honda accord and paid $200 for full exterior/interior service with car seat cleaning because I had a stinky situation with my passenger car seat so I tried to clean it myself but the seat already absorbed everything to the bottom of the seat... so I looked through internet try to see what I need to do and found about "auto/car detailing service". my next step was to find out the place and I had a list full of auto detailing service centers and pro car care was one of it. looked through reviews, calling all the places, if they don't pick up I even made trip there. finally I decided to give pro car care try, and staff were very friendly, kind, and nicely explained to me how and what they will do. only thing was they were so booked and I had to wait until the 30th of April, but he told me he will gives me a call back as soon as he finds out one appointment gets canceled or I could go ahead and reserve a spot but then if I find other place that they can do earlier it's totally fine for me to go cancel theirs. I ended up getting call and heard good news that I could get my service the very next day. now I only smell fresh when I get in my car!
absolutely loved their service, nice staff, and will go back in the future when I need professional cleaning with my car again!

name: Lauren Kiskunes
text: Wonderful experience! I took my car in for an interior detail and PCC was able to remove years of stains from my microfiber seats. Friendly and quality service! Would recommend to anyone.

name: John Bierman
text:
I will be back .They did a great job. I recommend them to anyone else.
Very friendly and informative staff.

name: Dorothy Evans
text: When I expressed that I would like for my vehicle to look as much like it looked when I bought it I didn’t know it could look that way again. Excellent work! This is what detailed means. Every little cranny and nook was detailed. Thanks Pro Car Care team!!  Love my new clean vehicle!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Ms. Evans! We love to see our customers smile! We always strive to exceed expectations and we're happy that we were able to do this for you! Feel free to come see us again if you need us!

name: Bruce Engler
text: This place was absolutely amazing! It is a nice family run company and they are very polite and friendly. They did a more than excellent job on my car. Very impressed!

resp.text:
It was a pleasure to meet you Bruce! So glad to be able to help! If you need anything else in the future, just reach out.

- Marcus, owner

name: Brent Smith
text: Marcus did an amazing job getting the scratches out of my truck. It shined when he was finished. Also he took the time to get all the dog hair out of the back floorboard which was very nice considering how much was there.

name: Lee Mendoza
text: My Jeep went through the clay bar process to remove over spray. Upon pick up I told them to go back over the vehicle because of missed areas. About one month later I'm still finding wax residue on my Jeep in easily accessible areas. These guys are great at washing cars but when it comes to "detailing", I'd give them an 85% on paying  attention to detail. Something to consider if you have an expensive vehicle that you want to have taken care of. I personally won't go back.

name: Elizabeth Scheeter
text: After moving, travel with three small children, and life in general, it's been a while since our family vehicle was cleaned properly. If I'm being honest, I can only describe the condition as repulsive. We took our Toyota Sienna to Pro Car Care today. My husband picked it up this afternoon, and we were shocked! The interior looks better than when we bought it! The seats are spotless and soft. The carpet looks great. The cup holders on the floor between the second row seats are now pristine, which is a huge deal since my older two climb over that space to get to their seats. Our Weather Tech mats look new again. The exterior looks great as well. Marcus (owner) was incredibly friendly each time I spoke with him. We chatted several times about what the van would need, and he never pressured us into any services. He even called this afternoon after my husband got home to see what I thought. Great service,  great work. Would definitely recommend!

name: Katie McCleary
text: Marcus is so great and helpful, he stayed late to make sure I got the service I needed and could leave town the next day. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for kind and friendly service and good results.

resp.text: Katie, it was my pleasure making sure that you were satisfied with my service and still have plenty of time to leave town on time! Thank you very much for your kind words. I really appreciate it! -Marcus M., Owner

name: Bonnie Wise
text: This is the 2nd time we have used this company, and I have to say that I am very impressed!  The first time was about 10 months ago: we took our son out for his 21st birthday when he came home on leave from the Navy .. now I still to this day can not figure out how the physics on this worked, but driving down 85 from Montgomery to Opelika the alcohol came up.  Head out the window and upchuck, but it somehow managed to not only get EVERYWHERE in the SUV (I am talking back of the headrests, back seats, entire cargo area, and CEILINGS), but also from the front of the car and windshield to the bumper .. and he was in the back seat .. while I was doing 70 mph!! Quite impressive to say the least!  Well, he had the choice to clean it himself, or have it detailed .. he chose detailed (roflmao).  We took it to Pro Car Care and I honestly though there was no way my vehicle would ever be the same .. they proved me wrong!! It looked (and smelled) like it did rolling it off the lot with 10 miles on it!!  The owner, his wife, and all the employees are delightful!!  We just got back from having it detailed again and again I can not rave enough about their work!  Highly recommended!!  Thank you so much for all your attention to detail!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing to come to us Bonnie! We're grateful to help you and your son! We use steam to clean our interiors which offers better results and is known to make your car look as good as new! We're glad our work has impressed you. You can always count on this level of care and detail from us. Let us know if we can help with anything else. -Marcus M., Owner

name: Tiffany Childs
text: I bought my car from a private dealer who had been driving it and apparently had let some boiled eggs roll off the seat and disappear only to be discovered by me the day after purchasing and driving our family down to the beach. We noticed an odor upon purchase but had been masked with a ton of air fresheners. It wasn’t until the smell quickly became unbearable that we discovered the culprit. I wasn’t sure if the smell would ever come out but Marcus, the owner assured me he could get it out and he did! Not only did he basically steam clean the entire car top to bottom, but also detailed everything as if it was brand new again while also cleaning out the air ducts to ensure the quality of air we were breathing was clean and safe. The leather seats are now SOFT and smooth as well as the steering wheel now looks brand new. I cannot thank him enough and would recommend his business to anyone. He works very hard, is incredibly  professional and truly cares about his customers. I will be a forever customer! Thanks, again Pro Auto Care!

name: Brandi Wilson
text: I actually didn't get my car detailed yet, but I want to review the customer service I got when I stopped to talk about the details. I just repossessed a car from my nephew who dirtied up the inside of a brand new car. He used every cubby for an ash tray. The head liner was stained. I need some real detail work and I've seen the great work Pro Car Care puts out. Everyone was awesome! As soon as I pulled up someone greeted me, looked at my car and talked about my biggest concerns with it. He explained what the will do for my goals. I told him the price was a little too much for me at that time. So he kindly bargained with me, talk to his boss too make sure everyone was ok with that. I'll be taking it back next week! He was awesome and kind and seemed to care about my goals also.

name: Gregory Brewer
text: I bought a Tahoe that was so nasty on the inside I would not let my dog in it. The carpet was black and the whole thing was trashed. I dropped it off and told them to do their best and when I went to pick it up I was blown away. I could not believe what a great job they did. The carpet was not black anymore and it looked like a new car. I was amazed at what a great job they did and how nice they were. I will be taking all my cars there in the future.. By far the best car care place ever!

name: marcus ogletree
text: My name is Jackie Johnson of Jackie Johnson Employment Services in Auburn, AL.  I have been using Pro Car Care for several years and they have always done a fantastic job on all my vehicles.  They have always taken the time and effort to ensure that I was happy and satisfied.  I have recommended Pro Car Care to all my friends and colleagues and I can honestly say that everyone is extremely happy.  It is the only company in the Opelika/ Auburn area that I trust, so if you need your car detailed make sure see Marcus at Pro Car Care on Pepperell Pkwy in Opelika, AL.

name: Arnold McCray
text: Very spiritual individual professionals courteous also very loving person.

resp.text: Arnold, thank you for your review! I'm glad that you like our caring service. If you need us again, don't hesitate to reach out! -Marcus M., Owner

name: Austin Bond
text: I have been going here for about a month now and they do a great job, all the guys know what they are doing and the owner is friendly. Best place in the Auburn/Opelika area!

name: Tonya Strickland
text: WORST DETAIL EXPERIENCE EVER!! They apparently used a solution on my rims that was too strong and ruined them!! My rims are clearly corroded from the cleaning solution they used and when i took it back the next day, the manager tried to blame me!! He claimed i brought my car in like that and it was break dust on the rims so i didnt notice the metal was burned off!!! WHO DOES THAT!!!  I drive my vehicle everyday, there is no way i  wouldn't have notice if they looked that bad!!!  I had co-workers that saw my car in the parking lot the next day to call my office and say, "what happened to your car"!!  I took it to a couple other datail shops the same day and they all agreed, the damage done to my rims was new!  There was no rust spots on my rims which would have indicated the corrosion would have already previously been there.  There was dirt under my floor mats where the floor had not even been vacuumed!!!  The seats still had the same spots on them i was trying to have removed and the interior had smudge or residue marks on it!!  I am accustomed to receiving SERVICE when i patronize a business, this mess is ridiculous!!!!  I will personally visit every business i know in town that use this service including my company and show them my reality of having to purchase new rims, and request that they no longer use this service and pull their contracts.

name: LaTonya Burgess
text: Great work car looks and feels new again

name: Jennifer Simmons
text: I will NEVER send anyone to this shop. They are unprofessional and untrustworthy! Didn't care about me the customer and my compaint. My co worker told me about another shop in Opelika  (Auto Shine) chris was outstanding. He made it SHINE again...

name: fortnite aqd rich
text: Did a great job on my care

resp.text: Ellen, there's nothing we love more than giving our customers awesome service! If you ever need anything else, please don't hesitate to get in touch. -Marcus M., Owner

name: Savina Patheja

name: Marcus Hamblin
text: June is by far the best at what he does. He brought my 2011 Benz truck back to life, looked like I just got it off the show room floor. My Guy also did some panic work in my house back in august and it’s still loos so clean like it was just just done. 💪🏽💪🏽💪🏽

resp.text: Thanks for your reply and being a loyal customer

name: Mike Warren
text: Went the Extra mile to make sure we were 100% satisfied.... Highly recommended A++++

resp.text: Thank for your business and review Mike.

name: Grisela Rivera
text: Jeffrey and Grisela has used services from Exclusive Auto detailing and this company rocks, prices are reasonably the work is amazing. 5 stars all day on this company. Most of all they were on time and straight to work, truly amazing and most defenity a company to do business with. Thank you June for making all my vehicles look like they all just came off the dealership lot all over again. Awesome Guys.

resp.text: First and for most thank you for your Buisness and for the awesome review. Thx. Jeffrey and grisela. ..

name: Regina Hodgson
text: I put swirl marks on my black Audi and this man is a magician and got rid of them. Amazing job!! Would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your Buisness Regina/Rick Hodgeson

name: Jessica Devnani
text: Highly recommend Hector!! A gallon  of rotten milk burst in my car, I was in a panic nobody that spoke to was able to help me, as I had leather seat with perforation... finally I called Exclusive Auto Detailing and to my relief Hector was able to handle the job. I will say he worked very hard not stop for 4 hours!! very well worth every penny! Price is super fair!! You won't be disappointed my car looks brand new!! Plus, they pressure washed my badly stained and mildewed walkways and patios making them look like newly poured concrete. From start to finish they were three words — PROFESSIONAL, REASONABLE, and THOROUGH. I have very high expectations for services such as these, and I couldn’t be more pleased. Thank you, CJ’s!

text: I was almost mowed down by an employee. Their blatant disregard for the rules of operating a motor vehicle is sickening. He was on his phone speeding and used no blinker in a construction zone on the interstate and had the audacity to shoot me the bird when I honked to let him know I was on the road. Ridiculous and rude.

resp.text:
Good evening Juana, I want to apologize for the incident earlier. I felt bad for making that Mistake and almost causing an accident. I told my employees I know I scared whoever was in the vehicle and I actually said sorry and threw my hand up (even though you couldn't see me or hear me). I have children too, so I know the feeling even if it wasn't children involved everyone's life is precious and
valuable. I'm sorry for that.  I wasn't on the phone nor was I speeding I was coming on to the highway off the bypass my lane was running out I was near the end a truck had moved over, so I started to move over as well to get on to the highway and you were in my blind spot I didn't see you. I am not a reckless driver nor would I ever risk lives intentionally, i didn't see you in my blind spot I looked twice and was seeing my lane running out, so when the truck moved over to let me in that's when I proceeded to move over not knowing you were back there. I'm happy everyone was and is safe. I do understand your frustration, I would've been to and have been in that situation before. However, I do truly feel you can forgive me for a mistake like I forgave them.

name: Tami Williams
text:
I had my vehicle detailed recently for resale. Interior and exterior detailing was acceptable. Unfortunately, the engine was not touched and tire black polish was used on my tires which caused me to clean my tires, wheels and the exterior of my vehicle when I returned home. For the price ($175)
I expected a little more attention to details.

resp.text: Mrs. Williams I apologize if you weren't happy with your clean up. I explain to customers that we can clean on one vehicle all day and still miss a spot or two... not making excuses, but it happens. I do not clean engines...I don't advertise that I clean engines. With all the electrical and computer components on these vehicles today, if water gets in one of those components it can cause major issues, the liability isn't worth the 10 minutes it takes to clean engines. Again... my apologies.

name: Carlos Thompson
text: We have known Darwin for several years. Over the years he has detailed our Lexus ES 350 to showroom quality which was no small order. We were very pleased with his professionalism and detailing services. When it came time to sell the car we didn’t hesitate to use him. Darwin sold our car much quickly than we ever could have. See him for your next car purchase and all of your automotive detail needs. Believe me, Darwin Harris Automotive Sales and Auto Detailing is the best!

name: Martha May
text: Excellent job on Lexus SUV. Very professional owner and staff. Thanks for such a great job!!

name: Edward Stratton
text:
Mr Darwin is an absolute professional at what he does. I brought my car in for him to clean up and he went way above and beyond what I expected of him.

I went for his best package, he calls it "luxury." And by all means it's not cheap at all, but I feel it was totally worth it.

Mr Darwin takes his time and you can tell he has an obsession for what he does. He was able to pull out stains I've had for years!!!!!

Tip the man, he doesn't disappoint!!!!!!!

Thank you Mr Darwin!!!!!

name: Steven Friedenberg
text: Did an excellent job at a reasonable price  I highly recommend and will use again.

name: Mobile Party Solutions
text: Darwin and his guys did an unbelievable job on my car that I had just bought and needed a serious detail job. You definitely get what you pay for here. He is all about attention to detail! If you want the job done right the first time don’t go any where else!

name: Ruth Finamore
text: Took my car for detail clean , wax, tires, the whole nine yards. When I went to pick it up I didn’t think it was the same car!!  Same day service. Super nice people. And the car was better than new.  Super clean upholstery and every square inch sparkled. Price was right, too. Far better and quicker than the dealership.  Highly recommend.

name: Robert Gibson
text: Had a great experience at Darwin Harris. Got the luxury package which includes a hand wax, carpet shampoo, leather clean and conditioner, and all the expected detail services. My SUV was spotless they even buffed out some light scratches for free. Also had a little dog hair (very little) and they just handled it. Gave a good price on headlight restoration.  So I brought it back the next day. A couple days later brought my wife's car in for the full works. Highly recommended.

name: Jacqueline Brown
text: They did a awesome job! Cleaned up old stains, waxed, washed, shampooed, and much more. My car looks amazing! Better then new

name: James Sayre
text: Dog made a mess all over the back seat floor. They didn’t just do a once over to get what they got, they went over it over and over until it was done right. The owner strives to have each car cleaned like it was his own! Highly recommend!

name: Molly Kirchoff
text: I had my car cleaned today and they did such an amazing job!! My car has not looked like this since I drove it off the lot! Thanks guys!

name: Danielle Stanley
text: I had my inside detailed with my seats and carpets shampooed. I was beyond excited when I picked up my car today. They did a  phenomenal job!!! Mr Darwin was super friendly, professional.

name: Steven Prince III
text: Great customer service and very professional!! Keep up the great work!!

name: Vickie Hauser
text: I’ve had my car detailed here, and they do a fantastic job! Highly recommend!!

name: Steve Butler
text: In my opinion, anyone on the eastern shore who is looking for a clean, sound, late model vehicle should first check with Darwin.  I cannot say enough about my recent, positive experience working with him.  Darwin made it painless to trade in my truck for a sedan.  He also secured excellent financing.  He is a person of honesty and character, and we are fortunate that he does business in our community.

name: James Ekelund
text: When it came time for my teenage daughter to go to college in a larger city some distance away, I wanted to make sure she had safe, dependable and economical transportation. I often passed the Darwin Harris automotive lot. Having done business with Darwin in prior years at a major Eastern Shore dealer, I had grown to know and TRUST Darwin's sincere approach to auto sales and service. BINGO! Darwin is succeeding on his own with the same level of credible and friendly service right in south Fairhope. I found the perfect college vehicle. My daughter drove it through college, married a young man who also thought it was a wise purchase. In fact, he even drove it himself after purchasing his wife a new vehicle in Birmingham. Kudos to Darwin Harris! Do yourself a favor and check out Darwin's fine selection of gently used vehicles, save $$$$$

name: Tyler W
text: Talked to my wife like she was stupid. Told her a price then when she arrived tried to double the price.

resp.text: Every customer that calls requesting pricing over the phone  are given a price based on the type of cleanup they're wanting and the size of their vehicle. They're immediately told that pricing could changed depending on the condition of the vehicle... plus your wife declined to have the vehicle cleaned. I'm sorry if there was any confusion.

name: Denise Googe
text: Awesome.....My car looks shiney and clean. I 100% recommend Darwin Harris!!

name: Mary Lanaux Katzman
text: Very pleased with the service and quality of work! I got the Spruce Up package and added Leather Cleaning and Conditioning. It was the perfect spring cleaning for my car. I have a toddler so my seats were covered with milk splatter and crumbs. They are now so fresh and soft.  Definitely recommend this business. Darwin is a very nice man.

name: Dan and Dawn Hoover
text: Our car came back looking and smelling like new! Great service! Would definitely use again!

name: Cathy Calametti
text: Darwin and his team did an excellent job detailing my 2013 Lexus in 2017, so I decided to have my son's 2005 Tahoe detailed this year for his Birthday. Words cannot describe how bad the interior was.  Somehow they pulled it off and had everything looking and smelling so much better!  Darwin is a true professional, not only in the work that he does, but also in the way he treated me as a customer.  He will definitely have my business in the future!

text: I was shocked at how beautiful my 11y/o Lexus SUV looked after Darwin’s detailing. That car has been through a lot of carpooling and chicken nuggets ~ he made it look new again!

text:
There are not enough words to describe how incredible this place is. I took in an old Honda Accord that had been used for transporting dogs and was COVERED in dog hair. They worked for 9 hours on it (it REALLY was that bad. I couldn’t say enough great things about Darwin and his employees. They are literally miracle workers and are super kind and take their jobs very seriously.  Don’t walk, RUN to Darwin Automotive in Fairhope. They have customers for life with my husband and I. The eastern shore is extremely blessed to have this fantastic business.
❤️❤️❤️

name: Alison Gentry
text: Wish I could give no stars for the rude sales manager and all five stars to Jonathan the salesman. He should be a manager! Very friendly, understanding, and respectful. We made an offer on a truck that was only $900 less than asking price. We also wanted to know trade in value for current car. Jonathan came back and the manager said he wanted full price of sticker and lowballed $2000 less than what the trade in was worth! Did not even give a counteroffer. We thanked Jonathan and said we would keep an eye out for anything else that came up we might like. Super nice guy. As we were about to get up to leave the manager came over and started yelling at us and bashing us for the offer we made! I was shocked! He kept telling us we had no idea how much the truck was worth. The offer we made was reasonable for the truck. We told him he could not give us the numbers we wanted so we were leaving. Yet he kept yelling at us and trying to tell us we were wrong! Terrible customer service. A manager should not yell at two customers telling us we are wrong because of an offer.

resp.text: I am sorry that you feel that way. Financing is provided by financial institutions and sometimes down payment is their requirement to obtain a loan. Please contact Gavin to rework your loan application to see if we can help you.

text: My husband and I just purchased a 2015 Nissan Pathfinder from the amazing folks here at SKCO. name: Melanie Shelly
text:
I found the car I love 2018 Nissan Maxima. I live about an hour and a half away so I really love it!  I did all my negotiating via email and set up a test drive appointment. Very, very, easy sale for the company. My biggest disappointment is the fact that the car was filthy when I arrived and the battery terminals were severely corroded. I am convinced nobody from the service department even looked under the hood until I made them.  I wanted the terminals cleaned,  I wanted an oil change,  all fluids topped off and a cabin air filter change (Very minimal requests for a car dealership) I stated it would have to be detailed inside. The detail department worked on it but they would only be there until 12 or 12:30. So we concluded our business (paid cash) and I went to lunch without the car.  Well by the time I got back the headliner was much cleaner but it smelled terribly in the car (like stagnant mop water). Nothing else was even wiped down and unfortunately the detail department was gone. There was sticky crusted disgusting something in all the buttons so some would stick in certain positions. Literally the battery terminal was only brushed with a wire brush to knock off the corrosion. I don't think the oil was changed. When I got home the oil did not appear new. I think they put new on top of the old then they mixed together. The cabin air filter was not changed. I removed it to check because everytime I used recirculated air instead of fresh it smelled bad. It has a new one now and it no longer has an odor.

My salesman was okay, but seriously the easiest commission ever. Wish I would have at least gotten an after the sale phone call. Just to check in. Would have made me feel better about the other issues.

My complaints are only directed to the service and detail departments.

I am now looking for a truck in the $20,000 range (same as my Maxima) and I am not even looking at this company now.

The only complaint I have is I had to come back and replace the windshield wipers a few times because they fell apart, the third time I had to come in and get them replaced there was an older woman named Monica in there that didn’t greet me or ask the situation the only words to come out of her mouth were “They need to figure out why because we aren’t replacing them again”.

Now if youre in any kind of business establishment you don’t talk like this to ANY customer, I wasn’t rude I came in and happily took the other guys opinion on why this might keep happening, she needs to learn how to deal with her attitude in a business setting.

name: Alicia Goings
text: My husband and I had to replace our car after an accident. We were reccomend Skco by our family, and we were not disappointed. Victor was the gentleman who helped us and was absolutely wonderful! He went above and beyond (everyone here is amazing). There was some minor issues with the tinting of the car we purchased, so they are taking it off free of charge and have given us a referral to get it redone. They are also replacing the battery free of charge!! I will always come and see Victor or the staff of Skco when I need to buy a new or used car!

But nothing but problems from this vehicle an to NO avail has Skco tried to help out with the issues it's having NOW. Way to go SKCO, keep selling those LEMONS an somebody will get a sour taste in there mouth.

text: I had an amazing buyers experience with the crew at Skco automotive. I have been looking for a truck for weeks and could not find exactly what I wanted. He had no problem letting me drive where I wanted and test the trucks as I wished.NO PRESSURE WHATSOEVER. I was even hearing what I thought to be something with a truck of interest, Bobby and the crew immediately sent the truck into the shop and informed me of the outcome. (They greased some joints on inspection, no issues afterwards) I hope more people can experience car buying as I Did at Skco with Bobby and Riz. Thanks guys!

Completely satisfied and impressed!
My Fiance and I are the proud owners of a 2018 Toyota Camry that's in mint condition with extremely low miles thanks to SKCO and especially our salesman Bobby! We were both treated amazing and taken care of like we were the only customers the dealership had. We found our dream car, test drove it, ran some numbers, came to an agreement and were out in record time. I recommend SKCO to anyone searching for a new car or truck and expecially recommend asking for Bobby as soon as you walk through the doors!!

name: Sid smith
text: I purchased my 2012 toyota4runner from them. It was very clean and had a great experience at the dealer. They were very friendly and gave me a great deal. The best thing is they had just about every make and models there that I was looking for. I recommend this dealer. Came back and bought a 17 Sierra. Still great experience.

name: Cameron Martin
text:
I was at SKCO Automotive today. I had been there for almost 5 hours. My salesman was actually a nice  man, so i have absolutely nothing bad to say about him.  After going through this ridiculous process of trying to prove my income for 2-3 hours and trying to be put in a car  the finance company wanted me to have. I was exhausted, over it and ready to leave. As if that wasn’t enough, someone decided to make a big deal out of nothing. My children went ahead of me and went to the door. They were holding the door for each other and then was holding it for me, waiting for me to catch up and come out. Before I got to the door they were approached by a lady. She told my children to either go out the door or go find their moma or daddy and they they were letting the air out. I was appalled!! I asked her what was the problem. I asked her name and she mumbled something and I asked her again and she told me she didn’t owe me an explanation!!  Come to find out she was the owner. The salesman walked up to me try to find out what was going on. She began to butt in, so then the gentleman walked me out the door to discuss it. it started to rain, he offered to grab an umbrella for me. We make our way into the building and the owner runs up to the salesman and tells him he is her employee and He better not walk me out the door. How pathetic and nasty can a human be over nothing!!
I’m sick of people  acting ignorant for no reason towards me. So needless to say I left all deals on the table and vowed to make it known that I would never spend a dime with a company that doesn’t value my business or dollar. So it’s above me now!!

And so far from what I hear the cars are junk! A friend of mine bought a van and the alternator went out 2 days after she purchased it.

Oh and if you plan on buying a car using your business name don’t waste your time. Apparently they don’t know how to process those sales!

text: I was looking for a newer car so i went to Skco automotive in Mobile, Al. When I went there I went to my niece salesman and told him what I was looking for and what I wanted and I had a trade in. Everything that I wanted it was always a problem with what the financial department would finance he kept saying. I wanted a 2011 or 2012 Toyota Avalon or a 2 door 2013 Honda accord. The salesman kept trying to put me in 2015 or 2016 vehicle and that wasn't what I wanted. The salesman was real pushy and not at all patient. I left from there with a 2016 Camry, the same one he threw in my face as the 1st car I drove even though I told him I hated those Camry. In the end he wound up giving me a car i absolutely hate. He made sure he got a good commission off of me, in spite of what I told him I like and wanted. I will take my other family members to another car lot instead of this one. So now I'm going to go to my father, God mother, God sisters, sisters, and lil brother and God daddy, who are all ministers, and plead with God to reverse this curse that was done to me and make a way out of no way to get the car I want. This is so sad and disgusting to be taken advantage of like this. Should have went next door to the dealership the carsaleman  told me not to go to and get a car i wanted .

text: I am so happy with my black sonata I brought from this dealership. After having a bad experience at SUNCOAST AUTO (DON'T GO THERE!!!); I had to get a new car, I came here and got the car I wanted. I've had my sonata for 3 years now and I love it. My next car purchase will be from this dealership and nowhere in mobile. Jeremy, I think that's his name, was great he took care of all my needs. Everyone was so nice and they took their time and didn't force me into a car I didn't like just because I can make the payments. I like this place a lot.

name: Lezah Presley
text: For anyone shopping around for a new or used vehicle I definitely recommend SKCO Automotive. They have a brand new facility, the greatest and most respectful salesmen I've ever met. The managers there try their hardest to make sure they get you the best rates and best deal to fit your wants and needs. They have highly trained mechanics to help with any mechanical problems you might need, and the service department will make sure everything is done quickly and properly. Don't even get me started on their detail department, wow, that's the only word that comes to mind when I think of how clean and detailed my car was when I purchased it. When you come to SKCO Automotive your greeted by a wonderful team of experts whose sole purpose is to have you leave in the vehicle you wanted and happy that you chose their establishment. My family has been buying vehicles from SKCO for many years and we'll always come back. It's great to be able to come back and see the same people that continue to help you each time. Thank you everyone at SKCO.

name: Michael Hudson
text: The only reason I gave it 1 star is the sales agent Bobby. He found me a truck i liked and tried his best to help me get it. But the guy over him I think is Tim or Tom. The first day I went he told me the truck had to go through Service inspection but it shouldn't affect the price because the price HE put on the truck gave him more than enough room for repairs. When I went back the next day the truck was going to cost a lot more than it should have. He set up the price to be 15,000 out the door at 8% interest. Now here's the kicker. My wife's car was 16,000 at 8% interest and skco wanted to charge me $30 more a month than what my wife pays. The math doesn't add up. Most the vehicles are preowned, damaged and way overpriced. Save your money and go elsewhere.

name: Amanda Unrue
text:
Buying a car wasn't bad.  But they have this policy of holding the spare keys until you pick up your paperwork.  I informed them that I was going to be moving and might not be in town to pick up the spare key.  The guy who was doing my paperwork said that he would mail it to my new address(even though that is apparently against policy).  The paperwork arrived in the mail, but the spare key never did.  I called them back to check the status of that and they are now saying that they have no record of a spare key but that I can bring the car into the dealership, pay them about $400, and they'll make a new key.  So now some random person has the spare key to my car, which I find a little sketch.
**As a side note, it is my opinion that the office manager is incredibly incompetent and rude.

name: James Wilson
text: I came into SKCO Automotive to buy a Nissan Sentra that I seen online. the salesperson, a Mr. Billy Keene, informed me of an issue with this particular car. He showed me evidence that it was in need of service, however minor, before it could be sold. He actually took the car to the service department and fussed at the service manager telling him that, "I have a man here to buy this car and you all could have had this ready a week ago." Billy persisted until the service department took care of the issue. He and I sat while they took care of the issue and I found him to be very astute about all sorts of subjects regarding cars and how financing works. He took time with me he did not have to take. He also made it possible that the car that i wanted was serviced before I left in it a few hours later. I cant say enough about this salesman, and also about the sales manager, a Mr. Joe. The Dealership as a whole was easy to deal with and Billy and Joe were actually able to get me out the door $500 less than the advertised price. If you need a good quality vehicle, i highly recomend SKCO, and really recomend dealing with Billy.

text:
I paid for a gift card and scheduled an appointment which was never rendered. There was no call or no show. I found out that the business had closed down and no longer in service, as well as the number listed is not associated with this company anymore.

The person that left a comment that she had a great experience 2 months ago is not telling the truth. This place is no longer at that location, I checked it out and I also left several messages unresponsive. I have a gift card I cannot use. If she has a location for this business please share it or remove your false post. Thanks!

text: These guys are fantastic.  I used them for a pre-owned BMW x5 I bought that needed a little love.  Courteous, professional, and work fast.  Had the vehicle looking almost new in an hour. text: I am so impressed! My car looks better than when I bought it!  I even had dried slime putty my kids left in the backseat and it looks like new!!!!

name: Stephanie Key
text: These guys are awesome!! They picked up and returned my car exactly when they said they would. Each person that spoke to me was friendly and very professional. They made this so easy for me by bringing a tablet and accepting a credit card, and they did a fantastic job on my interior. It was a mess. It blew me away what they were able to do. Thanks, guys!

name: Dawn Carignan
text: I gave a one star because it would not allow me to not select at least one of them. I went online to schedule an appointment and got an email stating that they are reviewing my request and I would get another email confirming my appointment. Well I still haven't gotten an email and my scheduled appt was 38 minutes ago. No call no show no nothing. I don't know if there is an issue with the company or the scheduling online. I did call the number on my email and left a voice mail at 9:30 this morning. At 1:30 I got a text from that number saying wrong number. I will NOT be scheduling with this place again. I will use someone else if this is how you conduct your business.

name: Megan S
text: Cannot say enough good things about this place. The nicest staff, they work fast and efficient and my car is always beautiful! I tell friends and co-workers to go here because it is the best place around for car detailing. Thank you for the best service!

name: Zachary Hamm
text: Wanted to just give a quick run down of how attention to detail is a top priority with the guys here at Rocket City. They turned our 3 year old SUV (never been properly detailed) with wear and tear of two kids back to better than showroom shine. Went with the full detail including the engine clean and again was not disappointed. Can't say enough about these guys and will be making the drive back after the winter season in the south.

name: ShannonKay
text: They won’t answer the phone or Facebook messages or email back.

name: Aaron Keen
text: I received a gift card for an interior detail and now I wish I would have used it sooner! Do not let the location of this shop fool you! The service that I received was amazing and I definitely will return. I forgot to show the gentleman that cleaned my car what I was considering to be my worry spots, when I got my car back he clearly saw the same spots that I was seeing and the inside of my car looks brand new! Definitely check them out.

name: Erika Brooks
text: I'm by no means an expert at auto detailing so I'm unsure how to rate properly BUT when I received my car, I thought it looked very clean and well done. I was getting my car ready to sell so I got the complete detail. The vacuuming was very nice. The only places I saw any kind of debris were some spots under the seats that would require removing the seat in order to clean and that is unrealistic. The wash, wax, and wipe down of everything was nicely done. The seats were shampooed and the cleaning of the seats were great but I would suggest getting a plastic film to put on the seats in case they are still damp. Mine were slightly moist (which I understand they won't completely dry in 4 hours) and when I got home my clothes were also a little moist but this isn't a rating breaker for me. I have a white dog that sheds a lot so I was impressed that they were able to clean the car well enough to where I only saw a couple of straggler hairs around the car. The only thing I did not like was when I got there at 7:00 am, I was greeted by an employee that had no idea about my appointment so I had to re-explain everything and that wasn't a professional first impression in my eyes. Other than that, I think the car turned out great!

name: Stephanie Newton
text:
I have never been to Rocket City Buffing & Auto Detailing or had my car professionally cleaned. I called ahead of time to ask some questions and spoke to Sylvester. He answered all of my questions and was very polite.

When I arrived, the staff were all friendly and I left my car to have a full detail. I was very happy with the results! The car is super shiny! I had a lot of old stains in the seats and they were able to get most of them out and the others look much lighter. They even removed tar stains from underneath the car that had been there for over a year without me asking for it first. The interior is spotless and the wax looks awesome! They even cleaned the engine compartment and the wheel well.

I have already recommended them to my friends and will definitely be back! Thanks!

name: Siddharth Patel
text:
Sylvester and his buddy did a very good job in cleaning interior and exterior of my car. When I raised a concern regarding my car headlights a couple of days after my car was taken care of, they took it back for redoing it and returned with better results. Very soft spoken and responsive. They provided car pick up and delivery services.

I would definitely go back there whenever I need their service next time.

Why I took 1 star off: A very minor residual stains in the interior of roof and passenger seat (which could very well be resistant to cleaning). But overall, a very good job.

name: Cindy Green
text: Talking about going the extra mile... I called from out of state to see about a gift card for my son which can be nerve wracking when you think about giving your credit card info to a place you don't know. I was also concerned about how I could get it to him in time for his birthday in 3 days. But I was so thrilled when Sylvester offered to hand deliver to my son's home (10 miles away) which he did on his birthday with a balloon no less.  Puts my faith back into humanity. Thanks again Sylvester, I hope your boss is reading this.

name: Dan Plummer
text:
I saw Jim detailing a car in our apartment complex while I was walking our dog, Stanley. Jim's work on the neighbor's car looked great, and Stanley liked Jim right off the bat, too.

So I made an estimation appointment with Jim, and I really loved the price that he quoted for the interior, exterior, engine bay, trunk, and headlights on my 2003 Honda Accord.

I was thrilled at the price, so we made an appointment for him to come back and detail the car.

Wow!

I thought I had permanently scratched away the gloss on my headlights years ago when I used an abrasive cleaner to remove the bugs: Jim got them shining like new.

I thought the I-should-never-have-worn-these-dark-blue-jeans-without-washing-them-first dye in the front driver seat was permanent: Jim got it out.

I though whatever those tiny little black dots on the roof that won't come off had defeated me: Jim got rid of them.

And those were how he handled the tough spots. He got rid of the years old ink in the backseat from someone's lost pen; he nailed all the makeup spots--I can't give this guy enough praise.

The fact that it's waterless is icing on the top.

Thanks, Jim. The 12-year-old car looks new.

resp.text: Dan - thanks for the kind words!  Jim

text:
I bought a used Tundra that had been worked out of for 8 years. It showed. The paint was scratched, worn looking, and dull. The interior was completely covered in a film of dirt. The leather was worn and hard. The engine was covered in dirt and sticks. This truck had probably never been cleaned.
I brought it to Auto Shine after looking around Auburn for places to get it detailed, comparing prices, services, etc. In my opinion there is no other place anyone should get a vehicle detailed.
Chris completely restored the paint, got a majority of the scratches out, and it shines as if it were a brand new truck. The work he did to bring the exterior back to life was incredible. The interior looks spotless, the leather refurbished and soft. Everything about the truck looked great. I didn't know it was possible to make an old vehicle look this new again! Chris is very passionate about his work, pays great attention to detail, and all at a very reasonable price. I will be bringing my truck back up there to get the headlights restored soon.

text: The service rendered by Tsunami Pressure Washing company was second to none with outstanding work ethics, professionalism, and expediency. My gutters can really breathe, now! Will hire again!

text: I am so happy with the job Martez did at my home. I was hit by the March 25th tornado and had to get a new roof and gutters. Thought I was going to have to paint the soffits. But after Martez was done doing his magic they look as good as new! Very professional and on time. I highly recommend this company and will use them again. Don't hesitate to use this company! Thank you again Martez!

text: I was very pleased with the service provided. My house looks so much better. I also had the driveway, patio, and the shed in my back yard cleaned. This was a very professional process from beginning to end and I will use them again.

name: Maci Cobble
text: Service was awful very unprofessional when my home dried it was dirt still on my home. When I called to express my concern he cursed me out and yelled and also over talked me. Told me had to educate me like I was a child. When I asked could he comeback he told me NO!! Or give me half of my money back he refuse. Remind you he was 5hrs late from my appointment time. I refuse to use service again and do not recommend his business to anyone.

resp.text:
Hello Ms. Cobble,
Throughout our 10 years of being in business our company has always maintained a professional standard in conduct and workmanship. The interaction that you have detailed is very contrary to what our records indicate. While our technician did arrive late due to some issue with our equipment, he in fact communicated same.  At the time, you indicated that, that was in fact ok.
Whenever we engage prospective customers whether over the phone or in person we always go over their expectations i.e. what they want cleaned and how they would like to see it look. We are then able to guide their expectations based on our own expertise. In your interaction with our technician, Martez, he indicated that your home was in fact badly oxidized and that with pressure washing it may become more evident in some parts than others. He further explained that oxidation is not caused by pressure washing  but in your case it was because of aging paint.  At the end of the service, you indicated that everything was in fact 5 star quality and you did leave a 5 star review to indicate such. It is therefore, quite unsettling that weeks later, you would call making such accusations about our professionalism and conduct thus purposely defaming our company.
With that said, we cannot stand responsibility for an issue for which our workman was not culpable. We are truly sorry that we were not able to come to an amicable resolution.

name: Kyle Nichols
text: Martez and his team are professional and quick, he did a bid for me, I signed it, and they were here the next afternoon.  They were polite and courteous to my wife and let me know when they were done.  Will definitely be calling him again.

name: L Mcc
text:
Testimonial:

Tsunami pressure washing transformed my two houses from dull, almost unnoticeable dwellings, to becoming the standouts on our block. Tsunami pressure washed my brick home, the driveways, and sidewalks. Who knew that we would become two of the most beautiful homes on the block. Our houses which both sit on the corner are head turners because of Tsunami. They are now turning the heads of neighbors, visitors, and passing cars because of the clean, beautiful, and stately appearance of our properties. Tsunami is our only choice for pressure washing. Tsunami's service moved our property from diamond in the rough to two very precious jewels.The proof is in the outcome...sheer perfection. I recommend Tsunami to transform your personal residences or your investment properties. They will give your property the face-lift it deserves to sell or rent quickly, or to just personally enjoy. Thank you Tsunami for such a great job.

L. McCauley
Formidable Group LLC

name: Shanna Turner
text: Mr. Martez and his crew did a fantastic job on our van! It looked like a brand new car when he finished. I have use them three times and every service is top notch. Highly recommended!

resp.text: Hi Shanna. Thanks for the great review. We are happy you were pleased with our service. We hope to see you soon.

name: Kimberly Beatty
text: They're the nicest & most respectable guys. They were on time & they did fantastic work. I would recommend them anytime.

I love doing business with local, small business's and 4 Lane Auto Sales is exactly why!
I had a great experience renting a car form them in every way. Customer service, i.e. Amber, was excellent. I was treated with respect and she did a thorough job of making me understand everything I needed to know.
The car was a Mercury Gran Marquis and provided amble room for everyone that we wished to ride in it. Mechanically it was top notch.
Pick up was on time and drop off is easy with their well marked lot.
Deposit was returned very promptly and you can't beat the price.
I will use them again if I ever find myself in the area, and highly recommend anyone else use them also.

name: Lucas Hester
text:
I feel here in the south, detailing standards are different from other regions, and people's satisfaction seems to rest more on the emotional / religious than the quality of work. So here's a more objective review:

Out of the detail shops in Mobile, AL, this is -currently- the one I recommend. The staff is professional and courteous, but more importantly, they speak with you at-length about the services you want, your ultimate expectations, and what can be realistically done. Goals are established up-front, and you leave knowing what to anticipate, and the final cost.

I brought in a 2011 Hyundai Sonata GLS with tan cloth interior to have a full interior detail performed, but with a focus on getting the seats as clean as possible; all other matters were secondary as far as I was concerned. They were familiar with the type of cloth material used and warned me up front that there was a good chance they couldn't get them back to perfection, but that when they were finished, they would be as clean as is reasonably possible. In the end, they were right: the seats came out still looking a bit dingy, but clean enough you could eat off them. That's all I could ask for.

I did, however, have a bit of an issue with the UV protection performed on the plastics in the interior: The panels were left looking greasy, slick to the touch, and with smear stains on smoother plastics. I had to go over certain areas with a microfiber cloth to remove the excess, especially the pedals, which were slick enough to pose a danger while driving. I understand in this region, there is an appeal for glossy interior finishes, but coming from a background of using matte-finish UV protection on the regular, buffed dry as instructed, this seemed like a sub-par job. Still, I couldn't find one area missed, and that speaks volumes about their attention to detail.

In all, I was satisfied, and would certainly consider giving them my business again. Will probably try their exterior detail next!

name: Randall Pequeen
text: I don't leave many reviews but felt I should here. I had my Camaro cleaned and detailed for a car show. NOBODY touches my car. I had no time for this show so I trusted these guys to do it. I could not be happier. Car was who ready. I'll use them again.

resp.text: Thanks Randy!!!! Hope you got first place!!!!

name: Paul Sapoch
text: Brett and Destiny are Awesome!!!! Brett has done all my work. There detail packages a bar none! I highly recommend not only getting the detail and wax but go the extra step and do the paint sealant!!! You will not be disappointed!!!! They also impressed me with the ability to remove hard water deposits out of my windows and also in the paint. No matter how many times you wash and wax your vehicle, you can not get those water spots from acid rain out of your windows or your paint. It will always be there. They will go over and beyond what is required. I had a water leak coming into the cab of my truck and the lengths Brett went to find not one but two leaks was remarkable! There is not a company in Mobile that would ever take the time and patience to find such leaks. He had to take fenders, dash, battery, and other items to expose the fire wall just to find the sources of my water problem. They truly are Heros in my book. Working with them is like working with your best friend. They make you feel great when you leave because you know you got the best work for your money.

name: Jenna Nicole
text: Melvin’s was truly a very good surprise! After calling and no one answering for weeks looking for someone to detail both my husbands and my car, we were greated with a gentleman signing “melllvvvinns” on the phone. That has me immediately happy. He told us to be there by 10:30 this morning. We got there and they were busy but took both our cars, we traded them out, when one was done we brought the other one back. They had my husbands filthy car cleaned in 3 hours and had it looking shiny and brand new. I was shocked for them to get out all the years of stains and grime! I then gave them my car and was also pleased with the work. It was shiny as well and sparkling clean. The prices are truly AMAZING! If I was Melvin, I would UP those prices because it’s almost a steal for all the beautiful work they do. Mr. Melvin I learned is a Pastor and drives some miles to preach on Sunday mornings, he seems so happy and kind! I was very impressed, actually overly impressed with the work and the time it took. I hope everyone gives this place a real chance and they will truly be in awe. What a great find in the Shoals area. Wow!

text:

resp.text:
Thanks, Todd, for taking time to leave a review!  We have good news that we hope will earn us that 5th Star! ; )
We actually do offer interior clean-up packages.  Instead of using the Auto Attendant, just stop in front on the booth and let the “Human Attendant” (who works in the booth) know that you want an “In & Out Package.”  The Attendant will put a small ticket on your dash that lets the guys & gals at the end of the Tunnel know exactly which “In & Out Package” you have purchased.  Our basic package includes wheel polishing. : )
We sincerely appreciate your kind words and your business!!

If John is unavailable, the Concierge will take your contact information and John will return your call.  Again, we hate that you were not completely satisfied, but look forward to making it up to you.

text: Terrible - Warn Everyone, RUN AWAY - Small hole in the tint the first time, I told them immediately, they said come back the Sunday. Well, this time they cut it too short and there is a gap at the bottom. They said come back Wednesday when they get tint in again. I just went there, they refused to fix it unless I pay them again. Blamed me for buying the wrong tint. I asked first, Advance Auto, they said yes and could have asked me to exchange in on Monday if there was a problem with it. The problem is HE cut it wrong, there is a gap at the bottom. He said he didn't have time to deal with this. Also, the other window also has scratches and a bubble at the bottom, but that seems really minor at this point.
