text: My husband had my windows tinted at a birthday gift. There was lots of bubbles & debris between the glass and the tint on all the windows that were done. I took the vehicle back to be fixed within the 14 day replacement period. Upon arrival I entered the garage because the front door was locked and a sign on the door said to enter garage if door was locked. The owner was nice until I said I needed repairs done. At this time he started to yell at me and state that I was not allowed in the garage. He also said that there would always be bubbles and imperfections in the tint and that "nothing is perfect!". He refused to do any work to fix their mistake unless I paid more money and made an appointment for another day. He then threatened to call the cops on me when I said he should honor his work and make it right. Needless to say I left very upset and will NEVER do business with them again. Beware if you go to have work done!!

name: Loretta Mitchell
text: I need my truck detailed badly and I have been searching online to review my options.  I was quite interested in hiring you for your services, that is until I began reading the reviews-which I ALWAYS do. I have to say "Mr. Owner," you clearly say that "Mr. Lamont" is mentally ill and falsely accusing you and your employees of poor customer service...however, if you have taken the time to read the reviews of your previous customers, you would plainly see the unbelievable number of dissatisfied individuals. With that being said "Mr. Owner," it is almost mathematically impossible to that many unhappy customers without there being any validity and truth to what's being said. So, regardless of how well your business may or may not be doing, I strongly recommend that you listen to your consumers and work on how you treat the individuals that CHOOSE to grace you with their business and their money! ijs...

resp.text: We do about 2000 details a year and in doing so its sad to say you cannot satisfy everyone also we recieve about 25 bad reviews out of 2000 which is mathematicslly 98% good so if u wish to use us please do so or if you wish to listen to people who have a bad experience everywhere they go then so be it god bless you

name: Strictly Indy
text: This place messed up my tint on my 2015 nissan. Left windows up for 5 days just to assure it was dry.. The drying was no problem for me as I have other cars to drive. Once I let tint down, very shocked. No the tint didn't slide because it's totally dry. The problem is the cutting is awful. Not Acceptable. I'm sure a 1st grader could cut better than this. I called the guy because this business has tinted other cars for me but when they was in the old building next door, He wasn't the one I did business with In past. No big deal, maybe I have came out  a day the boss is going to do my car instead of a worker. Talked good to get my payment... but now that I call him and ask that he look at my car when I bring down. He started screaming at me. And told me no you can't bring your car down, deal with it, do what you have to do... I was very shocked. Bad customer service and to be honest the way he was screaming. Anyone would be scared to take car down now. He not willing to look at or fix... but since he was running business on a cell phone, I went ahead and sent the photos so he could see his job and skills is awful....

name: Tonika Holmes
text: Worst place to go. My wife wanted her windows tinted professionally and got shade tree service. There were bubbles underneath the tint. The inside back rear window tint is hanging down  from where he tired to remove the bubbles by using some tool but, he only made it worst. The owner was very unprofessional and degrading. I wouldn't refer no one to the company. 1-Day Tint 1.4 miles West of University will be a much better choice. Especially if you want 100% Satisfaction and Great Customer Service.

name: Cameron Grace
text: I had windows tinted on May 29.  First indication I should have left was when the price in person increased from the phone price. I went ahead anyway.  They ran my vehicle the entire time while working (1 1/2 hrs) even after my request not to do so. Their explanation was the battery would discharge otherwise.  I have had numerous vehicles tinted and have never incurred this problem.  Upon inspection, many ares of small bubbles were noted.  They insisted they were water bubbles and said they would go away. I returned on June 4 to address the bubbles that remained.  The employee still insisted they were air bubbles and to give a few more days.  I returned on June 13 (my next opportunity).  The man in charge asked for my receipt and said that I was past my warranty for replacement and there was nothing he would do.  I would not recommend this shop simply because they do not stand behind their work.  I had returned (June 4) within the warranty time frame (14 days) and they sent me away insisting the problem would go away.  The problem remains.  All they want is your money, not your business.  I wish I would have received the same service the other review received.  Go elsewhere!

text: This place of business is the reason why the black community does not support black owned and black ran businesses their work and customer service is awful. I took my vehicle over to this business to get my tint professionally done I dropped my car off and was called by the man who was doing it 20 mins later asking if I could go pick up another roll of tint this is after I had already paid $190 I went ahead and did as he instructed and he finshed the work and it was dark by the time he completed so I couldnt see how the completed worked looked like so the next morning I went out and looked at it and it was awful the film was cut 2 short and in some areas it wasnt completely covering the window I contacted the guy who gave me my receipt which says lifetime warranty and 14days replacement he initially said he would correct the problem even went so far as texting me inappropriate text  expressing his interest in me when he seen that my interest was only to get my tint corrected he then became very disrespectful and refused to correct the problem he also explained that the 14day replacement only covers his labor the customer has to replace the film themselves and the lifetime warranty only covers bubbles I proceeded to go to the business to speak with the owner and was told that the tint business is not a part of the company she runs a detail shop and she allows her brother to use her shop as for his Mobile tinting business so she could not help get my service corrected so I would not recommend this business to no one in the city their work is awful!!!!!!!!!

name: Henry Seright
text: This was the worst experience I have ever had at any automotive accessory shop. On 3 July I took my GS350 to have the tint removed from my rear glass and have it replaced with ceramic tint that I purchased from tintzoom online for $200.00. When I arrived the owner and I agreed on a price of $190.00 to do all window with the exception of the left front and left rear (I had already installed it) with the tint I supplied. Having done over 50 tint jobs at a reputable local shop while in college (10 years ago) I know the proper way of installing tint, but being a little rusty I decided to take it to a professional to ensure the tint was removed properly (Steamer or Ammonia and Black Bag). After pulling the car into the shop to start the job I noticed the CARWASH DETAILER with a razor blade hacking at the tint in the rear window. I immediately asked him to stop and asked the owner to take over before he ruin the rear glass defroster. I then left with my ride that was waiting (big mistake) and had him take me to the bank to get cash for the job.  When I returned my car was supposedly ready. I looked at my rear package and it was covered with tint scrapings and my defrost lines were no longer black they were gold (as in no longer working from scraping with a razor). I also noticed that my 3rd brake light was torn to pieces, and there were several pieces of tint left on the window with new film laid on top of it. Soon after I spoke with the manager to inform him of my displeasure with the services rendered. The first thing I asked the owner about was my 3rd brake light and his answer was “We had to break it to put the film on.” The second was my defroster his response was” We had to get the tint off.” The third issue with this humbling experience was the patches of old tint eft on the window with new tint installed over it, in which I received no response from the owner. My response to the owner was “I am not paying for this,” so he decided to vacuum some of the tint from the rear package tray and reduce the price to $165.00 since he broke my $250.00 3rd brake light. After I still refused to pay we both called the police (Little did he know I was on the phone with a good friend who is deputy chief of police). So between the times the police arrived he decided to rip the tint off the windows and throw my $200.00 ceramic tint in the trash, despite his wife warning him not to. When the police arrived he lied about ripping the tint off and even said I didn’t bring any tint to him and stated that he supplied the tint. After looking at the car the officer asked why is there just tint on the driver side windows, I stated that is because those were the windows I did myself. To end the story the officers did nothing (OF COURSE) and stated it was a civil matter which is probably true. Long story short I am out $568.49 to replace the rear glass to get my defrosters back (plus installation), $200.00 for the ceramic tint that he decided to rip from the window and throw in the trash, and $250.00 for my 3rd brake light the he tore up. PLEASE do not go to the poor established called Customized Auto Detail & Window Tinting or you will receive a humbling experience like mine.

I then called the number on front of the building and this Tyrone character answered. This fool said "you should have just walked in the front and asked for help". I told him I did they told me to wait on you. I went back into garage they told me to wait again. Then this idiot Tyrone called me back 3 times! "Get the f@$k out my shop" blah blah. I told him why are you calling me I already told you I don't want your bussiness bye. The owner is an idiot. I wouldn't go there for a window tint if he said he would pay me. Enter at your own risk.

name: S Colbert
text:
I was a first time customer to Elite Car Spa. I took my vehicle here as recommended by a trusted friend. I purchased the highest level service they provided (well over $200), a "full detail" as they said. I had my vehicle there a full day with no pressure to have it done at any certain time, as i wouldn't be able to pick it up until i was out of work, well after they had closed. Upon arrival to pick it up, I was immediately concerned. It seemed as if they overlooked quite a few obvious areas. The front-end still had smashed insects and debris on it that easily came off with my fingernail. That lead me to look even closer. Using a flashlight, I noticed quite a few areas where wax was never removed, where hopefully condensation, and not unrinsed soap, dripped down, leaving behind hazy but obvious lines across the paint. The interior of my vehicle was outstanding, with the exception of the entire front winshield being ignored and unclean. I am just disappointed. I apologize in !
advance for not having enough faith in this shop to bring my vehicle back there, even for them to correct these issues. I do believe that this may be the best place in town for a basic car wash, but i would not reccomended them to someone expecting expertly trained, skillful, adept work or to even get what they paid for. Even if they in fact paid for the best the have to offer.

resp.text:
We're sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the services provided.
There are several issues you addressed. Unfortunately, we dont have an S.Colbert in our customer database making it difficult to know what vehicle you are referring to and unable to review your account.
We're glad you were pleased with the interior work done in your vehicle. As for exterior work, bugs can etch into your clear coat and without having your vehicle buffed it would seem rough. Picking up your vehicle at night, when condensation builds up, does make it difficult to see.  Not to say there wasn't an issue as we are human. However, we pride ourself on our work and professionalism.
We love feedback from our customers. On rare occasions when a customer is not satisfied we do go above and beyond to make sure to rectify any issues. It is unfortunate you don't feel comfortable enough to bring your vehicle back to us as we would have done everything we could to make sure you were 100% satisfied.
We are far more than a basic car wash and our staff is trained and quite skilled.
We hope you call and give us an opportunity to rectify this situation.

I am not sure if Ricky is still there but I wasn't able to talk to him at any point during this visit. It is a shame that someone would take items from the vehicles they are responsible for but when I asked about the missing items I was told they were not there. Just the hitch cover is $115 plus the body shop cost to paint to match the Yukon. I am sure I can find another detail shop that is honest and does as good of a job.

This issue was resolved - Ricky saw my review and, as I expected he would, corrected the situation. Since they do remove everything from your vehicle prior to detailing I would recommend not leaving anything inside. There is always a possibility that something can get lost or misplaced.
Thank you Ricky

name: Jane Frink
text:
Booked an appointment to have my car detailed ($200 detail package) and received text and email confirmation of my appointment. It had lightly rained early in the morning and was overcast but hadn't rained for hours. I didn't receive any notification that the car wash was closed so I called the phone number included in the text confirmation to confirm it was open; no answer ringing was followed by a message indicating no voice mail box had been set up. The message didn't even indicate it was for the car wash so I checked the number on the website and dialed again - same result; no answer, no voice mail box. Without confirmation that the car wash was closed and no cancellation notice received, I drove 20 minutes to get to my appointment on time (12:00 noon) only to find that the facility was shut down and dark. The restaurant inside the building was open and the gentleman there advised the car wash was indeed closed. He offered to make a call to see if he could find out about my appointment, but no one answered his call either. I understand that car washes close in inclement weather and I would have gladly rebooked my appointment for another day. But to close and not notify patrons who have scheduled an appointment is unconcionable and bad business practice. With so many other car wash options in the area, they should do a better job to try to keep their clientele. I will still have my car detailed, just not at this car wash. If I can't trust them to send a cancellation, I'm sure not going to trust them with my car.

Update: just received a text and an email confirming a new detailing appointment for next week. Thing is, I didn't reschedule. Awfully presumptuous to assume 1. that I want to reschedule, and 2. that the day and time rescheduled would even work for me.

resp.text: we are trying to get hold of online appointment  system..... please e mail us at riverchasecarwash786@gmail.com to reschedule as per your availability or call us at 205-566-6730 to redeem the special discount on full interior detail

name: Allie Taylor
text:
Hate to leave a bad review, but maybe it will help improve service. I arrived and paid at 4:45, and was through the automated car wash and in line at the full service lane within 10 minutes, with one car in front of me. It was a full hour before my car made it up to the station to be cleaned. The length of time doesn’t bother me so much as the fact that the lanes were moving at very different speeds. This meant 6 people who arrived after me (one an hour after I did) still got their cars finished first. I understand that the lanes cannot move at the same speed, as not every car takes the same amount of time to clean, but it was very frustrating to watch so many people arrive and leave before my car was even started. I’d highly recommend keeping the cars in a single file line so they can move forward as spots open up rather than trapping them in a lane that isn’t moving. I will potentially give this place another chance, but will definitely be requesting the left lane if I do so! Additionally, it would be great if you could place an ATM inside. Before I became dissatisfied with the service, I walked to the nearby gas station to try to get cash to tip and the ATM was out of order. That’s my fault for not thinking ahead, but I’m sure there are other people who would like to tip but who don’t have cash, and I’m sure the employees would appreciate it.

Update: Great customer service—was contacted directly and feel like they took my feedback seriously. Will try to swing by to give it another shot sometime soon.

resp.text: Update: We got ATM now! :)

text:

I went here trying to get my truck washed and waxed the lady I talked to told me one price and then she called me and quoted me another price I went there after days of raining here and I was then quoted another price so I went to pinson from Hoover to get an hand wash and wax

name: SK Ceramics
text: They did a great job. It was a smooth process and over all positive experience and I will probably go back soon.

resp.text: Thanks SK. We appreciate your business and support

name: Alex Vas
text: Didn't do good for the price I paid 70 SUV not going back

resp.text: Hi Alex, we don't have a car wash that is $70. Which service did you get? Could you email me at info@riverchasecarwash.com with more details? Let me make it up to you.

name: James Windham
text: They couldn't wash my truck...it was too big!

resp.text: You can always get hand wash .... we. Would be happy to serve you

name: Valencia Nelson
text: Was not please with my first experience here, I paid for the works  and when they told me my car was ready it was still dirt spots on it, cup holder still dirty, crumbs on the front seat. When I asked one of the workers what I paid for he told me he didn’t know so he ask someone else so the other worker said I think she paid for the better. I was like what do you mean you don’t know what I paid for, the communication here is horrible. My car was not even wax and it was in the description online. When I explain my concerns they tried to make it right which I still left with crumbs on my seat and my cup holder was still dirty. Probably not going back.

resp.text: Under new management now .... please let us serve you

name: George William
text: An older car wash and no vacuums to do your interior after the wash. No mat cleaners either. I had an $8 Groupon so I didn’t lose much on it, but I won’t return. For my money, Anthony’s is way better.

resp.text: Hi George! You are probably unaware but we're a Full-Service car wash, so we do not offer free vacuums like an Express Car Wash. You have an option to buy Full-Service/In & Out Cleaning car washes on Groupon for you to get interior cleaning! Your $8 car wash groupon was just for exterior cleaning. Thanks!

name: Jennifer Lewis
text: I recently bought a 2014 Mercedes-Benz CLA250 and wanted to make sure my car looked great. Blue Crystal wax looks so beautiful on my car! So shiny & pretty! I am so tired of vacuuming my own car at other car washes but I like it here. I'll be back!

name: Lindsey Johnston
text: I paid for the "Works in-and-out With trunk vacuum and hot wax"  The staff was friendly and the service was fast but there are a few problems. The nooks and crannies were still pretty dusty, as was the right side of the car on the dash. One place on the dash right above the glove bax still had whatever cleaning spray on it where it wasn't even wiped over. The  trunk was left untouched as well. The people are pretty nice, but the detailing could be better. I'm not looking for compensation or anything, I just want to let these things be knows so people can improve and grow.

resp.text: Hi Lindsey, thank you for your feedback. We will share the details with the team that has worked on your vehicle yesterday. They are aware and will work on the little details that you have mentioned. Could you e-mail us? We would love to get an opportunity to make it right the next time you need a car wash. Our e-mail address is info@riverchasecarwash.com - thank you.

name: Helen Pruet
text:
Great customer service. But if you are looking for the deli - it is gone. Stop by at the many close fast food & quick food locations & eat while you wait. The outside seating area was clean & enjoyable on this beautiful spring day. I was in & out in 35 minutes
with the works package - that was from 2-3 on a Tuesday.

resp.text: Hi Helen, Thank you for your thorough feedback. Don't forget - we offer 7-day rain check! :) See you soon!

name: Betty Hawkshead
text: Awesome attention to my car! Looked like almost new when they finished. Very reasonable rates!

resp.text: Hope to see you soon, Betty! ❤️

name: Stephanie Cannada
text: Awesome wash in and out!

resp.text: Thanks Stephanie. We appreciate your business and support.

name: Susan McKinney
text:
It was ok. I've had an interior detail from other places before, and this place is mediocre for the price you pay.  I get a little picky when I have to pay almost $200 for something, as this is a major splurge for me that I do only once a year, if that.  However, the staff was really friendly. When I pulled up, they asked what I was most worried about.  I said the dirt and getting my seats and carpets shampooed.  I said I would get the dog hair later.  I probably should have been clearer, as I didn't want to pay the extra 20+ for the dog hair cleaning.  They inspected the car and charged me for the dog hair (about 30 bucks).  I went ahead and paid as I was there and thought, might as well let them get the dog hair if I'm going to pay for it.  When I got the car back, there was still quite a bit of hair in the floor board and mats. I'm going to have to go in and remove it, which is what I had planned to do, but still got charged for it.  With all that to say, they still did a great job cleaning the dash, doors, and seats. It smelled much much better too. However, the windows, when rolled down, still had all of the grime at the top. I was kinda bummed, as this is one of the small things I was looking forward to having cleaned.  I can clean it easily, but again, it was part of a splurge that I was hoping would take care of it.
This is where I'm gonna sound real nit picky, but the presentation could have been a little better. Every place I've ever gotten an interior detail from (that I paid less for), they presented the car to me and did something of a walk through with me. If there was some dirt, spots, or stray hairs, they took care of it on the spot.  They didn't do this. There was still a little dirt in the floor board of the driver's side from where they were in and out of the car to move it and a couple of places that I would have liked to ask about. The back mats just looked kind of tossed in. Usually, the mats are placed in the trunk so the floorboards can dry, so it did take longer for my car to dry than it has before.
I would recommend it with an "eh" and shoulder shrug, but I probably won't be back.

name: Jones Cole
text: I took my car in a couple days ago for a basic inside/outside cleaning and was very pleased with the job they did. As a Birthday present, I had my wife Jeep washed and detailed there yesterday, including clay and wax. I was impressed; I don't think its shine and looked that good when it was brand new. Riverchase Car Wash & Detail was friendly and very helpful, and there was none of the high-pressure sales tactics that I've experienced elsewhere. It was clear that these folks honestly like to take good care of cars, and I'll be recommending them to friends.

name: Robert Lightfoot
text: Full service location , this car wash has been around for decades. They offer many car wash packages including a $7.00 exterior only wash. They have indoor waiting area for full service complete with Deli like foods. The car tunnel itself is extra long and does a decent job. Staff pre-sprays off vehicles before wash. Hand and air drying. Not a in and out type wash, can get very busy.

resp.text: Hi Robert! We really appreciate your detailed feedback- this will be very helpful for our new customers! :) We'll see you soon when the rain stops! Don't forget to follow us on Facebook for specials - www.facebook.com/riverchasecarwash

name: jane hicks
text: Waiting at Riverchase Car Wash. They perform  the best paint rehabilitation.How adorable is their waiting room? they can not be more professional  .When was the last time too were in a waiting room with fall decorations And dog biscuits? Can’t wait to see my NEW VAN !!!!!

resp.text: You are one of the sweetest customers we have met here @ Riverchase. Thank you for your kind words. Come back & see us soon! We miss you.

name: Chris M
text: Great and polite. They don't waste time and they get the job done. Love their Groupon's too.

resp.text: Chris, thank you for the positive feedback. Customers like you are the reason why we've been in business for more than 15 years in Hoover. ❤️ Come back & see us!

text: I'm planning on selling my car soon I wanted someone to clean it up so it's presentable and they did a really good job for $40 I've had this car since I was 13 and I'm 21 now this is really the first time it's been cleaned up like this and it actually looks great and it only took them about an hour I think when I get home it might take me another 30 minutes to hit some little spots they missed but since it was only $40 I think they did a really good job I wasn't expecting perfect but they did definitely try and they cared about making sure I was happy with the car the outside of my car I'd say 10 out of 10 in the inside like 7 out of 10

name: Rebekah Noel
text: Excellent work cleaning the interior and exterior of my car, at an especially competitive price. I appreciated that they had a play area for my toddler while I waited.  They were also able to quote some scratch and paint fixes, which I wasn't expecting would be something that they could do. Finally, their customer service was wonderful – everyone was very respectful and kind!

resp.text: Thanks Rebekah :) We love seeing you and your baby! You guys are always so sweet and kind. Come see us again soon. We recently upgraded our tunnel and the whole car wash system. Give us a feedback before you leave the car wash on how we can improve! :)

name: Greg Nash
text: I have used Riverchase Car was previously, this is my second time with an older vehicle.  I've had a couple issues. 1.  Trim on the window was broken. was told by the Manager that he'd discuss with the owner and call me back.  I called back about an hour later after I noticed that my cup holder inserts were now missing.  Luckily they did have these, had to return to pickup.  Was told there was nothing they could do for the broken trim piece, that they only use brushes to lightly brush the dash and trim.  She tired to tell me that they didn't even touch that trim piece, I questioned then how did you clean it?  She stated there was nothing they could do about an older vehicle trim breaking, that anyone could have touched it tomorrow and broken it.  She offered to give me the number to a repair shop an my expense.  Needless to say, I will not be returning or referring anyone here again.

text: Nice job and affordable thru groupon....wipe down guy at end could have done a better job...missed spots inside and missed areas not vacuumed

name: Kelsey
text: There are newer places that charge less. I came for a detail only to find the Groupon titled car wash and detail didn't include the detail. I paid even more for the car detail! I'll continue to use the newer more automated carwashes around town. My car hasn't been detailed since purchase and that's what I really desired. Save yourself these hassle unless you want the detail that the newer carwashes don't do.

resp.text:
Hi Kelsey! It seems like there was a confusion. Detail has multiple meanings... it can be for Wax, Coating, Polishing, Buffing, Headlight Restoration, Leather Cleaning, Shampooing or Complete Interior Detail, etc.
***Groupon's "DETAIL" is for LA Wax Club's Wax & Shine or Blue Crystal Coating.
***Groupon's "CAR WASH" is for Exterior Wash or Works In & Out Wash.

I hope you realize that we offer multiple different options and our intention is not to be a hassle but to meet all car cleaning needs. Our car wash gotten a new car wash tunnel so I hope you try out us again sometime. 🥰

name: L K
text: So.... just don't even leave your car here. i left them with a perfectly working Volvo, and in return i received a dead one. My car is at the dealership now awaiting diagnostics, but the mechanic assumes water damage to my central electric system. they insisted they didn't spray anything inside the car but it was soaking wet. they admitted they know nothing about cars after the fact, but nobody with a brain would spray things on electrical stuff. Nobody even offered to refund the $200 i spent on a detail, they just closed up and left. My car was clean and smelled great, but it won't turn on so that means nothing. I obviously will edit this review if they decide to fix what they messed up, but for now i wanted to warn people about what could happen to your car.

text:
First of all I'm not one to complain but after paying 65 bucks for a "hand wash" inside and out I ended up having to take the detail rag away from the people and wipe my interior out myself. I ended up walking the manager and 2 of the detailers around my truck 3 times showing them missed spots. My wheels were half washed my floor mats didnt get vacuumed out or anything absolute worst car wash ever. Save your money and drive through the gas station car wash for 7 bucks it will be just as clean.
I asked for the owner but I was quickly informed " he ain't here" Anthony's charges 50 for a hand wash and done a better job needless to say riverchase got my first and last dollar. I wont be back

text: Total scam. Paid for three car washes via Groupon. Got the first one and they Denver extra for an oversized car, even though though my vehicle is a regular car. Took over an hour. resp.text: Oh John, I don't think it's a scam when the car wash has to close due to tunnel maintenance and extreme weather conditions. We want to stay open as long as we can for whatever reason but some things are out of our hands. If your vouchers are expired due to these unfortunate circumstances, please e-mail us so we can still honor them. Thanks!

name: Michelle Lauren
text: I honestly don't know much about cars so I used to go to an express wash (currently closed for some reason), but I noticed that my car was still dirty and had many light scratches. When I googled scratch repair, this place came out. I stopped by to get a basic car wash and asked one of the guys for an estimate for the scratches. I left as a happy customer, because of 2 reasons: (1.) they took their time to make sure my car looked good!, and (2.) they gave me a discount for scratch repairs and you can't even see them! Thank you & I'll be back!

name: Kylie Johnston
text: I recently got a full detail because the previous car owner was a smoker. Decent price. Staff was very accommodating, which I appreciated since I brought 3 kids with me. Free coffee and wi-fi was a bonus. Will be back.

name: rontanner159
text:
First, let me say that I don’t like writing these types of letters, but I am TOTALLY UPSET with Riverchase Car Wash!  I am a FREQUENT long time user of Riverchase Car Wash and have a PREFERRED CUSTOMER CARD noting multiple visits.

On Friday, March 31, 2017, I took my wife’s 2006 Lincoln Zephyr to be washed, detailed, and prepared for use the following week.  Normally, when I come to Riverchase, I get the standard car wash ($19.99).  No problems.   However, for my wife that day, I decided to upgrade my car wash to the $26.99 deal. (made it a little more special for my wife).
Upon receipt of my car, I noticed that part of one of the primary knobs (power knob) for my radio system had been damaged.  I immediately brought this to Riverchase Car Wash’s attention.  Riverchase Car Wash personnel attempted to repair the radio knob.  However, after 24 hours, I determined that the repair was not satisfactory.  The radio knob was still not available for normal use.  I promptly notified Riverchase Car Wash  management.  They stated that they would be notifying senior management for a resolution.

After a few days, I followed up with Riverchase.  They stated that senior management would NOT resolve the issue because they did not believe that Riverchase Car Wash caused the damage.

OK, I have NO REASON TO LIE!!!!!!!  FAIR IS FAIR!!!  This is a 2006 Lincoln Zephyr, TAKEN CARE OF VERY VERY WELL.  There would be NO LOGICAL REASON for this type damage to happen.  After review by radio experts, it was determined that the detailing service caused the damage to the vehicle.

Honestly, in my opinion, this is nothing more than POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE on the part of Riverchase Car Wash Management.  Taking care of your customers should be a CARDINAL RULE. (Particularly regular customers)  Fair, HONEST business should be key.

Believe me, I will make it my business to tell all my family members, friends, and work colleagues to NOT use Riverchase Car Wash for any car care services.  I will send them to Anthony’s Car Wash or other customer focused establishment instead.   You just LOST me and a lot of future customers.

I have respectfully requested a refund for the car wash and repairs(which was barely $120) with no response from Riverchase Car Wash!

name: David Gall
text: Purchased a coupon from Amazon for a windshield chip repair and stopped by their establishment today to redeem.  They were VERY hesitant to honor the purchased coupon even though it was prepaid.  The new owners spoke in their "native tongue" briefly then told me they needed to charge an extra $15.00 because the chip was "larger than a quarter".  I pulled a quarter out of my pocket and laid it on the windshield clearly showing the owner that the quarter completely covered the chip.  When he saw this, his reply was " just telling you how it is going to be"....basically he was saying tough sh_ _, you have to pay extra because I said so.  I've been an entrepreneur in Birmingham for over 40 years and I assure these people are unscrupulous and you should STEER CLEAR.  I wouldn't go back if their services were free and I suspect any positive reviews of this place are phony, too.

name: Tangeer Mehedi
text: Probably the only full service car wash that is left in Birmingham. Be sure to come either early or late in the afternoon to get in and out quick.

name: Aaron Caspar
text:
Awesome service! Friendly and professional. Needed a full interior detail done on my two door 2010 VW and I needed it done quick. I called and got an appointment for two days later. Gave them my keys outside to a nice young man and it was done about 2 hours later. Free wi-fi was convenient since I had some work to do while waiting. Free coffee inside and free drinks inside.
It looks completely brand new now :) Thanks guys! Absolutely recommend.

name: Madhava P
text: I paid for the works and my dash was not dusted, not sure if the works include that but I'm expecting a 44 dollar car wash to atleast  include that

resp.text: Hi Bum Bee! Yes - Works definitely includes dashboard. Our super-sonic cleaners get the dust off easily and quickly. If you feel as it is not done properly, please stop by anytime and we can fix that for you. Thanks for letting us know and please don't hesitate to ask for assistance before you leave the car wash so we can assist you quicker!

name: La Vaporeria
text: The lady at the front was very helpful with my parents. Thank you again.

resp.text: You are so welcome, Davide. Your family is always welcome here at Riverchase Car Wash. Come see us anytime. :)

name: Justin Bratton
text: If I could give this place 0 stars I would. They ruined one of the wheels on my car and refused to pay for it. On their list of things they are not reliable for wheels are not on there. The owner was there and would not talk to me. The owner also put all blame on the employee. DO NOT TAKE YOUR CAR HERE!!!

name: Bouchra Slioui

name: Andreas Paul

resp.text: Thanks Derek for your feedback :) Come see us again soon. We recently upgraded our tunnel and the whole car wash system. Give us a feedback before you leave the car wash on how we can improve! :)

name: Smith Alan
text: Clean bathrooms. Did a great job on the car. Friendly employees.

name: Amanda D
text: Don't recommend. Car had water spots ALL over it. I've had my 2016 car a month and it came out with a scratch on the trunk that was not there prior. Also, was going to get my windshield crack repaired but they guy was gone for hours. Glad I didn't get him to do it now. Very mediocre work.

name: Rebecca Sanders

A cute small business with kind wait staff
Love it

text: While the outside of my car was clean the inside was not cleaned properly and my door handle broke and they didn t tell me.My car is old and I'm sure it was an accident but the fact that nobody told me is unacceptable. I noticed that once i was back home, too late to do anything about if. I went there because the groupon deal was attractive but I will not go back. I would not use my last groupon and I would not recommend this place.

text: Friendly staff that does an excellent job detailing your car!!

name: Stacy Russell
text: Please save your time and money and go any where else in Hoover. I have tried most of the car washes in Hoover and this was by far the worst experience. I saw a employee use terrible language to a young lady for asking for her cup holders to be cleaned. And I was told it would be about a 30 minute wait for my car how about an hour and thirty. This place is just a joke you would be better off anywhere than here

name: Billie Marsala
text: Not a lot of attention to detail is paid when they wash your car...I have to have them revacuum more often then I should. There has also been confusion on pricing. I drive a small hatchback and sometimes they upcharge $2, sometimes not. I think the upcharge is for SUVs but they define it as anything with a hatchback...really, my car is small. I'm just finishing up my groupon then I'm done with this business.

name: Chris Warner
text: Horrible job. Price came out to more than $20 over what I was told on the phone, and the lady pocketed my tip for the detailer, saying "now I'm not gun' be da actual person to do your car so when dey bring it out you gon need to tip them again." Then SHE brought my car out hoping I wouldn't notice it was the same person since it took OVER AN HOUR. To top it all off, they did a horrible job. Car not clean inside OR out. If I asked a high school kid to clean my car and it showed up like this I'd laugh in their face and tell them try again. However this is not $20 to a high school kid with a bucket of water soap and a cloth, this is SEVENTY DOLLARS spent at what USED TO BE a prominent car care center in the HUB of the Birmingham social center that is Riverchase! If I can't expect this place to do a good job I suppose I'll have to do it myself. And no I didn't ask for a refund, I'm not one of "those" people. EDIT: After getting chewed out by my boss when this 30 min car wash became an hour and half ordeal running me late for work, yes I did get a refund.

name: Josh Hall
text:
If it were not for the many polite employees, I would given them a 1...$26 plus paid, one would think the obvious dirt would be cleaned..
Had to point out the obvious all around my car which is uncomfortable for me.

resp.text: Hi Josh, we apologize for your recent visit. Please e-mail us at info@riverchasecarwash.com - we would like to make it up to you on your next visit.

text: Only used them for an express wash. Can't go wrong with $10 wash!!

name: Charles Grubbs
text: Good car wash experience. Can't beat the $25 wash."

name: TaDarius Hooper
text:
On Feb. 28th, 2014, my fiance` and I both had our cars washed at your establishment.  We have been coming there for over the last two years and until this visit we were adequately satisfied.
My car has a flip out screen radio which was closed when I arrived.  On this occasion I noticed once I got back in my car that what I was listening to had been changed.  I also have a USB drive with a playlist plugged into it.  All of this is important because that means that whomever was in my car had to open the screen, look through my playlist to pick what THEY wanted to hear, and then close it again.  Turning it down or off would have been okay, but going through my stuff is NOT.
The bigger issue: I called the next day and asked to speak to a manager about the problem but she was not in.  So I told the lady on the phone my problem and left my name and number for the manager to call me back.  About a week later I called again and left another message.  A few days ago I called and left yet another message.  I have yet to receive a call back.  Bad business practice and customer service.  So until management at least acts like they care about their clients I will take my $25 - $75 a month elsewhere.

name: V Patel
text: No issues. Purchased the $50 Groupon for a basic wax, and upgraded to the 3-compound buff/wax they offer for an additional $100. They didn't try to upsell it to me, I simply requested it and hoped they'd let me pay the difference. Waiting room and bathroom was clean, had decent wi-fi, air conditioned, no issues. Some free coffee/water would've been nice, but whatever. I waited a couple hours for the buff/wax to be done. Car looked fantastic afterwards, really much better than I had expected. Overall, quite happy.

name: Lisa Adams
text: Poor management and customer service! Low end car wash products washed my dash in basicly windex. They called the police on customers 2 time in 45 mins I was there needless to say want go back ever

resp.text: Raven, come back and see us soon. :)

name: Olivia Wilson
text: Ask for Charles for detailing. highly recommended

name: William DeToma
text:
I decided to try this place out because I had puchased a Groupon. When I arrived the people seemed very friendly. Their pricing structure was very difficult to understand with an extra charge for everything. I usually wash my car at Goo Goo which is truly awesome and I would very highly reccommend and only $6, however I tried this place out for the wax package. After they had finished they showed me to my car and I opened the passenger side door I noticed the seat was wet. The guy said they ran it through the wash with the window cracked. When I pulled up both my windows were completly down, because I didn't want my keys locked in the car. They didn't really seem to care that they soaked the seat of my brand new car.
I'm worried to go back to use my 2nd Groupon.

text: I had a very bad experience at this place of business. I drop my lexus off at 9am in the morning for a full detail. I was told to come back at 12pm. Then around 12 I receive a phone call to come back at 3pm. So once 3pm comes I pick up my vehicle. I pull up and my car has not been started on!!!!! At this point I am ready to take the car and leave!! The owner promised the car would be done by 6pm and would also give me a discount.  I come at 6pm and they are just getting started on my car. The owner did not give me a discount for keeping my car all day which was a huge inconvenience! she didn't take off a red cent. This is poor business and the owner is a liar! don't come to this place!!!!! Take your car to the place one 280 !

I believe the company is closing and I was the last job they did using leftover scrap pieces from previous jobs. Do not use this company unless I update this review.

name: Garrett Donnelly
text: Sent a quote request via their website since no one ever answers the phone and have yet to hear back from them.. 3 stars because the information might be out of date; Heard good things here and there so wanted to use them.. Will take business else where.

name: Sue Stewart
text: product advertised on Marketplace NEVER RECEIVED. Paid cash in full. It was supposedly  shipped 2/21/2021. Ignores texts, phone calls & messages. along with any & All numbers I can find. If Damien is this dishonest, I would NOT TRUST him with my car.

name: Brandon Wheeler
text: This review is to show and warn people about this place. I’ve had at least 10 cars tinted and re tinted in my lifetime and this is by far the worst experience I’ve ever had. On April 23rd I dropped my car off the night before so it could be done the first thing the next morning Damien the new owner assured me that they had plenty of time to get it done. After I waited around all day I finally call and ask about my car around 5pm he said it will be done shortly so my family went to eat to kill some more time. At 730pm! I get a text that it’s about done. At 9pm! I get another text saying it’s about done so I went ahead and went there. Still not done! Didn’t get my car till 10pm! And when I got it you can just tell when something was rushed. I keep my car spotless when I got it back glue was everywhere! And after looking at the tint (in the first 4 pictures)the tint didn’t go all the way into the gaskets and the front windshield didn’t go all the way up! Also cluster bubbles everywhere! I know some are expected but they where horrible. After talking to him the next day he wanted to make it right and I agreed because I felt he would do a way better job next time. Wrong! On May 2nd took my car back around 10am so they could get it back to me at a decent time. 6pm! Told me to come get it when I went there still wasn’t done! The tint now didn’t go to the back of the rear gaskets in 3 out of 4 windows! And debris all in my back window! Including tint coming off the top of my front window which he said I need to leave up for 3 days! I’ve never heard of that so I did and that happened when I finally rolled them down(The last 6 photos posted) I texted him the pictures and called he avoided me. So I needed a witness to go there with me I showed him Everything again and he said it needed touched up and one window would need re done. He said the way my windows move is why he couldn’t get them to go all the way into the gaskets. And said nothing could be done about that. Lies! After asking for a refund because he said nobody could do a better job he just starred at my car and my dad said what if someone can do a better job and we will bring you the bill. He said ok. Well I went somewhere else and had it redone they did everything I wanted the right way! I called and texted him about a refund and he said because they took his film off he is keeping my money! $325. Bottom line if you are a business that offers a %100 guaranteed job or if your customer is not happy you refund them! So just think twice about going here it isn’t the same place it was a few years ago.

name: Alivia Busch
text: He was super nice when he came to do my windows. He did good on my side windows and when he got to back window it was getting late and said he'd come finish the next day. He said he was on the way and never showed i tried to call, email and text but haven't heard anything. Now I have an unfinished tint job.

name: Matthew Sweeten
text: Went to get my windows tinted and paint protection film done on my brand new BMW loved the work that Damien and his team did made sure everything was done properly. Had an issue with the tint not sticking properly due to the window catching it was fixed without question. Sadly the car was totaled about a month and a half later however will be bringing my next BMW to home and his staff

name: Thomas Calix
text:
I took my New 2014 Equus to Daphne tinting for a paint protective film over my entire front end.
Damien was very helpful initially over the phone answering all my questions and helping me to feel confident in the process. This was a very new experience for me.  I've never owned an over $50k car before much less had a process like this done.
The guys worked from 10 am to 1100 PM that night so I didn't have to leave it and travel back and forth.  I live in Destin,  Florida...
Flawless job. . Check these guys out and tell them Tom ...the equus guy sent you... ..thanks again guys greeeeeaaat job...

name: Drayton Perkins
text:
Had a previous car tinted here and loved the level of detail that was put into the work.

Made an appointment to get two cars tinted here while we were in town from Atlanta. The business was listed as “open” online, but when we showed up to our appointment, the office was locked and the phones were unavailable.

Would recommend their work - if you can be sure they’ll be there to do it.

name: Kurro Howard
text:
Set up an appointment via phone call. All sounded well & we confirmed an appointment for today. I attempted to call again the day before my appointment to confirm- calls were never answered, mailbox full, email wasn't responded to, and facebook messenger ignored. It was a fluke I got through the first time.

Best part? They didn't show up today.
Put everything on hold in the event they did.

And you expect a warranty on your tint service to be honored, in the event you see it's a bad job after you're able to roll your windows down?

name: James S
text: This is not the company you want to touch your car. When Damien took ownership of Daphne tint. It has since went into the toilet. My experience with Damien has been very unprofessional. His work is not good, he tried several times to tint my windows. Between trash stuck under the tint where he did not clean the surface or simply cut to small to fit my window. He has left me with a mess of tint that I had to remove myself, and made off with my money and refuses to answer my texts or calls to repair his shotty work. If you want quality work, do not go here. He charges the same as better shops, and does not have the skill set. If I could rate less then 1 star I would.

name: Leah volz
text: 5 stars and 2 thumbs up to Daphne Tinting!! I've used them for 2 of my vehicles and these guys do a great job. With my mini van the window made a snap sound and then the window fell into the door. They got me in that day diagnosed the problem, order the part, made the window weather proof, made an appointment a day later and back on the road good as new!!

name: jonathon ruelle
text: Always helpful staff and quick check out

name: Garrett Johnson
text: I had you come out and tint my truck. I also paid you to tint some windows on my home and you said you would come back and take care of it. I noticed some imperfections on the tint so I asked you to check them out when you were supposed to come back. Now you’re MIA and haven’t come back to tint my home windows or redo the truck windows that have imperfections. I have tried calling and texting, but have had no response.

name: Kyle Smallegan
text: Amazing work as always!!!! I highly recommend Daphne Tinting! The owner is awesome and goes above and beyond! Thanks again.

name: Mary Langham
text:
Great tint job 8 years ago, but sadly not the case this year. They redid the windows that had some spots on them, but those ended up looking worse than before. And then they used a marker to cover a gap on one window. I had to pay for another shop to redo everything.

But everyone in the shop is very nice.

name: Joshua Turner
text: I sent one email and received an email right back. Answered all my questions straight up and had me in and out! Great work! I definitely recommend Daphne Tinting! Thanks fellas.

name: jeff penuel
text: YOU HAVE A VERY NICE SHOP.

name: David Bobbitt
text: I had a great experience!  I waited and watched while they installed the pinstripes on my purchase of a used Mercedes.  They had just the color we wanted and did a great job and let me watch the progress as they did the pinstripes at a reasonable price.  I would highly recommend Daphne Tinting.

name: jeffrey smith
text: The quality of work here is not that good, had to bring my truck back multiple times for the same problem. Will probably just go to another shop and get it redone right. I would not recommend this place.

name: Jacob Lindley
text: We decided to get our windows tinted while visiting family in Daphne. The employees at Oasis were friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful when we were looking at samples to decide which tint to go with. The tint was installed masterfully! Our car looks great and it is noticeably cooler in the Sun. I would recommend Oasis to anyone! Next time I need windows tinted, Oasis will most certainly get our business. Overall, great product, excellent service and a pleasant customer experience!

name: Jacob Woolsey
text:
Guys went the extra mile on both my vehicles .
Genuine care about customer satisfaction.
%100!

name: Andrew Betts
text: Excellent Service.  I have gone to this location for a couple of vehicles now.  The quality of work is great, and the staff is very friendly and straight forward.  They were happy to stay late and tint my vehicle on a Friday afternoon.  Couldn't ask for more.

name: Warren Brown
text: They are very nice and do great work

name: Mike Buzz
text: These guys have done everything I own for years now. Most recently my daughter's birthday car for her sweet 16. By far the most professional and nicest place around. The work is flawless. You can't go wrong using Iasis Tinting.

name: Chris Devall
text: Great job and good attitude toward customer service! My windows were all jacked up until I spent 30 minutes over there! Thanks guys!

name: Robert Petty
text: Oasis is a rare find in the tint world. Stayed late to tint my car, and the product he sells is great. He has fixed cars for me, and tinted new cars for me. I'll be bringing him at least two more to do soon. If you have ever tried to tint a car, you'll appreciate the skill, and attention to detail here. Has movies while you wait, and bends his timeline to get your car done. Not the norm these days. He will get my business, and many references in the future.

I will continue to take my vehicles there! If your looking for a great customer service and a great tint job(s) this is the place you need to come!!

name: Margie Navarro
text: I've had windows in five different vehicles tinted here and I'm very happy with the service provided.

text: Did a fantastic job on my new Toyota C-HR. They take great pride in there work. It shows in there quality.

text: Oasis's has tinted 2 cars of mine and 3 or 4 of my family members cars. This is the best tint shop I've been to. They do life time warranties which is awesome, but never had any problems or reason to carry it back and get the tint re done!!

name: Nunya
text: The only place I will ever go or recommend to get your windows tinted!!

name: Jeff Weber

awful...
Oasis has done 6-7 vehicle for me and I referred him about 5and DID great work. I took my new to him and there are spots and a bubble about the size of a dime. I took it back a 2nd time and he agreed to fix it. I setup an appointment and had my wife take it back and he calls me and tells me there is nothing wrong and he cant do any better. He THEN offers me a refund for the 2 windows and I agree.
His "manager" then tells my wife to have a great day and gives her the keys.
I call back and talk to Oasis, and he says he cant give me a refund after agreeing to it.

He USED to have a great business... Sad.

name: Sbear
text: I thought I had already put up a review. Apperently not. Oasis is awesome I've been uaing him since my civic si I believe. Then for my Nismo 370Z. He goes out of his way for each customer and their needs. The air 80 was printed on the actual tint so he took care of me with a return visit and discounted some for gas and time. I'm now about 2 hours away and now that I picked up my new car. I'm still trying to work a way to get in to see him. I'm so piticular that even a spec drives me crazy. Oasis knew that about me and even redid a window before I said anything because he saw a speck. One window a week or so later did start the come down. Oasis fit me in no problems or questions and had me out in 30 minutes. He doesn't give you high pricing or revommend things you don't need. My 370z looked the same as the day he finished it as when I sold it. ~2 years later. I've used a lot of other tinters, 3 just in mobile. None of them came clost to the quality you get from this business and the owner is a down to earth great guy. For me to leave this kind of review is extremly rare. I just feel bad that I didn't do it sooner I thought I had.
