name: Clayton Miller
text:
Great business. Great pricing
Great customer service
Would recommend to anyone!!!

name: Katarina Essenmacher
text:
Never again. I came in to test drive a car they had that was the only one around that was similar to the one I wanted, with the intention of having them order what I wanted if I liked it. I was very clear about that from the beginning. The person we'd originally made our appointment with was too busy to meet with us, the two different salesmen we were bounced to spent a combined 20 minutes just looking for the car they had said they'd have pulled around when we got there.  They spent most of the time trying to convince me to settle for the one they had, which was the wrong color (not a huge deal) and a Limited where I was looking for an Ultimate and didn't have any of the specific features I'd picked the Ultimate for (a bigger deal). When they finally agreed that they could order the car I wanted, they tried to convince me to buy it faster, claiming that in the few weeks I was planning to wait until some new payoffs reported on my credit, qualifying me for a 0% interest rate, my trade would decline in value and that I didn't want a 0% interest rate anyway. They kept me another 20 minutes after I said I needed to leave for an appointment, and even had the sales manager come out asking us, "Why do you hate my car", to try to convince us to buy the wrong one again. They didn't even pretend to care if I got the car I wanted (even though I'd have been spending more money), they just wanted me to buy whatever they could push off on me right that second. Overall, a terrible experience, and I felt more like a hostage negotiating for my release than a customer.

After it was all said and done, I bought somewhere else, got exactly the car I wanted, in exactly the time frame I wanted. And despite the salesman's threats that my trade wouldn't be worth what I wanted to get for it if I waited a few weeks, I got $3000 more for it than I'd asked Tameron for.

name: Renae Patterson
text: Originally went to Tameron Hyundai looking for a used car.  We met Antoine Gray who was so helpful to us that when we decided to buy a brand new 2019 Hyundai Santa Fe Ultimate 2.0 we called upon him.  He is NOT pushy or aggressive which would have instantly turned us off. Instead he kept in touch either calling or texting us just checking in to see if there was anything we needed. He went out of his way to get us exactly the car we wanted.  When we picked up car both he and Christina did an excellent job of explaining all the features so we were comfortable driving it off the lot.  I had previously reached out to 6 different dealerships before deciding Tameron. Save yourself some time and just go to Tameron and ask for Antoine. I promise you will not be sorry.  (We got the  scarlet red one)

name: Laura Burke
text: Lawrence and David absolutely outdid themselves. They understood my circumstances and worked with me to get me back on the road. They spoke to me as a person, not just a quota to fill and stayed late in order to accommodate me. 10/10 wonderful service, definitely worth checking out, they'll treat you well. Thanks guys!

name: Kevin Wheatley
text: Excellent service. The service advisor Mitchell was professional from the moment I drove in. He greeted me and after I explained I was there for a recall/issue he went ahead and advised me of how long the service would take. He even checked the system to see if I had a plan to cover my oil change at my current mileage and advise me to come back within a certain mileage range. I didn’t even know my plan had these stipulations. I decided to wait for my car and it turned out that the recall service was even quicker than he advised it would be. I’ve been to other Hyundai service stations in AL and NJ and by far Mitchell and Tameron Hyundai are the best.

name: Danna Jones
text: Mitchell made my experience AWESOME.  He went above and beyond helping me find out about the warranty on my car and saved me several hundred dollars and I was able to go ahead and have my window fixed. THAT is good customer service!

name: John Muir
text: Thanks to the people at Tameron Hyundai for providing excellent service.  My service advisor Randall, helped me to get my Sonata up-to-date with all required services, and all services were completed in one day!  Tameron's shuttle service picked me up within 5 minutes of my arrival and drove me to work in a 2016 Honda Odyssey with leather.  I was glad the Service Department stayed open until 6 pm, allowing me to work my regular 8 to 5 workday before picking up my Sonata.

name: Brian Langlois
text: I had an appointment for regular maintenance and service. They informed me that there was a recall on my vehicle (computer update) and that they would take care of it at the same time as my service. They got me in and out quickly. They were courteous and efficient.

name: Donna Allen
text: They say you’ll love the way your treated. Well they may not be mean or hateful, but they sure don’t mind making you wait and not following through with what they say. I have called and left messages for both sales and service center with no return call. I found out that I could have gotten my same car elsewhere for thousands less and I thought they cared about their customers. Other than maintenance, that will take hours, I will not use Tameron Hyundai again.

name: Clif Render
text: Tameron Hyundai's service department is second to none. They are always prompt and thorough and are always careful not to overcharge or provide duplicate services. If I never have to use anyone but Tameron Hyundai again, I will be a happy individual!

name: Judy Van Luchene
text: This is the best dealership I have dealt with. I have dealt with Honda, Ford, and a few others over the years. This dealership was the easiest to work with and the negotiate with. Their service department is great. Nice place to wait if you prefer. Our salesman worked especially hard to get us what we wanted at the price we needed. And we love our Sante Fe more than any vehicle we have owned, and that's quite a few over our roughly 45 years of owning vehicles. I am a tough negotiator and they made it easy when I told them what I needed.

name: Jeff Martin
text:
5 stars for the sales team. One star for the service team. I have far too many complaints to list here, but the biggest is placing multiple requests to speak to a manager and not once getting through or receiving a returned call. I'm starting to think "Joe" doesn't even exist. Their tag line is "where you'll love the way you're treated" is too hilarious. While Citron is an amazing salesperson, I'll be taking my future business elsewhere.
Bottom line: they're all too eager to sell you a car and not a bit eager to service it.

name: Kenneth R. Huff
text: Tameron Hyundai ordered a Throttle Body(ETC Actuator), which was shipped overnight, for my Genesis sedan. I replaced the part myself which is working great! My car drives much better! I would like to say Thank You to the Parts Guy for ordering my ETC and the Service Crew for diagnosing my car!

name: Katherine Cottingham
text: Brian was my guide to a very nice experience in car maintenance.  The entire staff was very customer focus which is rare these days.  They are professional and efficient

name: Ken Blalock
text: The most efficient buying process I have experienced.  I live in Tuscaloosa County and I asked them to price a car to make me come to Birmingham and buy it.  They did.

name: David Stopak
text: We were very concerned when our Santa Fe engine started acting up. The service department it a great job to communicate with us and even provided us a loaner vehicle. Great job Tameron Hyundai.

name: Lisa Matherson
text: Citron was wonderful.  Very personable and easy to work with.  The only negative is the time it took to process the paperwork and prepare the car.  This could have been done in a couple of hours, but it took almost three.

name: Ryan Brand
text: My partner and I purchased 2 Genesis G70s in 2020 and have had nothing but problems with the cars. Door handles falling off, trim fading away, completely different color wheels on one vehicle, radio stopped working, air conditioner stops working, and the list goes on. The service department is far below exceptional as we were accused many times of being the cause of these problems. I live an hour away and was called to bring my car in for repair on many occasions only to arrive with the parts not even here, or parts here but they “weren’t allowed to put them on”. Our salesman, Mark, was the only one who seemed to care and got us help, but the rest of the place is terrible. We will never use this dealership again due to the total lack of responsibility from their service department and manager. Don’t worry about making appointments for service either as apparently they overbook appointments and a 30 minute oil change is turning into a 3 hour wait today.

name: Sherry English
text: Both our sales rep - Mr. Kelly & the Tameron Hyundai staff made our car buying purchase simple & easy. They "went above & beyond" to meet our needs.

name: FolaShade Thompkins
text: I had a simple request to have my new car tag mounted. They were so friendly and it took them no time to do it!

name: Emily Waldschmidt
text: Spoke with a gentleman about test driving the car of choice. I asked if he could come to me for the test drive. It seemed to be an issue for him to bring it to me because he would have been away from the dealership for two hours. I arranged my own time with them after work and had spoke with him prior to leaving my work . He was expecting me to be there by 4:30 and I was. When I got there I was informed they had just sold the car. I drove an hour and a half and wasted my time with these crooks. I would not recommend.

name: Dale Calvin
text: As Shady as Serra.  They agreed to numbers and had us drive in multiple times. but when it finally gets down to going to the finance office the numbers change and they will not meet their original commitment. We wasted so much time at this dealership and they are absolutely the shadiest dealership we've worked with in the Birmingham area. They're all about profit and not about their commitment. No integrity.  Feel free to text or email me for further details.

name: John Laurent
text: A service manager came to my car window as soon as I drove into the service bay.  He looked up my file, escorted me to a customer lounge area where there was water, coffee, and food.  He checked in with me after about 30 minutes to let me know how my service was progressing and came back a little later to escort me to my car.  He explained all paperwork.  It was a very painless experience.

name: Juanita Santana
text: Personnel were courteous and professional as always. Mike has assisted me on other occasions and I was always treated with respect, advised of any and all information required and he always tries to get me in and out of the facility as quickly as possible. Service and personnel has always and continues to be exceptional.

name: Kay Stephens
text:
We arrived about 10 minutes early. We were taken right in. Matt introduced himself and explained what he would be looking for n this recall. He even took the time to show my husband what he was looking for. We went to the showroom area to wait as waiting room was full. Matt sent a message to my phone telling me his name and number and to call if we had any questions. We badly waited 15 to 20 minutes before we were paged to tell us our Santa Fe was ready. A very pleasant experience.

That Genesis is some fine car. I won’t be able to afford it, but IF I did fall into a bucket of money...

name: Glennis Points
text: Tony Finley was the greatest!!!  Fast, thorough service and the staff was very attentive to customer needs.  Came looking for one specific vehicle on the lot. Got it!!!  Very happy!!

name: Beverly M
text: Matt in the service department was great! No bs, respectful, and professional. My engine had to be replaced. It took them about 3 days to get final warranty  approval from Hyundia and then 2 weeks to get the engine in and installed. They gave me a 2021 rental and the young lady that helped me with my rental was very nice and professional. Definitely a return customer.

name: Valerie Mcrand Horne
text: We had a great experience trading our vehicle for a new one. Tony did a great job getting the deal done.

name: Heather C
text:
Exceptional, Outstanding Customer Service at Tameron Hyundai buying a new Elantra with Kevin Dailey! I had an OUTSTANDING & EXCEPTIONALLY POSITIVE experience purchasing a brand new 2021 Hyundai Elantra SE at the Tameron Hyundai dealership.
First off, I received a call from Andrea in customer relations after I visited the website. She was SO friendly, pleasant, easy going and helpful!
She helped me set up a time to come in and look at the cars available.
When we got to the Hyundai dealership at noon, we met with Kevin Dailey.
My son and I felt so at ease with him. Kevin was AWESOME!!!
He was very friendly, respectful, attentive and knowledgeable.
He gave us a great introduction of the Hyundai Elantra SE we wanted. Despite the torrential downpour and flash food warning sirens and crazy scary lightning that day, we enjoyed the test drive with him.
The car drove like a dream through all that terrible weather. Kevin did a great job of working to get my monthly car payment rate at a price I felt comfortable with. He also guided me on how to coordinate with my AAA car insurance agent while waiting on financing dept, then he introduced us to Chayse. Chayse also did an exceptional job of getting all my financing paperwork together.He generously provided copies of documents I needed to get my new car’s tag and registration done at the DMV.
I had no real expectations that day other than to test drive a car.
My son and I researched a lot and compared the Toyota Corolla, Honda Civic and Hyundai Elantra SE. The excellent warranty, and better safety features, more cabin room, and other specs sold us on the Hyundai Elantra SE. Our prior vehicle broke down in February. It has been a tough 3 +months without the ability to go anywhere.
From start to finish we had an incredibly positive experience with everyone at Tameron Hyundai.
For us, it’s not just about a car. It’s about our freedom to get out and live life. We are TRULY GRATEFUL for our entire experience!
Kevin also scheduled our first maintenance appointment for November before we even drove off the lot!
We were thrilled to hear the warranty is doubled and our maintenance is will be handled at Tameron as well! AMAZING!!!
After driving in our last vehicle for 20 years, I’m SO GLAD we decided to trust our instincts and research about our new Gorgeous Hyundai Elantra and the Tameron Hyundai dealership! I posted Kevin’s business card on all my social media. This is THE BEST Mother’s day gift ever!
If you ever need to look for a new car I HIGHLY recommend Kevin Dailey and the entire team at Tameron Hyundai!

name: Stacey Daniel
text:
Hyundai manufactured vehicles during the years 2006-2016 that have given the owners terrible problems with paint. If this has happened to you, please research online and on different social media platforms. Hyundai needs to recall the vehicles affected, and repaint; or at the very least, repaint as customers report the damages incurred due to their faulty paint and/or procedure.
I will note that the staff was helpful and courteous at Tameron Hyundai. I sincerely hope that Hyundai National will act accordingly. My request has been made for them to address the paint issues with my vehicle.

name: Wes Allbritton
text: Check-in only took a couple of minutes, they were expecting me and had all the paperwork ready.  Timely service, resolved issue promptly!  My issue was covered under new car warranty!

name: Janelle Sanders
text: I’ve been coming to this location since 2018 and this was my first real professional experience. The service manager was extremely professional, helpful, and courteous. I have had maybe 2 other decent experiences at this location. This guy has been with the company for 20 years and I see why, he does a great job. I didn’t get his name but he was helpful. Thank you!

name: Blake Greene
text: Kevin was great! Worked with our budget and made the buying experience enjoyable.

name: Andrew Bond
text:
I recently visited for my first scheduled maintenance. The service department did not notify me that they had disabled my automatic lights. This cause me to have the unpleasant experience of being pulled over by the police. I am glad that they pulled me over though, because leaving the lights off with out telling me could have cause a serious wreck!!!

Since this post Hyundai reached out to me to address the issue with their team.  I am happy that this should not happen again to any other clients.

name: Joe Johnson
text: Well pleased  with Ed Cox your sales rep. His special attention in handling senior citizens. Good work Ed. Also really enjoyed dealing with your credit guy, sorry I could not recall his name. We are really enjoying the Santa Fe.

name: Courtney Garner
text: Great experience and very friendly staff! Answered all my questions and were prompt in resolving my car needs

name: Andrew Foreman
text: Brian was great! He let me know what was going to happen each step of the way. Also was very detailed in explaining what the issue was and how to address it.

name: Shannon Worley
text: Nice and polite..not pushy sales reps

name: Katie Hartsell
text: Kevin Daily did a phenomenal job explaining everything to us about the vehicle we were looking at and eventually purchased. He was very knowledgeable and took extra time with us in making sure we were comfortable and answered all questions. We will definitely see Kevin for our next purchase.

name: glen biles
text:
From my first online contact with Tameron Hyundai, I was very impressed by the friendly and professional attitudes of everyone there.
They really want to see you in a new Hyundai, and they work very hard to make it happen.
But they don't use pressure sales tactics to make it happen.
I love my new Hyundai Tucson, and I'm very happy that I chose Tameron Hyundai.

name: Jay Ismail
text:
First class service
Michael in the service department solve all my problems great people

name: Bill Krumrei
text: I was pleased with the salesman but ensure you get the warranty included in the price.  Otherwise you can expect to spend an additional $2K and won't find out about it until you go to finance the vehicle.  When the sales manager comes back with the price and says out the door!!! He or She is not including the warranty. You will be told this out the door price is only for the vehicle not the warranty.  When you email the sales manager for the store manager's email and phone you won't get a reply. Lease to say this will be the last time we buy a vehicle from Tameron.

name: Steve Noble
text: Had a great sales experience with Toney. Very professional.

name: Tonisha Gallimore
text: I absolutely LOVED the entire process with my salesman, Kevin! This was my first time buying a brand new car and he listened to my every word and found me a beautiful 2020 Sonata that fits in my budget and has all the automated features I wanted. I couldn't have asked for more!!!

name: Heath Moss
text: Mike Guthrie did a phenomenal job. I was not the easiest customer but he exceeded my expectations. Was upfront and honest through the process. Would highly recommend this salesman and dealership. Once the deal was ready I was in and out in 21 minutes. Great job

name: T B
text: Picked up my vehicle after being serviced to have grease all over my steering wheel and door handle.  Contacted them about it and was told an On Site manager would contact me and no one has. I have been to other Hyundai dealerships and have never received my vehicle back with grease on it.

name: Jo Herzog
text: I called day before when realized my daughter needed an oil change and maintenance visit . They got me in first thing next morning. In at 8 and out before we had a chance to get home and settle own. they also inspected car and let us know what we might need to be doing in near future

name: Mario Heacock
text:
Arrived at the dealership a little after 10:00. Appt had been scheduled, but we hadn't been given a name to ask for when we got there.
Our salesman greeted us as we were getting out of our old car and did ask if we were there to see anyone in particular.
Introductions were made, we headed back to his desk to discuss what we were looking for and it was agreed that the Elantra sounded like the right car for us.
There was some confusion on the vehicle color,  apparently Gray and Silver are very similar and we were definitely looking for a dark gray. We test drove a black Elantra, we got back to the dealership and started discussing features that we were looking for that the black one simply didn't have. There were several gray Elantra's on the lot and we found one with all of the features we were looking for 'and then some"
We discussed pricing, which was surprisingly straight forward. The only issue I had was with the offer for my trade and that was quickly corrected.
All in all I would recommend  Tameron Hyundai to anyone who is in the market for a new car with an EXCEPTIONAL 20 year 200,000 mile warranty.

name: EV Roosevelt
text: Bay doors opened at 7:30, my car was immediately taken in.  Comfortable waiting room, automobile was ready in appx 1 hour.  Service personnel explained what was done to my vehicle and when my next regular appt needed to me made.  Then he walked me to my car.

name: Tammy Kingston
text:
It has been a few years since we have bought a new vehicle, and this experience went so well, that is erased any past bad experiences we might have had.  First of all, in this time of Covid, I was a bit apprehensive about doing test drives or talking with a sales representative, but I was pleased to see that all sales staff wore masks at all times.  There were also hand sanitizer at every desk, and plexi glass partitions.  The extra precautions did not go unnoticed.

Although I had done my research on the 2021 Santa Fe, our sales representative Citron Choice went above and beyond anything I could have learned by watching a YouTube video.  He answered every question I had about the car, and pointed out the numerous features with enthusiasm.  I never once felt patronized, and we connected immediately, even though he had been working almost exclusively with my husband.

The buying process itself from start to finish, took two hours, but not a moment was wasted.  We left the dealership believing every staff member there cared that we were satisfied with our purchase.  This is a dealership I will recommend to anyone without reservation.

name: Leilani Jordan
text: Michael in Tameron Hyundai's Service Department...AWESOME. I had a lot of work done...but it was worth it. I was on a tight schedule but they did it and I was able to make it to my 4 o'clock doctor's appointment on time. I called the Hyundai company in my city and it would take 2 weeks before they could see me. I called Tameron Wednesday (1/27/21) evening at 4:30pm and they gave me a 1pm time slot for the next. I got there at 12:55pm and they were ready for me...I would hate to have to drive 80 miles just to be serviced...but I WILL...LOL! Thanks again Mike and Tameron Hyundai. BTW, they didn't even pressure me about purchasing a new vehicle...OMG that 2021 Hyundai Genesis I sat next to for a tap over 2 hrs (I said I had a lot of work done)....WHEW! I probably would have traded my 2018 Santa Fe in on the spot...naaaaaah I'm  good for now...LOL!

name: Amanda Furgason
text: Wonderful customer service and was in and out quickly.

name: Fred Lewis
text: Friendly and courteous process. Promised a quick purchase and they did it.   Ed was great to work with.

name: Heather Posey Binney
text: This location has always been top notch.  They are friendly, professional, and quick to resolve any problem or concern you may have.  Will defiantly recommend to anyone who may be looking for somewhere to service your car long term.

name: Barbara Smith
text:
Bobby Hensell was amazing!  I appreciated so much his willingness to patiently answer my questions on a very busy day and to make sure I was properly taken care of.   He gave me a price I was very happy with and was a complete gentleman with no pressure or hard-core tactics, which I also greatly appreciated!
Austin took me for a test drive and explained/demonstrated many features which would have taken me ages to figure out by myself.
Overall, I had a wonderful experience at Tameron Hyundai and would not hesitate to recommend the dealership!

name: Stephanie Spires
text: Citron was absolutely fantastic! He really cared that I was taken care of and happy. He has even followed up with me to make sure all my car needs were covered. Everyone at Tameron that I met on the team was wonderful. Thank you so much for the excellent service! You guys rock!

name: Amanda Laddie
text:
Had an excellent experience using Tameron Hyundai. Antoine was knowledgeable, personable and professional. He knew the various features of each vehicle and trim selections. Most of all - no one - including the manager was pushy. They all listened to our concerns and needs. Excellent service! Thank you guys!

Ps. We went with the White Hyundai Palisade! Awesome SUV! Lots of room and rides extremely smooth!

name: Michael Flint
text: Great place to buy a car

name: BILLIE SMITH
text: Was told it was a 4.5 hour job but they were able to put two technicians on the recall and maintenance and It was ready in 2!  They were kind and professional!

name: Debra Escott
text: Had a pleasant experience with Tameron Hyundai!!  My salesman, Alphonso was great!!  His manager Bobbie was very helpful and patient.  David and Shawn in the finance department were very helpful and gracious too!!!  They dispelled all my reservations about car salesmen!!!  Great place to buy a car!!

resp.text: Fantastic! Thank you Debra!

name: Wolfe's Workshop
text: Shady!!  Tried every unethical trick in the book, held us hostage with our trade in key. Low balled us by more than $4000, would only let us see one car. Tried to scam us with nitrogen in the tires and other addendum scams. Never buying a car from here.

name: Dale Sale
text:
My fiancé brought her car in for an oil leak today after having her oil changed November 24th 2020, she had made an appointment for a few weeks ago but we had some personal issues so she was not able to bring it in until today. Her service advisor, Brian informed her that the oil leak was coming from the o-ring for the drain plug due to it being cracked. Brian said this is considered a “wear and tear item” and that she should probably get her oil changed since she was due for another one in around another 1k miles.

This is where my issue begins, I call Brian to get more information and he is immediately defensive when I ask him for the information about what is going on. I asked him why the O ring isn’t just a parts warranty issue, they pull the plug, put a new seal in it, fill it back up with oil and quote a filter IF she wants to put one in since it is close, he mumbled and tried to get his thoughts together and said i may not understand how warranty works. I’ve been a technician for a different brand for 8 years we use the same computer systems as them and parts warranties generally don’t only last a month, regardless Brian was beyond unprofessional in our coversation and within our 20 minute conversation he tells me:

- o rings are a wear and tear item, which if it was replaced during the service, a month ago.. it shouldn’t be “worn”.
-She didn’t make an appoitment for two weeks prior(we have the paper work that says she did, that they printed out for her today) and so there is no way that his technician could have left it loose or over torqued the plug because it would have been noticed sooner than a month(it was).
- for all he knows I did this to attempt at getting a free oil change
- this may be something I (me) would do to a customer but they would never not take the blame if it was their fault.
- she should start checking her 2018 vehicle for oil leaks every morning just like he does so that next time there is a “faulty o-ring, that is also a wear and tear item” is noticed within a month.
- he doesn’t have to speak with me because the car isn’t in my name.
- there is ZERO management in the building including service manager/director and general manager for me to speak with other than him.
- and finally he said the oil change had all ready been performed all he did was have his technician do what was approved on the service recommendations which
Had zero approved items

Over all, the man was beyond unprofessional had a snarky attitude from the beginning and essentially tried to shift blame onto me instead of just making the situation right.

name: Cindy Hastings
text: Great service and very friendly, but I sat there for TWO hours.  That wasn’t so great, but they did apologize.

name: Christina allen
text: Citron was great! They were fast excellent service buying a car!

name: Debra Little
text: I had a great experience.  My salesperson was Toney Finley. He made the process quick and was very professional.  I had a bad experience somewhere else the day before,  and everything here was wonderful.  Highly recommend! I love my new purchase!

name: Antoinette Taylor
text: Terrible service! Told me and my daughter we were approved, they lied on our application to the bank and they took the car back before we could even leave the lot.

name: Van Chaplin
text: Loved our sale person, Cole. He was very polite and friendly. What ever question he might not be able to answer fully, he got the answer.

name: James Dobrinski
text: Not my primary dealership that I use, BUT Tameron was very professional in their treatment of my minor problem. In addition they made a change that my regular dealership said was not possible.

name: Diana Slawter
text: Quick service and kept me informed throughout the service.

name: Deborah Strevy
text: I recently had a major mechanical problem with my Hyundai Santa Fe; surprising since they are so dependable. Joe Bajalia (Service Manager) and Brian Harbison (Service Advisor) really went the extra mile to tow my car from another dealership that had dropped the ball. From the day Joe Bajalia took over the repair, the service was excellent. Brian Harbison oversaw the details of the repair, worked with the extended warranty and kept me informed throughout the process. Brian explained the needed repairs and answered all my questions without being condescending. I have always been pleased with the service department at Tameron, but never thought much about it until this major issue. I will be a loyal customer from now on! Excellent, professional service!

name: D Gillam
text: Mark made the experience a good one. Appreciated all the help and insight.

name: Amanda Hatcher
text: My salesman Kevin was great! I purchased a new palisade and discovered once I got home there were a few deep scratches on the trunk. I let him know this and he immediately got it taken care of by setting up an appointment with the body shop to fix the issue and got me a courtesy vehicle to drive while repairs were done which only took 2 days. He was very apologetic about the scratches as well. Would definitely recommend if you purchase a car here to ask to work with Kevin as your salesman. I was highly satisfied with my purchase from him.

name: Diana Slawter
text: Quick service and kept me informed throughout the service.

name: Wendy Worsley
text: Dropped my car off for service Michael was friendly. Went in to wait in the lounge area. Not one person spoke to me while sitting there.  I was there for over an hour.

name: Steve Vance
text: Basic bait and switch tactics. Called and made sure 2 cars were there. I get there 30 minutes later and neither car is available - they are both being "detailed" -  but I can see a different one. I say no but move to numbers. The "internet" price then goes up almost 3K on a 15K car. Their reason is because I'm going to pay cash. So - as far as I could tell neither the cars were real nor the price..

name: Marty Cook
text: Very prompt service.  My service tech was very thorough and polite.  Exceptional facility and Covid-19 protocol.   The hospitality area was unbelievable....snacks, coffee, TV, comfortable seating.  Well done!

name: John Pettway
text: Greatest dealership in all of Birmingham. You are going to love the way you are treated there.

name: William Crowson
text: The service team at Tameron Hyundai did a great job.  They made sure I understood everything that needed to be done and why -- and they even identified and fixed a couple of problems I wasn't aware of that were still covered by my warranty.  I'm very happy with the service I received!

resp.text: Thank you William, for trusting us with your vehicle and leaving such a thoughtful review. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Kevin Pipkin
text: Joe is an Excellent service manager, and Matthew my service consultant is as well. This service department has always operated with a spirit of excellence and a servants heart. They are the reason I bought a second Hyundai. I consider them family.

name: Marty Cook
text: Very prompt service.  My service tech was very thorough and polite.  Exceptional facility and Covid-19 protocol.   The hospitality area was unbelievable....snacks, coffee, TV, comfortable seating.  Well done!

name: Citron Choice
text: Fast. Easy. Phenomenal customer service. Highly recommended!

name: Devron Veasley
text: The required service on my vehicle was addressed and completed quickly and efficiently.  The problems were described in detail and in a manner I could easily understand.  Matt Austin was the service manager assigned to me; great person to work with.

name: Kevin Pipkin
text: Joe is an Excellent service manager, and Matthew my service consultant is as well. This service department has always operated with a spirit of excellence and a servants heart. They are the reason I bought a second Hyundai. I consider them family.

name: j anthony
text: Easy appt setting, friendly face, and service completed in one day.

name: RICHARD PASLEY
text: Joe was a great help. Great service department.

name: Jeremy Fisher
text: Knowledgeable parts department, very clean dealership.

name: Todd Benson
text: Great service. I made an appointment for the next day for an oil change, tire rotation and some warranty work and went to drop off the car. The service manager said they had time that afternoon, and true to his word, everything was done an hour later. I'm very happy with the speedy service and professionalism. Thanks!

name: Teena Herschowsky
text: Always excellent, expedient service with a clean Lobby waiting area.  They provide you with snacks, water, coffee and sometimes food from a local restaurant.  Always professional service writers.  Love this dealership.

resp.text: Teena we love that you love having your car serviced with us! Thank you for the kind words, please let us know if we can ever do anything for you!

name: Bettye Lewis
text: The People there was professional and provided great service in a timely manner!  The waiting area was clean  and comfortable. Everyone was very nice.

name: J. Ellen Whiting
text: I bought my 2014 Hyundai Tucson at Tameron Hyundai in October 2015. It has been the absolute best car (SUV) I’ve ever owned. Other than general maintenance, I’ve never had an issue until the car completely died on me! I made a call to Tameron and spoke with Matt Austin in the service department... let me just say he was amazing from the start! I told him what happened and asked if I could have my car towed to the shop. Long story short, my engine had a campaign in effect regarding the software and potential problems that may result from that campaign. And what do you know, due to the result of the malfunction ... my engine had to be replaced. Matt was amazing keeping me updated with the process and even put me in a loaner car until my car was up and running again. I cannot rave enough about the communication and thorough explanation about my car and what repairs other than the engine component that may need replacing. From the courteous staff to the feeling of being prioritized... I cannot thank Tameron Hyundai Service Department and especially Matt Austin enough for your amazing service!!!!

name: Emily
text: Is every Hyundai dealership full of jerky people with attitudes? We brought our sante fe in to get the recalls fixed on it. We weren’t given a timeframe beyond perhaps a couple days even if parts needed to be ordered. The man in service department named Brian was rather rude to my husband on the phone after he asked for rental car to cover us through the time we were without our only vehicle with AC in it. I recently discovered I was pregnant and this has been unnecessary stress on me. We weren’t going to called Monday and told the parts didn’t come in. We were livid to find out we weren’t to be told and were informed it would take till Wednesday or Thursday for it to be done. Even then we were refused a rental and told the certain recalls didn’t cover a rental. At which point my mother called to see what the deal was. She spoke to Brian. He was rather snarky and unapologetic when speaking to her and informed her that the recalls have been out for eight years. We’ve only owned this vehicle for five years and were unaware of said recalls. Once my mother got off the phone with him he immediately called us to say our car was fixed on Tuesday which by that point we were unable to pick it up that day because of work schedules.  I will never be using this dealership again. My first and last visit.

name: Katie Seals
text:
My husband and I have both purchased our vehicles from Tameron. He purchased his used. I purchased a new 2016 Tuscan. We faithfully bring our cars to Tameron for every service, or did until now.

Ever since my first year owning the Tuscan, I gave experienced it shaking. I have brought it in numerous times over the years because it progressively got worse. Over the past two years, it has gotten horrible- and I have been vocal to the service department. I’ve been told it’s just the car- it’s the double clutch.
Today I decided to get a second opinion, and I need A NEW TRANSMISSION and a new battery. I knew it wasn’t normal, but was ignored numerous times.

We will no longer be using Tameron services or purchasing vehicles from Tameron.

name: John Lindell
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff with no run-around when negotiating. Would recommend and may purchase from again. It's a 2 hour drive for me.

name: Tim Honeycutt
text: Fantastic experience! I will only buy from Tameron from now on and my salesman Kevin Dailey trated us like family! He is worked for us to make sure we had a great experience!

name: Sally Snoddy
text: I made an appointment today Monday.  Got there and waited only to find out the vehicle had been sold last Saturday.

name: Sue Harkins
text:
I am 75 years old and have purchased several vehicles during my life.  I have never had a buying experience as professional and easy as this one.  Mark Hodgson was exceptional.  His knowledge of the the Hyundai product was evident as he walked me through the features prior to buying and as he helped me set things up after my purchase.  He is, without question,  the best salesman I have ever worked with.  I must also mention Christina who walked me through finance in 19 minutes flat.  I was almost in shock as Mark handed me my keys and I was on my way because the entire process had been so smooth and expedient.  I didn't have to wait in the dealership for hours or go back and forth settling on a purchase price.

Thank you to the Tameron Hyundai management for hiring the best!  I am a very satisfied customer who will be back and will definitely be letting my friends and family know where to buy their next vehicle.

name: Tom Tom
text: These guys went out of their way to make sure I was behind my own steering wheel before I left and for a remarkable price. Great team, here. I'd come back in a second.

name: Gabrella Manor
text: experienced sales person who listened to my individual needs

name: Mark Ware
text: Our sales representative, Mark Hodgson, was very helpful and courteous. We came in looking at the Kona but realized it was too small for our needs. Mark helped us find the perfect Tucson!

name: Kellie D.
text: The service department is amazing at this dealership!! We did not buy our Hyundai Sonata from this dealership (unfortunately) but we do use them for all our service needs. I am pretty demanding when it comes to the care of my vehicles and Tameron Hyundai does not disappoint! Everyone in the service department is so professional and the techs are very knowledgeable and do a great job! Shout out to Michael in the service department. Thank you for taking such excellent care of our car!! We appreciate you guys!!

name: Ricky Whitley
text: Great place to get your car serviced!!! Very Professional staff!

name: Duke Martin
text:
excellent service-very professional and friendly. All questions answered .
Citron is an excellent marketer---(give him a raise )--if in the market again--we'll be back

name: Glen Rudner
text: The staff on Saturdays are great. They provide courteous and professional service and are quick and efficient

name: Comedienne Joy
text:
I wasn't a fan of going to dealerships to get my car serviced, but with newer car I felt I should leave it to the experts. I REALLY  love the quality and service from Tameron Hyundai. The team is fast and have the BEST snacks along with free wifi.

I especially love my spacious Sonata which has a lot of get up and go which is what I need as I'm a woman on the go. This car hasn't given me any problems beyond regular wear and tear and when I hit 600K miles, I'm looking forward to getting another one!

Biggest Tameron Fan!!!

name: Judy Elkourie
text: I had to turn the key repeatedly to get the car to start. Service tech Brandon immediately diagnosed the problem and found that they had the replacement part.  While I waited for the car to be repaired the service manager Joe came by to say hello and give me a update on my repair time.  I was in and out in under two hours.  Great people great service I would not go anywhere else !!!

name: Pam Henry
text: Had to spend more time than I thought I would negotiating price, but all in all a good experience. Car was brought to me after detailing was done.

name: Greg Watts
text: Great service during the pandemic!  They continue to take care of our family like we are their family!

name: Jonathan Rose
text: When the repair ended up taking a couple days they furnished a rental car at their own expense and the cost of the repairs was reasonable for the ones I selected. They also didn't give me any fuss about wanting to do some of the repairs I needed elsewhere or on my own.

name: Keith Smith
text: Excellent and knowledgeable service person. Everything was resolved quickly and properly.

name: Erik Brown
text:
I really appreciate the professionalism and the hard work that was put to get to me into my new 2020 Sonata SEL. It’s good to know that there is a no hassle policy in place and service allowing the customer to get to know the vehicle before they make a purchase! Xavier and Shon teamed up and got me the car of my dreams!

Thanks!

name: Gary Meadows
text: Making an appointment for service was easy. Kim was courteous and efficient. When I found I had a conflict with the appointment time, she changed it with no complaints whatsoever. The service adviser was also courteous and attentive to my reason (factory Recalls) for the service.

name: Ashley Cavender
text: Kinda service staff that aren't pushy. Fast service and the waiting area is the best. The snacks, drinks and TV are much appreciated!

name: Bettina Harding
text: Citron and Xavier took great care of me and my husband and got us exactly what we wanted and a whole lot more

resp.text: That’s what we love to hear! You were a pleasure to work with Bettina, so happy we could earn your business!

name: James Casey
text: Incredible place if you want to be treated great and given the best deal that fits your lifestyle and needs. The sales staff is going to find out what you need. That might not be exactly what you go into the dealership for, but it will be perfect for your needs and for your budget. Hyundai has many different types of automobiles to fit a wide scope of needs. Tameron will give you the respect you deserve and a great deal at the same time.

name: Lyndon James
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff, explained in detail the status  of my vehicle and the best options in terms of repairing whatever that have needed attention.

name: Kenneth R Huffman Sr
text: They do good work on my car

name: Kevin Cunningham
text: Excellent service department. Randall and the service managers take good care of you.

name: Jeannie Faherty
text: Every time I've taken my car in for service at Tameron Hyundai it's been a great experience! Staff is courteous and professional. Work on my car has always taken less time than estimated. Complimentary shuttle is quick and convenient. Highly recommend.

name: Rhonda Jones
text: carried my car here to have a issue with the transmission seen about. The car would go into reverse but would hesitate going into drive it would eventually pop and go. Paid them $300.oo for diagnostics and a so called switch they said it needed which they just happened to have laying around and my Hyundai Elantra is 1997 model. The car is now worse than it was its completely undrivable. The problem was not fixed at all. Tameron hyundai responded and offered to repair 65% of the cost for a new transmission as the transmission was faulty when put in the car. They gave us a brand new loaner for two weeks while the work was being done on our car. Our car now runs smoothly no issues. Thank you!

resp.text: We’re so happy we could find a solution  and get your car running again! Transmissions are not always a simple fix, so we appreciate your patience and trust! Please let us know if we can assist you in the future.

name: Gabrielle Cruz-Uribe
text: Excellent service. Everyone was correctly masked, The waiting area allowed social distancing. The service tech was friendly, courteous, and helpful. He didn't try to sell me unnecessary items or services.

name: Casey Wortham
text: They seem to have a great service department.  I was in and out for a repair that required the removal of my bumper and to reconnect some wires that a body shop had left disconnected after a repair from a wreck.  I was in and out in about 2 hours, quick if you ask me.  Tony Mayhew, my service adviser,  was great.  He kept me posted and was professional.

name: Richard Fleming
text: Great service experience.  Prompt service and friendly folks.

name: Jason Howell
text: Had to have a major repair done while here for training.  My dealership is in Ohio but Michael and the technician made sure my vehicle was repaired, and did a top quality job.  Very satisfied with the service.

name: Teresa Hairston
text: Professional, Courteous, No Hassle Experience. Love my new 2020 Tucson. Great job done by Mr. Citron Choice my salesperson.

name: Balaji Prabhu
text:
My Sonata didnt start and was stranded. After service hours, general sales people also took effort on a saturday evening to guide me with options for bringing my stranded car into safety. Thanks
Andrew  from service was very helpful and kept me updated on the service for my Sonata.
Trustworthy service and fair price dealership.

name: ellen gambrell
text: Great service...........people are super nice

name: mike kocienski
text:
Mike Elrod took excellent care of us when we unexpectedly had to stop in from an out of town trip. Mike was everything your looking for in a Service Advisor - Friendly, Informative, and Fast.
Dealership was clean, and the waiting area was comfortable. Hot chick-fill-a chicken biscuits were waiting for us when I arrived.  Now that’s service!

This defines the way car service should be.

Well Done!

name: B G
text: I was weary of going to a dealership. I was pleasantly surprised !! Everyone was awesome! The best experience I have ever had by far with any car repair!

name: David Seamon
text: my experience at the Tameron Hyundai service department was wonderful! I drove up and someone greeted me at my car door, I was directed to the waiting lounge, which was nice and comfy and clean. The whole check-up took barely 30 minutes and I was headed out for the rest of my day in no time. So convenient! I felt like they were truly respectful of me and my time. Excellent customer service!

name: ellen gambrell
text: Great service...........people are super nice

name: B G
text: I was weary of going to a dealership. I was pleasantly surprised !! Everyone was awesome! The best experience I have ever had by far with any car repair!

name: Karen Claunch (K K Ron)
text: I made an impromptu stop without an appointment, which I know is not always the nicest thing to do. The staff was still polite and very helpful, regardless. The work was very quick, and because my situation with minor, they ended up not even charging me. (Oh, and I just remembered that in the brief time I was standing and waiting for my car to be attended/finished, a different staff member asked if I was being helped- the unobtrusive attentiveness was refreshing!)

name: Amy
text: Love the service and the people who work there! Everyone is so nice and they get you in and out very fast

name: Angela Whitaker
text:
********10/11/19 Update, now the same vehicle that this dealership was comfortable with selling to me for more than $7900 just 2 days ago is now on their website for $3994. Choose wisely consumers********

Found a vehicle at this dealership on Cargurus for $4994, checked the dealership website before making the trip, car listed there for the same price with a red line marked through it saying "don't pay list price". Arrived to the dealership, took a test drive, checked the dealership website while on the test drive, same price  of $4994 with the red line marked through it.  Sat in the dealership waiting to get a price to pay cash, waited almost as long as I would have if I were financing it for the young man to come back with an "out the door price" of $7900. Sir what happened to the price of $4994 that is on your website????  Now would you look at this, the car is no longer on the website yet it was there 30 minutes ago on the test drive. Is that why I sat there so long? So that you could remove the vehicle from the website and come back with an inflated bs price. Sounds like shady business to me. I WILL NEVER patronize Tameron Hyundai but who there cares, no one. It was only a $5000.00 sale anyway. But you DEFINITELY get 5 stars for being unprofessional, unethical and full of it! I gave the dealership one star to be able to write the review.

resp.text: Angela, we more than understand your frustration and we have reached out to you multiple times to apologize for the complete error in communication on our part. In short, one of our team members messed up. We wouldn't be able to function or stay in business if we posted the wrong prices online- we know car buyers are smart, informed, and probably shopping other lots while sitting in our dealership. The car was for sale at $4994, and we have now lowered that price to $3994. Again, we're incredibly sorry for the mishap, we hope we can turn this around and give you the car buying experience you deserve.

name: Cobb Saunders
text: Have purchased 3 cars from here, 1 new, 2 used. New was an excellent experience.  Used not so good x2.  Don't trust the used cars, they are questionable at best. One smoked within 3 days and they refused to do anything.  The other was once a rental car and has had minor issues since I purchased it. Not a solid car like my 2013 Elantra.  2017 not near as good.

resp.text: Cobb, thanks for reaching out to us. We’re sorry to read about your used car experience— with every vehicle purchase we offer both new and used car warranties that can help protect you financially against maintenance issues. Vehicles bought ‘As-Is’ are exempt, which allows us to offer them at even lower prices. If you did have any problems we would be more than happy to fix it, and ensure your vehicle was safe and repaired. Please reach out to our Service Department and we would be more than happy to look at your vehicles!

name: Keats Rivas
text: Excellent service! I had my tires and brakes replaced, and they took care of it relatively quickly. The location is superb as it is in central Birmingham. Michael, my car supervisor, was very friendly and professional.

name: R T
text: I always appreciate the repair recommendations whenever I come to get my oil change. I'll definitely be back.

name: Jessica Long
text: Customer service was great. I was visiting and needed to get my key fob battery changed. It was quick and inexpensive. Everyone was friendly as well. I would stop here again if I was in the area.

name: Diamond Robinson
text: Great customer service, and Micheal was amazing! He kept me updated about my car, and ensured me they would get the job done!

On Saturday January 4, 2020 I walked in Tameron Hyundai and was greeted by an employee and was asked if I could be help I explained that I wanted to test drive a G70 Genesis he told me to have a sit and a Genesis Specialist would be with me shortly. After sitting for 45 mins with no communication from any of the employees I got the attention of one the employees on what happened before I received any help.  Very UNACCEPTABLE.

name: Kelly Berg

name: Angela Whitaker
text:
********10/11/19 Update, now the same vehicle that this dealership was comfortable with selling to me for more than $7900 just 2 days ago is now on their website for $3994. Choose wisely consumers********

Found a vehicle at this dealership on Cargurus for $4994, checked the dealership website before making the trip, car listed there for the same price with a red line marked through it saying "don't pay list price". Arrived to the dealership, took a test drive, checked the dealership website while on the test drive, same price  of $4994 with the red line marked through it.  Sat in the dealership waiting to get a price to pay cash, waited almost as long as I would have if I were financing it for the young man to come back with an "out the door price" of $7900. Sir what happened to the price of $4994 that is on your website????  Now would you look at this, the car is no longer on the website yet it was there 30 minutes ago on the test drive. Is that why I sat there so long? So that you could remove the vehicle from the website and come back with an inflated bs price. Sounds like shady business to me. I WILL NEVER patronize Tameron Hyundai but who there cares, no one. It was only a $5000.00 sale anyway. But you DEFINITELY get 5 stars for being unprofessional, unethical and full of it! I gave the dealership one star to be able to write the review.

resp.text: Angela, we more than understand your frustration and we have reached out to you multiple times to apologize for the complete error in communication on our part. In short, one of our team members messed up. We wouldn't be able to function or stay in business if we posted the wrong prices online- we know car buyers are smart, informed, and probably shopping other lots while sitting in our dealership. The car was for sale at $4994, and we have now lowered that price to $3994. Again, we're incredibly sorry for the mishap, we hope we can turn this around and give you the car buying experience you deserve.

name: Cecilia Comer
text: My time at Tameron was good Tues. They got my car in for oil change when I got there. I was in and out hour fifteen minutes.!!!! Good job!!!!

name: smooth man
text: great customer service

name: Stephen Edwards
text: The oil leak issue on my 2017 Santa Fe was taken care of in a very professional and courteous manner, with the least inconvenience to me. Very pleased with the service at Tameron Hyundai Hoover.

name: Clare W
text: I absolutely love the customer service.

name: Adam Fox
text: Excellent, fast, and they made it very easy.

resp.text: That’s our priority—thank you for seeing us!

name: Joshua Lynum
text: They were very nice and serviced my vehicle in an great amount of time.

name: Darrell Garrett
text: We went to Tameron with our youngest son, who is a Marine. He was on leave and needed to purchase his first car to drive back to his duty station in Virginia. He had very little time and a low budget. Adam was great in spending time with him and showing all the options he had in his price range. When nothing on the lot seem to grab his attention. Adam showed him a Tuscon that had just been traded in and was awaiting service and safety check. He loved it. Tameron made the vehicle a priority in getting it serviced and detailed for him. After we left, we found a small alignment problem on the rear wheel, they had it on the rack the following morning and made the repair. Never was he pressured into a car out of his budget, as a matter of fact they found a way to save our Marine a couple hundred dollars off the "non-negotiable" price. Our Marine is back serving his country in Virginia. He sent us a picture yesterday of himself in his Tuscon fishing on weekend liberty while Navy fighter jets practiced over his head! Thank you Tameron for making our son's needs a priority.

name: Kasey Pavelitz
text: Had a great experience getting my car serviced here! Needed my oil changed, tires rotated, and the 7500 mile checkup. The service guy was upfront about the cost and I knew exactly what was being done to my car. The waiting area was busy but I was able to get a seat, and  there was coffee and water although I was in and out in less than an hour! Just a note though it is a very good idea to make an appointment online or by calling them!! Made me plan pretty far in advance but that is way better than being at the car place all day!

name: David Sears
text: Very helpful in getting my car issues fixed. No Hassle over the warranty or trying to sell me anything extra! Highly Recommended!

name: Angela Schmeckebier
text: Was very happy.  They only had my car for about 4 hours and the issue was covered under warranty.

name: Kurt DeAngelis
text: On time, thorough, friendly and free foods/snacks! Very happy to be a Hyundai owner.

name: debbie grimm
text: I was very satisfied with the service department.  The service attendant fully explained what was being performed on my car and the work was completed in a timely manner.

name: Taneshia Pendleton
text: I am very happy with the services provided. I have brought my car here a handful of times to be serviced, and representative s have always been friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Muriel Raymo
text:
I went in for an oil change. I was pleased with how fast my oil change was done.
Also, I appreciated the morning snacks that were available.

name: Larry Jennings
text: I was barely comfortable in my seat before my car was ready. Intake was efficient and everyone I encountered was friendly.

resp.text: Whew! As much as we love seeing our customers, we totally get you don’t want to be at the dealership longer than necessary! You’ve got things to do and places to be!

name: James Erwin
text: We always enjoy taking in our Sonata for service!  The folks at Tameron Hyundai are all very friendly and the service is always great! We highly recommend Tameron Hyundai for sales and fast, professional service! We do love our Sonata!

text:
Totally professional and supportive of me through a  tough situation I was forced to face.

With other dealerships, I have had bad experiences but for once, I was treated like a member of their family.

Tameron Hyundai took all the stress away and really worked to make me a satisfied customer.  All is well now and I can tell you that Tameron Hyundai has made a positive and lasting impression on me and my family.

name: Sam Ashley
text: My wife & I were on our way home in Tremont, MS when our car broke down. The Service Tech there we awesome, he waited to make sure we got in the shop before they closed the shop for the day. They informed us the following Monday of the needed repairs and the car was repaired and is back on the road as good as ever. Thank you so much to Mr. Michael Elrod for his dedication to service and the customer.

name: Tina Jean
text: Brandon over at Tameron Hyundai has been amazing with great customer service and communicating anything that was wrong and took great care of me. Definitely take your Hyundai over to Brandon at Tameron Hyundai. This location takes great care of their customers.

text: Definitely took care of me and my car, as always! Everyone at Tameron Hyundai is always very friendly and helpful. They are super knowledgeable and I trust them with my car services.

text: Arrived at my appointment time and was out of there in 30 minutes. I guessed it would take a least an hour.

name: Jose Colmenares

Maintenance  time on my wife's Santa Fe, as always quick and professional
job from Tameron, thanks for great job...

name: Lauren Stott
text: I have had only the best experience at this dealership. One of the first few times I came in I had a question about my Apple Car Play. A few people took time and helped me get this process going so that I could use it in my car. text: Everything was quick and easy. Sales held my key past service hours for pickup. Great exp.

name: Toni Bird
text:
I purchased my Hyundai Sonata Hybrid in 2011.  I LOVE my car and have had it serviced at Tameron Hyundai from day one.

The service technicians have always treated me with the utmost respect. I am not a "car person" and DO NOT want to be stranded with a vehicle that is broken down. When I have had issues (as you will with ANY car), they are concerned about my safety and go above and beyond what is typical to make sure I am satisfied with my car.

I would not hesitate to recommend Tameron Hyundai to anyone.

name: angela cox acox
text: Great service every time! Thanks for keeping my car rolling and in excellent condition.

name: Peggy Rodriguez
text: Very friendly, listened to our concerns to trouble shoot the issues we were having with the car.  Think we've found it!

resp.text: Hey Peggy! Thanks for trusting our service department!

name: Seth Powell
text: Everyone was really nice, and they will work with you to help you get just what you want for what you want to pay.

name: Lauren Downey
text: I always get in and out quickly and everyone is super friendly!!

name: Drake Dorsett
text: I brought my Santa Fe in for them to check and replace a belt that was making noise. The fix was under warranty so it wouldn't cost me anything to fix. After a few hours they told me they "didn't hear a noise" (when it was a very obvious rattling) and proceeded to list off $481 of other services they suggested. They are very unfriendly over the phone at the service center and treat you like a nuisance every time you ask a question. Definitely will not be bringing my car back to this location if I can help it.

name: Raymond Kent
text: I have always had a very good experience at both Tameron locations, that is why i have purchased 4 vehicles from them..... UNTIL recently. I had a new engine put in under a recall campaign, that went smooth and great. I smelled fuel and heard rattling noises that sounded like an engine mount went bad from the new engine that had around 5k miles on it. I took it in to be looked at which should have been covered under warranty especially due to the fact there was an open recall campaign for fuel related issues after new engines were installed. I was advised that the rattle was a muffler issue anf that they couldn't reproduce the fuel smell. I was charged a 151 dollar tech fee. The service manager says that he has to charge me because a tech looked at it..... I expected great things and the more I think about it, the more disappointed i am and the more I dont want anything to do with my car or the dealership anymore. Going from treated like gold to treated like dirt.

resp.text: Raymond, the reason we charge the fee is because our Service Techs take time to inspect and diagnose the problem. This payment wasn’t a slight you, simply a fee that is in place to pay our technicians. As with many other services, they charge a diagnostic fee. Plumbers, HVAC repairman, Doctors, even Dentists all have fees associated with their time and expertise. We appreciate your feedback and apologize for any feelings of oppugnation.

name: Kiara Breedlove
text: I dropped my Elantra off around 9:30 on a Saturday morning. Since I didn’t have an appointment, I was hoping they could squeeze me in before closing. So I left the car, expecting it to be done hours later. But Randall called about 45 minutes later to tell me my car was ready. I was pleasantly surprised it was taken care of so quickly. Randall was very personable to my husband and myself during drop off and pick up of my vehicle. I’m very pleased with my experience at Tameron Hyundai’s service department.

name: Donna Taylor
text:
Wouldn't go anywhere else
Patient thorough and fair

name: Amy Sehulster
text: I really enjoy taking my car to Tameron. They are very considerable of your time and super easy to work with.

resp.text: We are delighted to read that you enjoy servicing your vehicle with us. Thank you Amy!

name: Martha Spengler
text: Service went great.  Very professional  and on time.

resp.text: Thank you Martha for trusting us with your vehicle!

name: Sean McKim
text: My experience with Tameron was not good. Salesman was not honest and the service people were rude. After buying the car we were called constantly to give a five star rating to receive a service discount or something free. Clearly, it was not enough for me to lie about my time spent at this dealership. The brand new Santa Fe wasn't as good as we hoped and they would not correct a steering problem. We gladly traded it in on a Ford Explorer.

name: Matt Austin
text: Amazing! The employees are great! The Service Advisor at the front desk was the best I've ever dealt with. I look forward to going back again!

text: First class experience with this dealership.  The place is clean and well maintained.  We were treated with the utmost courtesy and respect by our salesman Marcus, who literally ran to get us a test car once he knew what we wanted.  Never felt uncomfortable or pressured--especially good not to be put in a tiny glass cubicle for the negotiations.  Sales manager very professional--made his presence known but that was all.  I would not hesitate to go back and recommend them highly.

text: My husband and I were treated respectfully and professionally. Adam was amazing! We told him what we needed and he made sure we had it! Usually, I don't do reviews or comments, but for this experience I had to make an exception. We had a phenomenal experience with not much waiting. Thank you so much and of course, we'll be back!

text: The service was courteous, professional and timely. They kept us apprised of where we were in the process and checked on us while we were waiting.

name: Robert Williams
text: Customer oriented...Quick and Organized repair service...even waiting is made as pleasant as possible.

name: Erica L
text: I've been here twice. Given the other reviews, I thought it was going to be amazing. The first time was for a recall. They said it would take 45 minutes - 1 hour. I waited almost 2 hours. The second time was for an oil change and they tried to sell me on two air filter changes and an injector cleaning? Overall, they are nice. The waiting area is clean. My car is treated well.

name: Tp B
text: Wonderful experience at Tameron Hyundai. Shannon Cowart did an awesome job with us in the purchase of a new Sonata. I found good reviews of her on another site and thought I would give it a shot. I wasn't expecting much as I had bad experiences in the past but not with Shannon. Professional, knowledgeable, courteous, determined and willing to go above and beyond to give great service is how I would describe Shannon. We did most of our initial setup on the phone and when we got to the dealership it all went exactly as we discussed. My wife who is very detailed oriented found what look like a small scratch on the hood. Within five minutes Shannon had the car in the service area and within fifteen minutes it was back and the mark had been buffed out. It was just a great experience working with her. She was the star but everyone at Tameron was great which shows me that the management really understands what service means. We love the new Sonata! If the service department can provide the same excellent service that Shannon did then Tameron will have a customer for life. Thanks Shannon!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us online! We appreciate your review, and just like you others are going online and seeing what others have to say about us. Our true colors show, and people know they can trust us because of great people like you! Enjoy your new car and call us with any questions or concerns! Thanks again!

name: Cindy Land
text: Tameron is a first class dealership. They go above and beyond with service. They are always friendly and very accommodating. Won't buy from anyone else in need town.

name: Lisette Del Castillo
text: The service rep was very knowledgeable and thoroughly answered all my questions. He honored the price he quoted even though it was incorrect. I will definitely be back.

name: jj99toys
text: It was a great experience they were patient with me when the time was right my car that I wanted exactly they delivered to me Alex was very patient explained a lot of stuff to me gave me a great price that no other Hyundai dealership could beat. And never wavered from that price I would highly recommend them to anyone that is interested in buying a Hyundai product. It's worth the drive

name: Cindi Stoeffhaas
text: Great service!  They provided lunch and I was out in about 20 minutes!!!  You can’t beat that!!!

name: Duvall
text: It was good

name: Kim Carter
text: From the start, Kevin Farrell worked to get me the best deal on the car I wanted.  He was an absolute pleasure to work with, gracefully and patiently handling the entire process.  I drove four hours, one way, to do business with Tameron Hyundai because of how respectfully he treated me.  Kevin and the entire team were upfront and honest from the beginning through to the final deal being made.  I've never been treated so well; especially making a car purchase.  No nonsense, just straightforward but friendly business.  I'm sending everyone I know to Tameron Hyundai...and we will be back in a few years for another car for our college student!  Thank you Kevin, Walt, Seth, and Richard for the best experience ever!  It was worth the drive!!

name: Lindsey Cochran
text: Brandon in the service department was great!  He kept me updated and exceeded my expectations. Customer service is truly important to him.

name: John Mankowich
text:
My 2013 Sonata had tire pressure light illuminated as well as a factory recall that needed attention......
Had no appointment but was greeted immediately and told it would be approximately 1 hour to take care of the car.
Done on time, but as I was leaving, I noticed that my blue tooth phone connection was not functioning, there were verbal messages about my phone contacts list that I did not know how to "fix" and my radio was deprogrammed. I returned to the service department and was taken in immediately. They tried to reconnect my cell phone but were unable to do so and also tried two of their cells but they could not fix the problem so they contacted Hyundai corporate and worked with them to take care of the situation. Apparently the fix to the recall problem had caused a problem with the phone and radio software that the service department had not seen before on similar recalls. It took them approximately 45 minutes to fix the problem and reconnect my phone. I was impressed! Joe's service personnel really cared and resolved my problem quickly with no excuses. This is why I believe Tameron Hyundai is the best. I trust them. They go above and beyond.

name: Nathan K
text: Bought a car from this dealership in March or April this year. The sales experience was good. No complaints. 2 experiences with the service department since then have been poor. Before it was time for the first oil change, one of the car’s front head lamps had gone out. I asked that they replace it for free since I shouldn’t need to replace what was a 2 month old light on a car that I bought from that same dealership. That is their fault. Instead I was charged $80 to replace it, which apparently was a discount on what hey normally charge to replace that lamp. Those kinds of charges are why I wanted to get away from bmw with this purchase... The second experience with the service department involved waiting over 90 minutes to get an oil change even though I had an appointment and was on time. It wasn’t even crowded when I arrived at 8:45 am on a Saturday so I don’t know what the problem was

name: Samuel Pace
text: If you made an appointment, they’ll definitely get you in and out without having to wait for a long period of time. The service team always makes sure my car is up to date with maintenance and I never have any bad experience with Hyundai car service.

name: da davis
text: Great customer service I appreciated the snacks and beverages

name: Connie Fowlkes
text: Always pleasant and friendly service.

resp.text: Happy to earn your business Connie!

name: Dennis Steul
text:
Went in for routine maintenance. In addition I had my FOBs (clickers) check. Had stopped working. Turns out it was just a battery issue, replaced batteries.

They do excellent work.

name: ANGELA PRESTAGE
text: The people who work there understand what customer service means. They are friendly, attentive & keep their word. Very happy with my experiences there both in sales and service.

name: Greg Matherne
text: The service I had performed was done quickly and courteously.  I would recommend the purchase of a Hyundai as well as this facility for all service work includinbg regular maintenance.

name: Emmanuel Talley
text: My salesperson who took care of me when I was at this car dealership was Cherie England. She really knew her product, and she made me and my family feel like we were important. She listened to what we wanted, and she did everything in hear power to make it happen. She really knew her product, and when she didn't quite know the answer, she would go and ask someone for the answer. This was hands down the best service that I have ever received at a car dealership, and I would highly recommend for anybody to go to this dealership.

name: Katie Belew
text: My air conditioner stopped working and I was worried it wouldn’t be covered under my warranty so I called the 800 number for Hyundai. They set up a time for me to take my car in the next day. (Yay) I pulled up, filled out 30 sec worth of paperwork, a shuttle took me back to work and picked me up after work to take me back to my car which was fixed under warranty for free. Same day. Could not be happier with all the service I received from everyone I spoke to and interacted with.

resp.text: Katie, we are *elated* that you not only trust us with your vehicle, but that you enjoy your experiences with us. Thank you for taking the time to write us a review, we appreciate you!

name: Joe Moore
text: I always did business with Jim Burke Hyundai but decided to give Tameron I try since they have the 20 years/200,000 miles warranty. When I was trying to buy a car the salesman name Jay wouldn't let me quote any insurance before buying and then on top of that he didn't really care about what I want in a car he kept saying we have to run your credit before we looked at any cars I might be interested in. So I let him run my credit and they ran it to the ground so I decided to drive off. This isn't a place for me I guess I'll keep looking elsewhere.

name: Gary Williams
text: Over priced on a used car

name: Jim K
text: I can't say enough good things about the service department here. From top to bottom they are great folks that focus on taking care of their customers. That's SO different than the experience I had with another car brand and dealer.

name: Sabrina Carroll
text: Can't say enough about how impressed I was with each and every person I dealt with at Tameron Hyundai. From the moment I made my first contact with this dealership I was never harassed, but they made sure they answered all my questions and went above and beyond to help me find what I wanted. Excellent car buying experience...quick and easy! Highly recommend! I will refer my family and friends and will be a returning customer

name: Rob Cipcic
text: Sales process was better than expected.

name: Mary Hearns

name: QUEEN KAMORA

name: Amy Nicholas
text: Everyone was very nice, as they should be. This was not your typical car buying experience, where you spend most of your day there. We were in and out within 2 hours, amazing! There no high pressure sales tactics, and yes we still bought the car we were interested in! I will certainly use Tameron Hyundai for my car buying, in the future.

name: Donald Slocumb
text: My wife and I drove from Cullman to Hoover to try to buy a car from Tameron Hyundai.  I had my doubts and dreaded the trip.  Ours Sales Lady when we got there was Christina. As I suspected before traveling more than an hour to the lot, we did not leave with a new car. It was not, however, because of a lack of effort from Christina and the Sales Manager. They were outstanding and worked very hard to get us in a car.  I would recommend them to any and everyone! When we get in a better financial position, we WILL buy a car from them!  That was by far and away the best experience at a car lot we have ever had! Do yourself a favor and go there the next time you're in the market for a vehicle.  If you're lucky, Christina will be your sales lady!

name: Angela Cox
text: Excellent service every time I go! Thanks for always being dependable, knowledgeable, and professional with your service.

name: Rebeca Culverhouse
text: I was able to bring in my vehicle on the day that was convenient for me. I was given Assistance as soon as I got to the service area. I got a call within a couple of hours with the recommendations with what was essential and what was recommended but not pressing. My car was ready for pick up by that afternoon. Matthew Austin was very pleasant, professional and eat to talk to. I appreciate all his help in what for me was a stressful situation.

name: Cameron Haefner
text: Went to Tameron Hyundai after a recommendation from my brother-in-law based on his experience with the dealership. Mark worked with my wife and I to get the best deal available and was very helpful with any questions we had. Everyone at the dealership was friendly, and we never felt overwhelmed or uncomfortable while purchasing our new vehicle.

name: Parker Smith
text:
