First car buying experience was a huge success thanks to Corey Hooper and the guys at Tameron Hyundai. I was not planning on buying a car today and he gave me an offer I could not refuse. There was no pressure or attempts to over sale me. We told him the exact car we wanted and that is all he showed us. Highly recommended and I will buy my next Hyundai from Corey at Tameron.
Thanks,
Parker & Erica

name: David Cataldo
text: As usual, excellent service and especially quick.

name: Marilyn Seier
text: Service manager, Joe, was so helpful with a small problem with my new Sonata. Love my Hyundai!

name: Beverly Kirkpatrick
text: Very friendly people. Completed my work sooner than they said. Having breakfast & lunch for customers really was a nice gesture.

name: Chris Blazer
text: The service staff are friendly, efficient and professional. They went the extra mile to resolve our issue

name: Judy Hershey
text: Very fast.  Attentive service representative

name: LENORA BATTLE
text: Great service and staff! I could have my vehicle serviced close to home, there’s a dealership 5 minutes from my house. I choose to drive 35-40 minutes for the GREAT customer service! A customer will always remember how you make them feel!

name: Brian Gentry
text:
I had work done on my Santa Fe here.  I live in Nashville, TN and was traveling when I had the problems occur.  Thankfully, my car was repaired at Tameron Hyundai.  When back home in TN, and issues came about with the car, the Service Dept. Mgr, Joe, called the local dealership here and saved me the $175 I was being overcharged.  With his knowledge, and commitment to customer service, he was able to 'shame' the dealer here into charging me correctly for the repairs needed on my Santa Fe.  I highly recommend Tameron Hyundai to anyone needing their car serviced.  I only regret I live too far away to have my vehicle serviced regularly here. o

Update on my initial review.  After I was told by the Service Dept. Mgr. Joe that I would receive a refund on the work I had done on my Santa Fe, the refund was never sent.  I did everything he asked me to do to get the refund, but it was not sent.  I trusted that they would follow through on their commitment to me, so I posted the 5 star review on them.  I guess in the future, I will not be so trusting of a business.

It's a shame that people do not follow through with their promises.

If I ever do receive the refund, I will gladly update my review of this dealership.  They have my contact info if they wish to rectify the situation.
James B. G.........

name: David Crane
text: Tameron Hyundai was conveniently located to my house and has a great reputation in the Birmingham area.  The selection was good, and every member of the staff was helpful, friendly and accommodating.  I received a very fair deal for my trade-in, and I walked out with a new car at the price I wanted.  I feel like the staff genuinely appreciated my business, and I expect that will continue as long as I own my Tucson.

name: Jo Ann Jones
text: Always great service, polite employees, and the best customer waiting area I’ve ever experienced anywhere!

name: Bernice Bunkley
text: I was quoted one price and charged another. I noticed on my invoice a charged for less insurance $180.. what is that?? I will never bring my car to this place again.

name: Rachel Koenig
text: We bought our 2014 Sonata from Serra Hyundai yesterday! They were all awesome. William was our salesman, but everyone helped us get into the car that is perfect for us. The management and finance department really went out of their way to work with our credit union to get the best rate for us! We will definitely buy another vehicle from them in the future.

name: Elaine Fuerst
text: Effectively explained the choices I had and costs for each. Actually found a cost-effective solution. Appreciate the advice and fast service.

resp.text: Thank you Elaine! We appreciate you trusting us with your vehicle—happy we could find a solution for your vehicle (and your wallet!).

name: Mary Avans

resp.text: Thank you Mary! We are happy to hear about your stellar experiences here at Tameron! Thank you for choosing to do business with us, we appreciate it! We look forward to serving you, please call with any questions!

name: Jennifer D
text: The service staff is always friendly and professional.  They offer solutions to problems and are able to get services completed in a timely manner.  Their shuttle service is great and allows me to drop my car for service and still be able to get to work on time!

name: Ira Ehrlich
text: Horrible lying dishonest service and parts department. They are the epitome of why most consumers view dealers as terribly slimy and dishonest.

name: Manuel Castrillo
text: The experience was good and Brian did an amazing job making sure the vehicle was fixed right.

name: Alicia Kenerley
text: They were great. They got my car finished much quicker than I expected.

name: Michael Raymo
text:
Mark was the consummate salesperson giving me full attention and professional insight to give me the car I wanted.  He was very patient when I was unsure of several cars and features and he did a thorough job of explaining each accessory.
Seth, even with signing all the paperwork and the check, was a professional and explained all the added coverages expertly.
Todd, in service, is always the best as he has cared for me and my previous Santa Fe with the utmost care and service.

name: Molly Shook
text: I had a great experience with Tameron Hyundai. Gary Johnston was very attentive to what I was looking for and gave me many options. I ended up buying over my original budget because he worked such a great deal for me. Buying from the dealership is the way to go. lifetime warranty and great service. Thank you!

name: S H
text: Matt in the service department has treated me and most of all my mother with kindness and respect. Thank you Matt . This experience was a positive one.

name: Annie Stockdale
text: My experience was great. The service personnel was kind and friendly. My wait time was not long. I was disappointed in the price of my service. Thank God I have excellent credit and I had a credit card to pay for the charges. Do you have a credit card that customers can apply for with no interest terms as an option? That would be great for a customer like me. Thank you for a wonderful service experience.

name: Angie Tidwell
text: Very, very quick service with professional and courtous personnel.

name: Kerin Johnson
text: Mannn these guys are awesome and quick!!! Always handle with great performance!!!!!

name: Amanda Martin
text: I went in with one thing on my mind. That was to purchase a new SUV. Tony was my sales rep, and he was awesome, kind, and courteous. The whole staff was professional. They made buying a car simple, and easy. I only have nice things to say.

name: harminderjit singh
text: I love this place. Bought two cars within a year. Awesome sales team. Make you very comfortable with your selection of vehicle.

name: Robi Washington
text: I worked with Xavier Morgan, we did almost everything electronically since I live so far away. He was open to my pricing structure and needs, and I think he did an awesome job.

name: Diana Chan
text: Prompt service, even though I arrived 2 hours early for my appointment.  Amazed at the speed of my service.

name: Morgan Holliyan
text: Do not recommend! Was sold a car 1 month ago and was told it had MINOR DAMAGE! Signed a paper saying minor damage to the car, go to trade the car in and am now $8000 in the hole because EVERY OTHER DEALERSHIP REPORT SEVERE DAMAGE TO THE CAR. Called and spoke with them, and of course it my problem now since they lied about the damage on my vehicle. Thanks a lot Tameron Hyundai. 👎🏼

name: Martha Austin
text: Always friendly and helpful.

name: K J Jaxson
text: Courtney was outstanding!!! Ask for him when you arrive!!!

name: Michael Adams
text: Brandon was so helpful and patient. He gave great customer service. Everyone was great

name: Michelle Jolly
text: We always receive 5 star service.

name: Donna Adams Gooch
text: Randall was our service advisor yesterday and was extremely helpful.  He noted the items that needed to be addressed, gave us an approximate time the service would be complete, and called us promptly when our vehicle was ready.  He thanked us when we picked up our automobile, was friendly, courteous and prompt.  Hope we get Randall next time we drop by for service!   Thank you, Randall, you're a credit to Tameron Hyundai!

name: Teth Lee
text: Always a pleasure having my vehicle serviced at Tameron Hyundai. They are quick, efficient and thorough.

name: Brooke Brown
text: Always good customer service!

name: John Minjares
text: I strongly, and highly recommend getting your car's oil change done and fixed here.  The staff is very friendly and professional.  They are honest and know how to get the job done and offer suggestions to keep you car running unlike other garages who try to cheat you.

name: Chuck Conyers
text: Left car for service: so far so good.

name: Judy Oney
text: I love the staff at this dealership! Everyone is so kind and patient when explaining things! I am such a huge fan of this Dealership!!!!! From service to sales people!!!!!

name: Ona Adams
text: Nathan Jordan was extremely helpful and easy to communicate with. Our experience was fantastic. We are pleased with our purchase, and Mr. Jordan has been wonderful in checking in to make sure everything is still satisfactory. Even when in for a routine oil change he has gone out of his way to say hello. Everybody has been extremely friendly and courteous.

name: Kenny G
text: I purchased a new Elantra here recently and the experience was one of the best I have had at any dealership.  The salesman I worked with (Alex M.) was friendly and knowledgeable.  He was happy to offer advice and share opinions, but he was not pushy at all, he was simply there to help with anything I may have needed.  Very refreshing change from normal 'salespeople'.  The sales manager I dealt with (John) was a very pleasant person to work with too.  He didn't 'fast talk' or play any games, he was very direct and to the point, just the kind of person I like to do business with.  I would be happy to purchase my next car from Tameron Hyundai

name: Margaret Harrill
text: Cameron Service is truly exceptional.

name: Ike Reeder
text: Terrible experience with the service department Tameron Hyundai. After paying over a hundred dollars to have a door handle replaced, we showed up to pick up the car only to find out that we'd been given a door handle that was a completely different color than the rest of the car. No phone call. No heads up. Nothing. No offer to fix it or paint it. Just a shoulder shrug. What you do in the small things you do in the big things. Will never buy a car here.

name: George Stafford
text: It was alright and a positive experience.

name: Stuart Capper
text: I had a wonderful experience with the service department at Tameron Hyundai.  My first attempt to get a defect in my 2017 Santa Fe repaired did not go well.  This was an intermittent problem and hard to diagnose.  I got an immediate follow up call and when they found out the problem had not been corrected they jumped on this issue and made sure it was resolved.  The service manager Joe Bajalia handled it personally and everything went fine.  Highly recommend their service department.

name: Tori Caltagirone
text: Great customer service! Very friendly!

name: Janet Moore
text:
We bought a 2016 Santa Fe Sport from Tameron Hyundai and Marcus Hughes. They made the experience a great one! Marcus was courteous, professional and helpful. NO pressure at all which can make the car buying experience dreadful. We will definitely buy another car from Tameron Hyundai and Marcus Hughes! We have found our new car buying home!

Janet and Odis

name: Jenny Doss
text:
Great Dealership! I had a delightful experience with Nathan Jordan! He understood that I was only in the "looking" process and he still went out of his way helping me and I felt no pressure from him! My stepson is a Senior and has a car but we were thinking of surprising him with a new car.
Nathan will definitely be getting my business in the near future!

name: Meg Walker
text: We had an incredible experience at Tameron Hyundai. From the moment we walked in the door, Mike Kelly met and exceeded every single need and expectation that we had. He guided and directed us in the car buying process with patience and a high level of knowledge and expertise. His desire was to find a car that was right for us, and it paid off. We left with a brand new Santa Fe. I will be forever thankful for our experience at Tameron and the ease of purchase thanks to Mike Kelly. He went over and beyond to make our purchase a solid one. I would highly recommend Tameron Hyundai to anyone. Go see Kelly!

name: Dolores Gooch
text: My experience was excellent! Corky  was a great salesperson/advisor. They even topped off the tank before I received it. Great car at a great price with great service!

name: Patti Gibbs
text: I have always received excellent service every time I have brought my Hyundai in for service.  The service personnel are courteous, knowledgeable, and very prompt.  The wait is not too long and they always come out and let me know how it's going.

name: N T
text:
I was very pleased to be able to get in / out for an oil change this last week.  Even as busy as the service department was I didn't feel rushed and they took time to explain what service was given, how my car is at this point in the safety check and what upcoming service I would need as well as costs.
I appreciate the time that was given to me on a follow up phone call to answer a question related to the paperwork I was given!
NICE Job, Thanks!

name: Marilyn Seier
text: Service manager, Joe, was so helpful with a small problem with my new Sonata. Love my Hyundai!

name: Ronin
text: Wouldn't do a simple OBD reader for my check engine light .  Wanted to charge me $140 when the car drives just fine.

name: Conner McKie
text: Best service ever! I loved how my sales representative allowed me to walk down the row of cars to see what I liked, and he was great at listening to my requests and needs in a car to help me figure out what I would love. And now thanks to Mark Hodgson and fellow team members, I was able to buy my dream car at an amazing rate! They truly did everything they could to make my budget work and took a lot of time in helping me find the perfect car. I can now proudly say I am a Hyundai girl! Thank you to everyone who was involved in my purchase, I LOVE my new car!

name: Kerin Johnson
text: Mannn these guys are awesome and quick!!! Always handle with great performance!!!!!

name: Meg Horne
text: We had a van that no longer met our needs and we wanted to trade for a car I had seen on the internet. Henry Williams was our salesman and he was very professional and helpful. He was very knowledgeable about the car and the test drive was great. Mr. Williams and the managers were straight forward in the negotiation process and we left very happy with our new car. I can recommend Tameron Hyundai and Henry Williams to you with confidence that he will deal with you fairly.

name: Martha Austin
text: Always friendly and helpful.

name: jeremy rollan
text: Just got my vehicle back from getting a repair done and it was not put back together properly. BE SURE TO INSPECT THEIR WORK!

name: David LeJeune
text: Our salesman put high pressure on us to buy, didn't ask what features/ options we wanted or could do without. Though, when he asked "what would it take to get you're business today," he was good about taking that info to the finance manager; they were able to provide us a decent offer. Ultimately, seemed only interested in selling us the most expensive trim of the vehicle we looked at instead of getting to know us. A lot of obvious sales tactics instead of honest conversation.

name: Benjamin Childress
text: Fast and friendly great start to my day.

name: Randall Wade
text: great experience! John and Xavier are go-to's

name: Judy Murchison
text: They took my car in right on time and did the recall (my first) in less than an hour.  Excellent service Thank you all.

name: Conner McKie
text: Best service ever! I loved how my sales representative allowed me to walk down the row of cars to see what I liked, and he was great at listening to my requests and needs in a car to help me figure out what I would love. And now thanks to Mark Hodgson and fellow team members, I was able to buy my dream car at an amazing rate! They truly did everything they could to make my budget work and took a lot of time in helping me find the perfect car. I can now proudly say I am a Hyundai girl! Thank you to everyone who was involved in my purchase, I LOVE my new car!

name: N T
text:
I was very pleased to be able to get in / out for an oil change this last week.  Even as busy as the service department was I didn't feel rushed and they took time to explain what service was given, how my car is at this point in the safety check and what upcoming service I would need as well as costs.
I appreciate the time that was given to me on a follow up phone call to answer a question related to the paperwork I was given!
NICE Job, Thanks!

name: Emily Sammons
text: Always an excellent experience!!

name: Honda Singh
text: Myles is a great sales guy! Highly recommend this place!

name: Randi Lynn McNeill
text: Service is always good! Very pleased with how thorough they are and they always make sure you know exactly what is needed and the cost. No surprises!

name: Janiece Beinke
text: They did a great job in record time and were very cordial.  Thanks*6

name: Rob Ewing
text: My wife and I came in to buy a car and we were greeted and helped by Corey Hooper. I have to say that is was the most pleasant experience I have ever had buying a car. He went out of his way to answer all of our questions about the car and made sure that we were very well taken care of. I would gladly recommend anyone to this dealership, and when you go ask for Corey he will take care of you.

name: James Walker
text: This dealership is certainly not in the business of good customer service- The sales person was fine but the Sales Manager was pushy and rude and was poor representation of the dealership. He would not discuss the price of the vehicle and wanted to make a sell based on monthly paymnents. This was an insult to my intelligemce.

name: Jenny Snow-Weaver
text: Thanks so much to MARCUS HUGHES for making our car shopping experience one to remember. He exceeded our expectations in every way. In fact, Marcus deserves an award for all of his patience while dealing with our 5 year old & 16-month-old during our car buying experience. I highly recommend anyone who stops by Tameron Hyundai to ask for Marcus Hughes.

name: Angie Sproull
text: I only take my Hyundai Tuscan to Tameron Service to have work done.  I trust that they will always provide the best service and advise I need to keep my vehicle in great condition.

name: December Sixx
text: Dont go here.  I bought a car here that I wanted and they sneakily added all kind of things onto the sale.  They dont care about the customer, just making a sale.  The salesman I got was new, and did not know a thing.  We had to get another sales guy.  He wasn't much better.

name: Rebecca Augustine
text: Polite and courteous personnel; didn't wait long; price for oil change was fair.

name: Shajuanna Ramsey
text: prompt efficient last minute service. I was out of there in under 20mins. In this case I was heading OOT the next morning  & needed maintenance car service. Thanks Tameron Hyundai for ALWAYS providing excellent service that puts my mind at ease while traveling. From The personable personnel in scheduling & checkout to the respectful personnel in auto service they know how to treat there customers right. Also want to mention my orginal salesperson for the vehicle, is Always personable, helpful, knowledgeable, & energetic (Christina J.) she wasn't there that day but I just wanted to say Hello & Thanks.

name: Ralph Hinton
text: Great Staff very nice and courteous, great environment

name: Sharon Stump
text: Everyone is always nice and you feel like they care about your car, not just about making money off you

name: Stephanie Lucas
text: I always love taking my car in for service at Tameron Hyundai!  They know me by name and I never have to wait long for service to be completed.  This is the only place I will take my Hyundai for service!

name: Derek Hutcheson
text: Had a great experience.  Brandon was very helpful and ended up with better than expected deals on 2 cars.  Even sent a friend and I am expecting my double referral fee any day now! Great job Tameron!

resp.text: YES! We love to hear that you enjoyed your experience here at Tameron! Thank you for taking the time to review us. We look forward to servicing all of your automotive needs!

name: Amy Michelle
text: I was recommended to this dealership by a friend and to specifically ask to deal with a salesman named Joseph, unfortunately he wasn’t there. To make a long story short, the black guy that works there had the WORST service ever all he wanted to do was run credit and over talk me in what I was looking for in a car. On several occasions he was super over bearing and pushy as to just get the numbers and was determined to just put me in anything to get a sale. He didn’t even want to allow me to look at cars to see if i liked them. Unbeknownst to him, I knew better and unfortunately to my salesman that actually greeted me unlike the black lady that walked around like we owed her something, he cost them a sale. I will NEVER forget this experience and will NEVER recommend anyone I know to do anything with them.

name: Lane Ferrell
text: Great guys that made sure I got exactly what I wanted within my budget which was not flexible!  Nice people all the way around! Very happy with the service and attention to detail!

name: Dolores Gooch
text: My experience was excellent! Corky  was a great salesperson/advisor. They even topped off the tank before I received it. Great car at a great price with great service!

name: Lindsey Griffin
text: Came into Tameron Hyundai today and met with Jay Griffin looking at a few cars that we saw on the website. He was very helpful and even went over to the economy lot to show us a few vehicles we were curious about. Will definitely recommend this dealership! Very friendly and great lounge area to relax in while you wait! Thank you for a great experience!

name: O T
text: These guys & gals are awesome! They are super friendly and will get you in and out in no time!

name: Brodie Fisher
text: I went here to purchase my first car, a 2013 Hyundai Elantra and the whole experience was amazing! Nate was my salesman and took his time to make sure all my questions and concerns were addressed. The dealership has a great atmosphere and the staff is very professional and courteous. I would highly recommend this place and will continue doing business with them!

name: Kimberly Simmons
text: I arrived at the dealership highly upset because my car was slow to start. The young lady Tammie I think greeted me with a smile. Listened to me and what service I thought I needed. She told me there’s coffee and tea and we will be complete in 30 minutes.30 minutes she returned with a list of services and she shared I needed a battery... I told her really but I had gotten one within the last year she checked Computer and yes just short of a year ago.... Nattery NC..... receptionist Department was awesome as well !!!!!! I rate 5 star for the service that day and Christina is awesome with sales!!!! Go see them

name: Keeton Armstrong
text: Awesome service in the service department! Always nice and quick.

name: Gary Grimes
text: Great body shop but ordinary sales and mechanical service

name: Fran Pearson
text: I have been really pleased with this dealership. I never stress about my vehicle, the staff is very friendly welcoming. I will be buying more vehicles from here in the future.

name: Meg Walker
text: We had an incredible experience at Tameron Hyundai. From the moment we walked in the door, Mike Kelly met and exceeded every single need and expectation that we had. He guided and directed us in the car buying process with patience and a high level of knowledge and expertise. His desire was to find a car that was right for us, and it paid off. We left with a brand new Santa Fe. I will be forever thankful for our experience at Tameron and the ease of purchase thanks to Mike Kelly. He went over and beyond to make our purchase a solid one. I would highly recommend Tameron Hyundai to anyone. Go see Kelly!

name: Abby Pikula
text: The manager Jason at the used car lot was very nice and the sales man Brandon Crowley was very knowledgable. They made sure to get me the car I wanted at the monthly price I was trying to pay. Everyone here is so nice. Brandon never hassled me or was pushy which I like when I step on to a car lot. Very laid back atmosphere. I will come back for my next vehicle as well.

name: Patti Gibbs
text: I have always received excellent service every time I have brought my Hyundai in for service.  The service personnel are courteous, knowledgeable, and very prompt.  The wait is not too long and they always come out and let me know how it's going.

name: Mindy Moore
text:
This was the best!!  Brandon Crawley genuinely listened to what I needed and delivered on it!!  My car is awesome and just what I was looking for.
He stayed in contact with me and kept me "in the know", explaining to me the things I didn't understand...also, he didn't try to take advantage of my circumstances and try to sell something to me that I didn't need.  Awesome!

name: Annsheric Cole
text: I would totally recommend Tameron Hyundai in Hoover if you are looking for a car. Yesterday, I purchased my first Hyundai!!!! The staff was very helpful and made it a stress free environment!!! Marcus Hughes was great as well he did a great job getting me the best deal possible!!! So definitely stop by and see him!!!

name: Larry Myers
text: Adam Ellham was my salesman. I came in on my lunch break from work, gave him my price range. We looked at a few cars and he really let me decide what I wanted instead of telling me what I want, Adam is not a pushy salesman at all. I told him the one that I wanted and then went back to work.  I got back to the dealership at about 5:30 and i drove my new car off the lot at 7:30.  Great service and nice people, they did a fantastic job all the way around

name: Debra S
text: Do NOT give these people your business. They are scam artists and liars. Hyundai has the absolute WORST cars on the market. Got a 2016 Accent, shut off on me on the interstate 2 years later. Tameron service department “couldn’t find anything wrong”, but were “glad to help my buy a new Hyundai”. The 2018 Elantra I bought shut off on me 7 MONTHS later. They “did a full diagnostic” and, once again, “couldn’t find anything wrong”. I get a call this week that the used car lot is “desperate for 2018 Elantras” and they could get me into a 2019. I asked if I could get a Honda instead. Of course, they couldn’t do that. Called the Honda side of their company (who should have the same access to the same incentives), and they had me get up early and come in before work, just to have me sit there for 10 minutes before telling me that they won’t do anything for me. All of which could have been told to me BEFORE I WASTED MY TIME COMING UP THERE!!! Not not not not happy!!! Don’t give them your business, and DON’T BUY A HYUNDAI!!!

name: Renee Peoples
text: Everyone is always super friendly. It’s easy in and easy out for service!!

name: LaRonda Corrin
text:
The sales process at both Tameron Hyundai and Tameron Honda does not take the time of the customer into consideration.   We came, we knew what we wanted to see, yet we had to go sit with a salesperson first for 20 questions that he said would take "5 minutes".
After that we got an "l'll be right back" while he went to speak to aa manage about what I do not know.  After 10 minutes more of sitting around we walked out.

name: Anthony Carter
text: Great service and very friendly and quick great people that make sure they help with all your needs

name: Meg Horne
text: We had a van that no longer met our needs and we wanted to trade for a car I had seen on the internet. Henry Williams was our salesman and he was very professional and helpful. He was very knowledgeable about the car and the test drive was great. Mr. Williams and the managers were straight forward in the negotiation process and we left very happy with our new car. I can recommend Tameron Hyundai and Henry Williams to you with confidence that he will deal with you fairly.

name: Dean May
text: Great service! and great people

name: Khinje Khinje
text: Service department sucks. Took my car in for repairs last week. I was in the waiting room for 4 hours, no one said a word to me. I had to take it upon myself for status. I was told the repairs would take 24 to 48 hours.  No one calls to update you on the repairs and when you  call them 'someone will  get back to you' and no one ever does. Its been 7 days and i still dont have my car.  If i could give zero stars I would.

name: Rachel Brawley
text: I purchased a 2016 Hyundai Tucson here and couldn't be happier with my decision! Mark was awesome and such a pleasure to work with! Excellent customer service.

name: Will Holley
text: Literally the best car buying experience I have ever had! From the service guys in the back to the sales staff out front, the employees at Tameron Hyundai are all first class and make the buying experience exceptional. I would recommend these guys above all others if you are in the market for a new or used car!

name: James Norris
text: Throughout my entire experience with the service department, I never felt like I was having to chase down someone to get an answer or a return call. I got update calls every time there was new information, and overall I was very pleased with the experience.

name: Charita Todd
text: Great job on everything. I really appreciate the service provided. Everyone was awesome.

name: JH P
text: Citron covered me. Great customer service!

name: Katelyn McLane
text: By far the best experience I have ever had when looking for a new car. My salesman, Jay Griffin, was very knowledgeable of the product and answered all my questions thoroughly. Would definitely recommend Tameron Hyundai and Jay Griffin to anyone.

name: Monica Smith
text: They always take care of me.. I appreciate them!!

name: Spring French
text: Tameron hyundai is amazing, I enjoyed my car buying experience tremendously. Everyone was friendly and helpful, I explained my needs and they meet them just like true professionals. Special thank you to Charlie Andrews for finding me the right car at the right price. Dealing with Charlie Andrews  was a true pleasure and made my car buying experience pleasant. No pressure he explained everything to me step by step, he was professional and very helpful.

name: Faith Matter's
text: Friendly and great customer services

name: Angela Lackey
text: Everyone at Tameron was exceptionally friendly, and the pre-owned Hyundai we purchased was A great deal. The staff was open and honest about the history of the car and we couldn't be happier with our purchase! Also, they stayed late to finish our deal without complaint.

name: Meghan Howell
text: We just bought our 3rd car from this dealership! Can't say enough good things! Brandon Crawley did a great job helping us get into a car we are happy with at a payment we can afford! Would recommend this dealership and this salesman to anyone!

name: James A
text: Great service. Was greeted as soon as I arrived by friendly guy named Giovanni who helped show me a few sonatas. Great car

name: Dolores Jones
text: Mike Kelly was very helpful during the purchase of my new Azera.  My husband had died and this was my first time to purchase a car by myself.  Mike was never pushy. He was very patient with me as I tried to make up my mind.  He explained every detail of the process in terms that I could understand.  He even went over every feature of the car and set the radio stations for me. He even put on my tag for me.  I can highly recommend Mike and the entire Tameron dealership.  This was my family's second purchase from this dealership and every visit has been a pleasure so far.

name: Walter Moreland
text: Always  great..

name: Brooke Lyvers
text: Marcus Hughes was fast and professional. Was courteous  to both me and my daughter. Met my expextations and more! I would recommend him to anyone and will return for my next purchase!

name: r callie1
text: Service was good and the people are always nice.

name: Kenneth Wise
text: The people working at Tameron Hyundai and very helpful from the time you enter to the time you leave.  They make sure you are satisfied before you leave.

name: Anne Murray
text:
Took my car in for a service. The passenger seat belt light stayed on when no one was in seat. Bottom line someone from the service dept. stole my rubber floor mats. Didn't realize it until 2 days later. I know it was them, because my car didn't leave my garage for two days. when I realized they were gone. I also realized after I got home they did not give me a copy of the work they did. Had to call & request a copy. But when I called one of the service tech said rather curtly "Well why didn't you ask for it"?
I shouldn't have to ask for a copy it should be a "given" that the customer gets a copy of the work that is done on their car.

name: Mel B
text: I went into the Hyundai dealership to ask some questions about my current leased Hyundai lease and was persuaded into trading in my old lease for a new 2015 Sonata. I LOVE the car and I believe that I made a really good decision. I was assisted by Corey Hooper. He is such a nice, genuine, stand up guy and he really took care of my mom and I. He answered all of our questions (and we had many) with ease and efficiency. He offered me a fantastic deal and was so nice and easy going throughout the whole process. Afterwards he helped my mom and I to move my stuff from my old car into my new car. I am very pleased with the services and will go back again for any automotive needs/interests. Thanks!

name: Mia Davis
text: Very  professionally. Very sweet and loyal to they customers

name: A Hood
text: My Servie & Experience has always been good & timely.  My complaint is for price. This was my 30,000 mile maintenance.  I don't recall paying the price I had to pay this time.  I will ask about cost before servicing again.  Even though I was given "discounts" I still have a problem with $454..which was $194 & change for parts, & $300 for labor!!  I was just overwhelmed by the cost!!

name: Mary Prawl
text: I had a wonderful experience, they even checked out everything to make sure that my car was running good, and what I needed to have repaired done. Thanks a lot for that and I will see you soon guys.

name: Ellie Gackley
text: Nice salesman clean bought car

name: Nancy DuBois
text:
Randall always is courteous and knowledgeable and sees that I receive excellent service. He explains the paperwork clearly as well as everything done to my car.
I always feel confident when I leave that I am in a safe vehicle.

name: Caleb Hinton
text: I went here to buy a brand new Santa Fe Ultimate and told them upon entry I wanted it for $35,000 Out the door, after treating me badly with scammy sales tactics wasting my time for about an hour, I tell them Jim Burke is selling the same car for $32,000. They then bad mouthed the other dealership and told me they dont sell any cars,  they then try to sell me the car extremely over priced out the door for $41,000 I could of gotten the car cheaper just buying it from the Hyundai website. I called Jim Burke they gave me $35,000 out the door with absolutely no hassle or salemen gimmicks just good customer service and nice people, I am so glad I didnt choose this awful establishment to give my business too.

name: Debbie Byers
text: Awesome ask for Cotton he's the best

name: Fred Baker
text: Disappointed that the issue occurred and had to be without my car for over a week. Service was outstanding, as usual. Randal was very professional and took excellent care of my needs. Would definitely recommend.

name: Xeta Matic
text: Lightning fast appointment fulfillment, excellent staff to make your visit seamless and enjoyable: these are things I never receieved at my old Chevy dealership, and the process here reminds me why I made the right choice to switch to Hyundai, and to pick Tameron Hyundai at that.

name: Eric Florence
text: Great work, fast service. Like the customer lounge that has snacks and coffee.

name: Isabel Reece
text: If you are a young woman I wouldn't suggest going here alone. I called before making the 45 minute trip to Birmingham and voiced my concerns to Shannon, the manager, about how I am a young woman who has experienced mechanics and sales people taking advantage of me before. I had been researching a Hyundai Accent and wanted to look at them. I ended up working with a man (his name starts with a J) who took me to the used accents. When test driving the car he only let me go around the block, I mean the car didn't even get over 40mph. He did not show me that the car was certified, no car fax, and the price was 2-3 thousand dollars than every website I have looked at about this car. In fact, a brand new Hyundai Accent was listed only a few hundred dollars more than the used 2013 one I was looking at. When bringing this up he told me they were not willing to work with me on the price and when I was going to leave he mentioned that "Were not the type of people who will call you later and lower the price." So I left, then I went down the street and bought a Honda Accord that was a year older, had more miles on it and paid $1,000 more than the price J told me he wouldn't budge on the Accent. Why? Because Billy at Tameron Honda treated me as a serious buyer who was paying cash and needed a car instead of a 20 year old college girl who J hurried out the door thinking I wasn't ready to buy. It pays to be nice to people.....

name: Charles Hefner
text: Could not have asked, to be treated any better!

resp.text: Thank you Charles!

name: Andy Hawkins
text: Great used car selection

name: Denice Sims
text: Matt was awesome!

name: LaDale Bishop Jr.
text: My experience was great! Lori, my saleswoman, took great care of me!!! Thanks to top notch customer service, from a team of wonderful individuals, I have no reservation in allowing Tameron Hyundai be the place I purchase my next vehicle.

name: Marcus Coleman
text: I had a great experience!  My salesman, Derrick was very knowledgable and decisive in the sales process!  Great job!

name: Cindy Moravitz
text:
This is for our salesperson LORI
1. You were on time for our appt.
2. You had a car waiting for us to look at
3. We wanted a different one and you had it there immediately
4. You let me test drive in an area I felt comfortable
5. You worked hard to get the payments we needed.
6. You kept a straight face when my husband said he wanted payments under $200.00 for a new vehicle, while I sat there laughing.
7.  You ARE an excellent salesperson and I recommend anyone to you.
8. We love our vehicle and thank you for all you did to make it come true.
9.  Since Tom can't leave a review he said you get 10 stars and ditto to all above.
10. MAKE SURE THIS GOES TO YOU SURVEY AND RECORD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
THANKS LORI !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Robin Chandler
text: Loved working with Natasha and John. They helped me get exactly the car I wanted for an exceptional price! Very easy to work with and made car buying a great experience.

name: Adrian Wyatt
text: Quick service.

name: Patrice Bailey
text: I LOVE TAMERON HYUNDAI IN HOOVER...I DEAL WITH MATT AUSTIN ONLY IN THE SERVICE DEPT...MATT IS SUCH A VALUABLE CARING REPRESENTATIVE OF THIS DEPT..I TRUST HIM COMPLETELY..HE IS HONEST & GUIDES ME WITH MY VEHICLE..I KNOW HE WOULD NEVER LIE OR MIDLEAD ME WHEREAS OTHERS HAVE AT OTHER CAR SERVICES. I RATE MATT & TAMERON A FULL 5 STARS..WOULD GIVE 10 STARS IF ASKED..NICE TO HAVE HONEST PEOPLE TO TAKE CARE OF MY CAR & SAFETY..THANK YOU ALL & GOD BLESS YOU ALL🙏GOD LOVES YOU❤😇🙏💒💒💒💒

name: London Love
text: Fast and very friendly service.. Thank you Guys!

name: Ava Mendes
text: Great customer service! Came with a flat tire on my Hyundai right before their closing time and they serviced my car with a very helpful attitude!

name: Michael Black
text: Really recommend Tameron Hyundai, you really do get good service there and I’ve had nothing but good service

name: Maria Owens
text: I had an appointment. They allowed me to use a coupon for my services and they had me out no problems. I'm happy they did a multi-point inspection they were able to tell me things that needed immediate attention in my car.

name: Michelle Jordan
text: Nice people. Great customer service! Even the general Manager shook his hand with me.

name: Marian Maluff
text: The service department got me in and out in no time for my oil change!!

name: Holly Barton
text: Brandon was so great to work with! I really appreciated his patience when I needed to take some time to think about the purchase of the Hyundai Elantra. I would definitely recommend Tameron Hyundai.

name: Rocelious Smith
text: They are always punctual, comfortable waiting area with wifi, great snacks too, lol.

name: Francinic Williams
text: The waiting time for me to get my oil changed and an ethanol treatment was exactly right at an hour.

name: Vivian Melton
text: Excellent customer service! I recommend going to Tameron for all your vehicle needs! I have a 2019 Sante Fe and I love it.

name: Teri L
text: Great service easy to get an appointment.

name: Reggie Stokes
text: Great service. Trust these guys 100%

name: BIGGEEKED TV
text: Professional service, I had no problems getting my car serviced.

name: Anthony Mitchell
text: Im new in town and I needed a service for my 2016 Hyundai.sante Fe.  I contacted Tameron Hyundai in Hoover,Al. They gave me a same day appt with Matt in the service dept..He was professional, friendly and knowledgeable, and he also made me aware 3  manufacturer recalsl on my vehicle..well Matt did my service and fixed the recalls and had meout and on my way in a couple of hours..Matt was amazing and also the ladies at the counter had great customer service and friendly smiles and thanked me for my business... Amazing experience! Check them out!

name: Lindsey. Griffin
text: The people are unlike any other dealership. It's a family. It's friendly. It's not a pressure cooker with a demand to buy....They are there to help, and make your comfort, and your needs first and formost. And this is just the first stage. We have not purchased, but are hoping to be soon. Getting our car appraised was fast, and we weren't put in "line" to talk to a sales manager on our option. John Petway is awesome, and will tell you the straight truth, with no bull. THIS is the dealership you recommend. THIS is the dealership that has customers for life.

name: Kirk Deyer, Sr
text: Extremely fast and courteous service!!

name: AMANDA GODWIN
text: The worst service I have ever seen. The manager sold me a car the paint is peeling off. Mind you the car is a 2018 Hyundai Sonata brand new. They run your credit weeks after you have left with the car because they say we have a deal but then the deal will require more paperwork then they cant produce the paperwork so two weeks after you leave with the car you are required to hassle them down for your registration paperwork. Only to find out that the paperwork doesn’t exist. That’s when they don’t call you to tell you and just begin to continue to bash your credit without your permission. Be careful they will lie and scam you. Worse service I have ever had and I have been buying cars for years.

name: Nathan Davidson (ohthelawd)
text: Just bought a CPO Sonata at Tameron in Hoover. It was definitely one of the better car buying experiences I've had. Brandon Crawley and the rest of the team there do a good job of balancing what they can offer vs. what your preferences are. They offer you everything they can, but not in a pushy way. In the end, I got the sense that they actually listened to what I was looking for, and offered a fair deal on trade-in and on the new vehicle. Would certainly recommend them to anyone in central AL looking for a new or used Hyundai.

name: Dennis Read
text: Your service department makes the dealership! Additionally the Service Representatives are helpful and knowledgeable.  Matt was a great help.

name: Chas Smith
text: Adam Ellaham did a fantastic job from start to finish. He made the car buying process enjoyable. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

name: Darneshia Mosley
text: Austin Matt from tameron in Hoover is great but I asked that the noise own my car be check and unfortunately they didn't fix it because once I turn sharp to the right I hear the cracking noise and for the amount of money I paid I think they shouldn't have left anything out now I have to make another trip over to tameron in Hoover because I trusted them to fix my 2014 Hyundai sonata SMH

name: David Cataldo
text: Always top notch service and the price never changes. Once quoted, the work is done and there are no "oops, it is this much not what we said before." No surprises!

name: Wendy Mickler
text: Friendly staff, prompt service

name: T S
text: I am still sitting in the waiting room waiting to hear anything about a simple diagnostic as to why my check engine light is on. No repairs, just testing. This is absurd. I had an appointment for 930, and every other person who cane in after me has come and gone. Why the heck is this taking so long? I am beyond aggravated. This is unacceptable.

name: Jeff king
text: SERVICE WRITER ARE FRIENDLY AND EASY TO TALK TO

name: ying liu
text: I was looking for a new Hyundai 2014 Accent. I went there in Saturday afternoon. Alex Marefka helped me out from the new car test drive to old car trade-in to new car cleaning. I drove in with my old car my left with the cleaned new car in the same afternoon. I like this kind of efficient way and appreciate the good patience and friendly attitude of Alex. I am enjoying my new car so far.

name: Jeannie Leighton
text: Mark Hodgson was so helpful and kind. He recognized that we were returning customers and listened to what I wanted. He then helped me get the the car I wanted for the price I needed. This is how buying a car SHOULD be!

name: Christie D
text: I call about a car that they have not only advertised on their website but also on cargurus and carfax. I drive all the way down there after talking to them and they tell me the car never passed inspection. What I don't understand is why you have it advertised everywhere if you can't sell it. And then want to show me the crappiest cars on your lot. This place is a joke and I will make sure that anyone I know does not waste their time or gas to come to this place. That is false advertisement and i think they are doing it to get people to waste their time just to come to the lot. And on top of that they couldn't get their story straight. I got one person telling me the car had just sold and another person saying it didn't pass inspection. So yes I am beyond angry

name: Jane Meadows, M.S.
text:
AWESOME SERVICE & PERSONAL!!!
On my way from South Alabama to UAB – Birmingham Alabama, I experienced what I thought was a problem with the steering of my IONIQ  hybrid. I was concerned about the safety, and I called corporate Hundyai. They advised me to go to a dealership that afternoon. It was getting very late in the day. However, I did find  Tameron Hyundai that allowed me to come in, and they checked my car.
I first was met by Joe Bajalia, Service Manager, who was Great! I told Joe I was concerned about my safety, and I had a 4 Hour drive back home. He called in his National Award Winning technician, Chris Cochran. Chris took my IONIQ for a test drive, and also checked out the car with his device that identified Car trouble.
After Chris’s Evaluation, he educated me on what I was experiencing in the steering , and how the car is designed to work on the interstate . I felt very comfortable in his confidence and his explanation.
The Previous dealership where I had my car serviced in South Alabama did not put enough air of equal portions in the tires, and Joe got a very polite professional technician to make sure the tires work properly inflated. There was one other man that assisted me when I arrived . This man wrote up the paperwork. He too was also very professional and polite!
I certainly did appreciate Tameron Hyundai taking my concerns seriously , especially when I was concerned about my safety! I had never been to this dealership.  However,  as a woman I am used to being talked down and sometimes not being taken seriously but this was NOT the case at Tameron Hyundai Service department.
Although I live 4 hours away from this dealership, if I lived closer,  they would be my #1 choice in Service!!!
What a positive, efficient, effective, professional and polite service team! As one tech told me, “we have very little turnover here and we are all like family”.
Thank you for your help, and treating this woman with respect and professionalism.
Jane Meadows, M.S.

name: Sue Dobrinski
text: Fast service. A little confusion regarding future maintenance and what I came in for (oil change and key fob check).

name: Nan Rust
text: We got a new Hyundai Genesis Coupe at Tameron Hyundai yesterday. Shannon was wonderful to work with! It was one of the easiest car-buying experiences we've ever had. No back-and-forth, no "sales talk", no hassle. If you need a car, go to Tameron!!

resp.text: Shannon IS great! Thank you so much for taking the time review us, we appreciate it- Enjoy your new car!

name: Linda Wilkinson
text: Prompt and courteous service

name: LaPorcha Houston
text: Service was great and they got me in and out!

name: eric brown
text: Brandon Crawley the the most professional sale person I have ever worked with his patience his attitude he makes sure that his customers are well taken care of and me and my family really appreciate everything he does Tameron should be proud I know a lot of places that would love to have his services and need people like his keep up the good work👍🙏

name: Amy Sehulster
text: Would recommend using Tameron services to friends and family.

name: Jasmine Christion
text: I’ve had my car four years and every time I go in there the customer service is phenomenal! I’m most definitely getting my next car here!

name: Erin Price
text:
If there were a no star option that's what I would have given this place. My service experience was terrible. I had to go in four times for them to replace a plastic cover for my trunk arm. After ordering they would replace it because I didn't have 3 hours to wait for them to do a recall service on something unrelated. Then they tried not to cover a warranty covered replacement because by trip 4 I no longer had it the broken piece. Had they wanted it's simple "please keep that handy until we service your vehicle " would have prevented the problem. After talking to 4 different people the only thing that happened was what should have happened in the first place. They should have thrown in the oil change or cleaned the car or really done anything to make up for my wasted time and money and the fact my child was suffering in the heat. This place is 7 miles from my home --5 trips in total...70miles traveled. Over an hour dealing with sub par service people. Hours spent coming an going. My 9month old baby having to sit in sweltering heat while I deal with the bullshit. I will never ever go to this place again. So much for their great warranty service! When something goes wrong with an item from Amazon or REI or Whole Foods they just fix the problem. They don't hand me back my rotten lettuce and say "we see it's gross could you carry it around until we get a new order in?"
I am irate. I know that they don't care that this happened or that my time was wasted but maybe you reading this will save yourself some grief.

name: Tommy B
text: Just bought a new Sonata from Tameron Hyundai. Had a great experience. Very friendly staff and were easy going and not pushy. Actually kind of had fun.

name: Prestpn
text: the last two service visits were not good. the tire rotation was completed but the lug nuts were not tightened correctly risking a possible accident while driving. this last service was for fuel injection service and one day later service engine light came on. I had to return to dealer to get this condition corrected.

name: Kristy Watkins
text: I had a very pleasant experience when purchasing my 2014 Hyundai Sonata. My salesman, Corey Hooper, listened to what I wanted and him and the staff at Tameron Hyundai made it happen. If you are looking for a new car, you need to give Tameron Hyundai a try.

name: Sherrell Thomas
text: As always the service was fast, professional, and with a clean, and friendly atmosphere. My only concern is the expense, things can get to a little high at cost.

name: Kenneth R Huffman Sr
text: I like that they take time to go over with me whats needed for my wife"s car

name: zach jones
text: We purchased a preowned car from this place and we were told it had the full inspection completed, after 2 weeks the ac compressor failed and the car was having a bad shudder at low rpms. We took it to have the car repaired no rental was issued and after a week we got the car back, the manager claims everything had been fixed but the ride home showed other wise. The ac works great but the shudder is still there unfortunately, be warned when buying a used vehicle from this place.

resp.text: Hello Zach! We're sorry you're having issues with your pre-owned vehicle purchased from us. While we mechanically inspect all vehicles before sale, we cannot guarantee there won't be issues in the future- especially with older vehicles. We would be more than happy to service your vehicle, and if you are totally unhappy with the car- perhaps we could trade you out of it? Please let us know, again we're sorry for the frustration. We would be more than happy to help.

name: jim hicks
text: Where to begin?? My fiancé went to upgrade her car, which was A lease and we were told by the salesman that fees, lease and overages would all be taken care of if we bought a car, which we did. I love the Tucson, however we were lied to. Nothing the salesman said was true. I got a bill from Hyuandi for everything the salesman said he would take care of. When I contacted the sales manager (several times) he blew me off. Needless to say I got stuck with the bill. They have the worst customer service I have ever seen. If you buy from them PLEASE get everything in writing. Do not take their word as I did.

name: James Lawshe
text: Always great service and always get me out in a timely manner.

name: Larry Cummings, CA-AM
text: Ready when promised and I drove off SOOOOOO pleased

name: Joel Reid
text: Always great service!

name: Hunter White
text: Beautiful 2015 Sonata, under budget! My wife and I were all in with an extended warranty and even car insurance through Geico (full coverage) for a monthly payment well below our budget! Thanks to Cherie for working with us. This is the 4th Hyundai purchase from my immediate family and the first for our family. Love Tameron Hyundai.

name: D mckenzie
text: Great professional service as always. Keep up the great work guys. Very well pleased customer.

name: annette campbell
text: I highly recommend working with Ms. Cherie England , she gets you the best deal possible for an car and work very well with what you have . She knows everything you need to know and more . She always helpful when I have questions about my car as well.

name: Regina McAteer
text: From the very beginning, Shannon Cowart made this buying experience the best I ever had. From the initial contact to the completion of the purchase she was most pleasant and knowledgable. She took the time to explain all aspects of the vehicle and especially the electronics. I most definitely will recommend her and this dealership to friends and family.

name: HILDE CAMP
text: Larry was very friendly and knowledgeable and was very fair in dealing with me. I would recommend him to anybody. He even found my glasses and the four dollars in change I left in my old car!

name: Jing Gu
text: Was told about 1.5 hours. Actually, it took more than 2 hours. Just 30K regular maintenance. I think it's easy to know the expected time.

name: William Jones
text: Mr. Drake was very professional and patience throughout the purchase process. Together we were able to work out a fair deal on a great Sonata Sport.

resp.text: Congratulations on your new Sonata Sport! What a great car that you will love for years to come. Thank you for shopping with us, we are elated to see that you enjoyed your time with us.

name: LeAlan Carter
text: I went to look at a car a few days ago with no intention of buying, but my salesman Brandon Crawley really worked with me and got me the car I wanted at a price I couldn't refuse. I never felt pressured at all and everyone I came in contact with while at the dealership was very friendly and courteous. I have had some bad experiences in the past with other dealerships and I found this whole experience with Tameron Hyundai to be great.

name: Debrah Fisher
text: I was able to schedule the service easily online, They took very good care of my car and were most considerate, offering suggestions on to get the necessary work done.

name: Barbara Moore
text: Mr. Brandon was great, very informative, and very helpful.

name: Gil Mauldin
text: I just bought a car at Tameron Hyundai and it was the best car buying experience I've ever had.  Our Salesman Mark Hodgson, was the best salesman hands down.  In fact everyone I came in contact with at Tameron was so nice I didn't feel like I was at a dealership, I felt like I had known these people for years. I would strongly recommend  Tameron if you are in the market for a new or used car.  You won't be dissappointed.

name: Justin Ott
text: Bill Cowan was awesome! They are always good to me and treat me right. They let me know the work before done. Have great pricesand good service

name: C Jones
text:
Terrible buying experience!!! I purchased a car last June and I am still unhappy. I will NEVER purchase from Tameron again. It took over two weeks to get my contract finalized. When I received my final contract, it was past the date to get my car tag. I called and they told me that they would pay the 15.00 late fee that I was charged. I sent my paperwork to them and never heard back. When I purchased the car I told the salesman that the car needed tires and he told me the car didn't  need tires and the tires look like that because they are "low profile". I just had tires put on the car. I purchased an extended warranty that was supposed to cover everything for 2 years or 24,000 miles. I noticed that when I  purchased the car the drivers seat rocked a little. The seat has gotten progressively worse and I took the car to a Nissan Dealership and was told the seat needs to be replaced, the warranty doesn't cover it, and it would be $1,748.00 to fix.
Dear Tameron,
You will never get another dime of mine!!

name: Leon Mills
text: Fast and easy to get my service done

name: Alaina Muse
text: Chris Cochran and the whole service team rock. They always take care of me and they are super fast!

name: Scott Ridley
text: I made a reservation for oil change and noise problem.  I was notified of what the noise was, and oil change was done and I was gone.  Very good service and comfortable waiting area.

name: Lori Earle
text:
Between myself, my husband and our oldest son, we have purchased many cars at many dealerships, but this place was different. Everyone was so genuinely nice (not just being nice to sell you a car), yet very professional at the same time. Shannon seemed to really care about getting me in the RIGHT car, not just A car. I told her my needs, she gave me my options (without being pushy, which I HATE) and I got me a new car! That's the way it SHOULD be!

We also have a 7 year old, so we know where we'll be getting his first car! We'll see you then, Shannon!

name: Daniel Brasher
text:
Had a solid experience a couple days ago with Tameron thanks to the helpful and knowledgeable Jonathan Reeves.  He was attentive to questions and concerns, personable, and as accommodating as he was knowledgeable.  I came in knowing what CPO car I wanted to purchase, aware it was a good deal, but he still took the time to highlight the features and functionality of the car while I test drove it.  The overall vibe is you're buying a service in addition to just your vehicle, which is of course a great way to do business.  I appreciated the time he took to address concerns and make sure I was absolutely satisfied with my purchase before completing the transaction.

Jeremy Blalock also deserves special thanks for advising me on the cheapest way to retitle the car in a different state, which easily saved me a thousand dollars in additional sales tax.  Definitely worth a look if you're considering a car purchase.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Brasher! We appreciate you taking the time to review us! We understand the buying a car is big deal- so of course you should get to know it first! Please contact us with any questions or concerns! Thank you and welcome to the family. Enjoy your new car!

name: Joe Herbert
text: Service was delivered promptly, professionally, and courteously. I'm completely satisfied with my Hyundai and Tamaron's support and service.

name: Sheena Hill
text: I had Jay Johnson for my salesman and he went above and beyond. Oh and Brian also.  I purchased a 2016 Genesis and was done with everything in about two hours. Thanks guys, you're the best!!!!

name: Jim Mankowich
text: Very smooth and positive.  This is my third car purchase from Tameron Hyundai and each time has been great.

name: Fred Judd
text: Done very quickly and on time.

name: sarah jones
text: The service team was very helpful!! Great team

name: Monisha Seay
text: Excellent and quick customer service.

name: Trilisa Witherspoon
text: Awesome service, free snacks, tea , coffee, bottled water, sodas.Nice people.

name: Georgie Pitts
text: Jeni helped me buy my car. I had two trade in's. I bought my first car from Royal automotive and the car (dodge caliber sucked! (DO NOT GO TO Royal AUTOMOTIVE). But any way, Jeni was very good with me and got me in a Hyundai Elantra  2014 :) and i love my car. I wish i would have went to Tameron Hyundai first.

name: Clayton Nix
text: Great experience!! The entire staff is very friendly. I worked directly with Leaman Griffin. He was not pushy (like the typical car salesman), but confident, polite, and knowledgeable. He quickly answered all my questions and stayed late (after closing) to wash/detail my new car himself even when I offered to bring it back the next day. I will definitely be a return customer because of Leaman and this experience.

name: Ms. Jackson
text: I went to Tameron Hyundai today with the intention of viewing a used Hyundai I found online. I was pleased to work with Corey Hooper who worked with me and showed me all of the options they had available. When I decided on a new Hyundai Sonata, he and the rest f the Tameron team worked with me to get me the car I wanted for the price I wanted. I recommend this dealership to anyone looking to purchase a car.

resp.text: Well Ms. Morgan, that makes our day! Thank you for taking the time to review us and let the world know that you loved your experience with us.We are grateful that you chose to do business with us, and look forward to seeing all of your automotive needs!

name: Anastasia Beaverhousen
text: I wouldn’t recommend any other dealership! Never disappointed!

name: Wendy Mickler
text: Friendly staff, prompt service

name: William Jones
text: Mr. Drake was very professional and patience throughout the purchase process. Together we were able to work out a fair deal on a great Sonata Sport.

resp.text: Congratulations on your new Sonata Sport! What a great car that you will love for years to come. Thank you for shopping with us, we are elated to see that you enjoyed your time with us.

name: Kenneth R Huffman Sr
text: I like that they take time to go over with me whats needed for my wife"s car

name: Paige Morris
text: Excellent Service as always!! Randall is always so friendly, helpful and he will go out of his way to make things the best!!

name: Anastasia Beaverhousen
text: I wouldn’t recommend any other dealership! Never disappointed!

name: Alex Hackworth
text:
Tameron Hyundai was the most accomodating and convenient buying experience I could have expected! As I was searching for my first vehicle as a graduation gift, I was walked through every step while explanations were simple and thorough. JAY was my sales representative and after some approval delays, he brought my vehicle to me on his OFF day and made sure that my transition into a beautiful new Elantra Limited was as smooth as possible. Their motto of "You'll love how you are treated" was no joke- Tameron lived it out to the tee. They set me up with my perfect car at an affordable cost. As a young and inexperienced woman new to the vehicle industry, I felt the employees were not only friendly, but flexible and trustworthy. I undoubtedly know where I will go to in need of a new vehicle and GREAT SERVICE!
Thank you Tameron Hyundai!

name: Kenneth Horne
text: My car buying experience at Tameron was the best I have ever had. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fair deal on a well built vehicle.

name: Ariel Graham
text: I traded in my 2000 Accent for a 2017 Elantra. Everyone at Tameron Hyundai was amazing! Mark made sure I knew about all of the features the new Elantra offers and how to use them. I got the car and color I wanted at a price I can afford. Go see Mark, he's awesome!

name: Deanna Hammett
text: I would rather walk than to EVER buy another car from here again. The financial department is a scam. They do the complete run around. We were told we were approved and left the dealership with a car to later find out that we were not approved and they ran our credit 42 times after we gave permission to only send it to 4 places. Here we are 3 months later still dealing with them. Very unprofessional

name: Leon Mills
text: Fast and easy to get my service done

name: Becky Hunter
text: We have purchsed two Hyundai automobiles from Tameron Hyundai sunce 2012. We have always received excellent service there.

name: Dillon Lee
text: Shannon Cowart gave me a world class experience at Tameron Hyundai. She could not have done better! I recommend her to anyone that goes to Tameron Hyundai!

name: Leo Walton
text: My visit to Tameron Hyundai was excellent and customer service they were very kind and courteous.

name: Deanna Hammett
text: I would rather walk than to EVER buy another car from here again. The financial department is a scam. They do the complete run around. We were told we were approved and left the dealership with a car to later find out that we were not approved and they ran our credit 42 times after we gave permission to only send it to 4 places. Here we are 3 months later still dealing with them. Very unprofessional

name: Tonya Mckenny
text: It was quick and seamless!!

name: Natasha Gilbert
text:
Brian Crowley is my new best friend.  I printed the car I wanted off of the internet. Took it to Brian the next day. Brian stated you will leave with this car today and I did.

Thanks Brian for your excellent customer service!!!!

name: Kenneth Horne
text: My car buying experience at Tameron was the best I have ever had. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fair deal on a well built vehicle.

name: Suzanne Barry
text: I was driving a Tucson, leased, and nearing the end of the lease.  I came to dealership unsure of what I wanted to do because, although I loved the Tucson I had not had the greatest experience purchasing it.  I met Chris George, who immediately put me at ease with his calm, friendly approach.  He went above and beyond great customer service as he walked me through the entire process, spending time to find out about me and my needs and actually looking for the best car for me, the price I could handle and the best financing process.  He described the features of the car and instructed me on functions and features that I had not even known about in earlier vehicles.  I am still learning about ways that Chris went above and beyond when I received notice that he had notified my insurance agent of my new car, and even notified the leasing agency about my autopay.  I have never had this experience with the many vehicles I have had over the years.  Chris,, where were you when I bought my first car?  You would have changed my impression of what has always been the "daunting experience of car shopping".  Thanks to Chris, and the GM at Tameron Hyundai.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to review us, and let us know what you think. We greatly value your opinion, and look forward to servicing all of your automotive leads.

name: Ariel Graham
text: I traded in my 2000 Accent for a 2017 Elantra. Everyone at Tameron Hyundai was amazing! Mark made sure I knew about all of the features the new Elantra offers and how to use them. I got the car and color I wanted at a price I can afford. Go see Mark, he's awesome!

name: Stacey McGhee
text: I want talk about my experience with Tameron Hyundai. I had an AWESOME experience buying my car! The sales person Martavise was so helpful and knowledgeable about the car I chose, which is a 2015 Hyundai Sonata, I mean he showed me how to use all the features and I wasn't in there all day like most car lots have people.  The finance guys John & Seth were amazing and really helped me get the best bank and payment I could afford.  Not only was my service good but the warranties I received from Hyundai and Tameron gave me more warranty, now that is how you roll out the red carpet for your buyers. I was even introduced to the Service department manager and I thought that was really cool....no one has ever than that !!! Another cool feature I have is Blue link which is my roadside assistance etc and I downloaded the app and guess what I can start my car while I'm in the house or in California lol! I have told all my friends/family about Tameron Hyundai because it was a Great experience and I AM LOVING MY CAR!!! Thank you...You guys Rock!!!

name: Brittany Sullivan
text: Randall was nice and very helpful. I love having the added benefit of a shuttle to avoid finding a ride or waiting for hours.

name: Eileen Joiner
text: Tameron's service dept was great! Very professional and efficient.. I will certainly go back! A+++

name: Clay Stephens
text: Tameron Hyundai in Birmingham has now sold me my 3rd vehicle, and I couldn't be happier about it.  The sales people are fantastic and supportive.  Management is patient and helps explore every financial option available to get each customer into the right car.  Specifically, Corey L Hooper spent a significant amount of time learning what I wanted, but more importantly, what I needed.  He was courteous, knowledgeable and a real pleasure to work with.  Each question was answered respectfully and with assurance of trust.  I never felt pressured or pushed to select any particular vehicle.  Nor did I ever feel uncomfortable or out of place.  This purchase brought me in for a used truck.  While normally I enjoy purchasing new vehicles because of Tameron's incredible warranty, this time I needed a truck for work purposes.  Corey went through the available used stock, finally settling on the truck I now know, I truly need.  Thanks to Corey Hooper and the entire Tameron family.  Every person I had the privilege of speaking with was more than willing to help in whatever fashion they could.  I will purchase another vehicle from the experts at Tameron again when the need arises.  Thanks again, and I look forward to seeing Tameron's family of professionals again.

resp.text: Hat trick!! We appreciate that you took the time to review us! Thank you for the kind words, please contact us with any of your automotive needs!

name: Shawn Allen
text:
Everything was great from sales to finance.

First maintenance visit went great as well.

name: Christopher Weaver
text: So I am a consumer protection attorney who handles a lot of autofraud cases. Generally,  franchise dealerships are better than the we finance (and then assign that contract to the highest bidder), high quality imports (except for that salvaged title) dealership. These guys were better. Salesman was a bit shady. Service is too, everything else was fine. Car was the wifes choice.  We told Salesman, I wont mention his name, that we just wanted prices, and after test driving a couple cars he got a hissy fit when we told him again that we just wanted prices.  We settled for a 2015 hyunda sonata,  an off lease for a good price (the floor manager, hes quality folks.) Well, the antenna falls of the car, the lil shark fin thing,  the very next day on our way to church.  Wife paid for the extended service contract tho I advised otherwise , and their service initially said they wouldn't fix it, thinking we broke it. ..we had the warranty on top of a service contract, and they initially said no. They changed their mind after my pregnant wife started breathing fire, and fixed it as a "one time courtesy " as if they didnt have to but were being polite.

name: Abby Barrett
text: Rude staff. They will give you an attitude of you take time making up your mind about buying a car. Something was wrong with a truck and we wanted them to see what it was and we were told only if we but the truck. Would never go back

name: Tom Milton
text: The sales staff was courteous and professional throughout the buying process.  My son bought a Sonata last year at Tameron and had the same experience and that is the main reason I returned this year to buy our Santa Fe Sport.

name: Shannon Entrekin
text: Service took great care of me!! Great job!  Will return..  frequently.

name: Lake House
text: This was the best car buying experience I have ever had, and I have bought many automobiles,I'm 88 years old

name: Linda Caffey
text: Great people in this service department.....Tameron Hyundai!

name: Sarah Fisk
text: I'm an older lady who found myself in bad need of a new car. I dreaded going shopping for one by myself. Had heard horror stories of buying a new car. So I walked into Tameron Hyundai scared to death. I first met Danny Pereira. This young man was professional, nice, and helpful. I immediately felt comfortable and that I had come to the right place. Danny found me exactly what I was looking for. There was no pressure or haggling. I can not say enough good about my whole experience. It was unbelievable. There was not one aspect of the sale that was not easy, fun and pleasant.  The manager, the finance manager and the service manager could not be any nicer.  They truly went over and beyond accomodating me. I can honestly say they did treat me like family!  Also, beside being nice, they sold me the prettiest, best driving car I've ever had, and most importantly, at a great price!. I think anybody would be very impressed and pleased doing business at Tameron.

name: DANA REED-VERNON
text: I highly recommend Tameron Hyundai. Everyone I met was so nice.  I could not have asked for a better salesperson in Shannon Cowart.

name: Daniel Corbin
text: I'm always happy with the service I receive at Tameron. Everyone is professional and serve me in a timely manner.

name: melanie carter
text: Always awesome service! Matt always takes great care of me!

name: Grandpa Plays video games
text: Awesome.....shannon took care of me .it was my easiest and most pleasurable experience purchasing a vehicle .....she did exactly what she said she would do right from the start.....I will send her name on to anyone looking to purchase a new vehicle

name: Juan Whitfield
text: Tony did a wonderful job

name: Leaman Griffin
text: I went to Tameron Hyundai after a bad experience elsewhere.  Incredible car buying experience here!! Everyone was friendly, nobody pressures you, candy and snacks to keep the kids entertained etc. Found the perfect suv and was in and out in only a few hours start to finish! Jon Pettway and his team were incredible and if it werent for them it wouldnt be the place it is.  I would recommend them to anyone looking to buy and worried about their dealer being honest and upfront.  Car buying as it should be!!!!

name: Brian Baker
text: Buying a car has NEVER been a fun process for me until I came to Tameron.  Tameron runs like a well-oiled machine.  No detail was omitted.  If I had one word to describe this dealership it is "genuine".  My husband and I always laugh at the cheesy car salesman and their gimmicks but not so this time.  I left Tameron feeling like these people were people I could be friends with--I liked them THAT much.  There is an authenticity there that cannot be manufactured--they've just GOT IT.  This review is saying a lot since this is my 5th Hyundai and 3rd dealership (Auburn and Montgomery being the others). We both said on the ride home "Is it weird that buying a car was that much fun?!?!" We will be forever customers!! Thank you to Shannon, Alex, Richard, and Walt!!

name: Cass Russ
text: They always deliver superb customer service!! Brandon in the service department is awesome!!

name: Hannah Murphy
text: I can’t say enough horrible things about this dealership. Go somewhere where they won’t consistently lie to you

name: Ann Morrison
text: Very thorough.  Service personnel very courteous.

name: julie sutherland
text: Professional And Knowledgeable Staff. Clean, And Quick Drop Off.

name: Regina Bergfeld
text: I went to a couple different dealerships but none of them even compared to Tameron Hyundai! From the moment I arrived at the dealership Brandon Crawley was there to answer all of the questions I had since this was the first time I was buying a car. He helped me get the best price for my Hyundai Elantra, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Tameron Hyundai is definitely the best in Birmingham!

name: Zachary Hall
text: Perfectly cromulent, I just wish they had courtesy vehicles, so I could drive to and from work when I drop off my Genesis for service.

name: Rebecca Hatten
text: Very easy going yet informative salespeople.

name: Diedra Richey
text: My service is always the best.Joe and the team are super nice and courteous.

name: Shedrick Flowers
text: The service department does a great job of getting the work done timely and professionally.

name: Jenni Kress
text: I purchased my Veloster when I lived in GA so I've never dealt with anyone from the sales team at Tameron Hyundai, however I've dealt with the parts and service guys (Tom Land and Todd Hill specifically) since I've been in Bham and they've always been extremely nice and super helpful - if it's not something the dealership can do, they usually have a suggestion or recommendation.
